1b1('bum): /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyu pa//bam po nyis brgyu
1b2('bum): don brgyad pa//rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam
1b3('bum): par gzigs na/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham so gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
1b4('bum): na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yaM dgos kyi yul
2a1('bum): /pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab
2a2('bum): tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag ni sems can yi dwags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub
2a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas
2a4('bum): rnam par ldang ba dang /dri dag yi dgras kyi skye ga nas de dag nas rnam por langs nas/dge bo'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis
2a5('bum): lha'i 'jig rten dang /mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
2b1('bum): su yongs su mya dran las 'das kyi bar du spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //
2b2('bum): rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigaswA na/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasna gang+gA'i klung gi/
2b3('bum): bye ma stod dag nA/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag
2b4('bum): ni sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag na sems can yi
2b5('bum): dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byamos pa'i sems bskyed cing /yi dwags kyi skye
2b6('bum): gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lho'i
3a1('bum): /'jig rten dang /mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan
3a2('bum): las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //rab 'byor ngas 'di nas
3a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag nA/byang chub
3a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul po rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/sdug bsngal ji snyed tsog yod
3a5('bum): pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba de dag byang chub
3a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /
3b1('bum): de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya
3b2('bum): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //
3b3('bum): rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gung+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub
3b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgos kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu
3b5('bum): 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams
3b6('bum): pa'i sems bskyed cing /yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/dge ba'i rtsa
3b7('bum): ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi
4a1('bum): bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig
4a2('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4a3('bum): sems can yi dgas kyi yul po rnams kyi yi dgras kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ster sna spang ba'i phyir chos
4a4('bum): ston pa dang /de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /yi
4a5('bum): dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lci'i 'jig rten dang /
4a6('bum): mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
4a7('bum): dang nam yang 'brel bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //rab 'byor nges 'di nos sangs rgyas kyi skyon gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/shar lho'i phyogs
4b1('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de
4b2('bum): dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag na sems can yi dwags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub
4b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /yi dwags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /de dag yi dwags kyi skye gnas de dag nas
4b4('bum): rnam par langs nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan
4b5('bum): las 'das kyi bar du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang num yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
4b6('bum): rnam par gzigs na/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi ngogs kyi
4b7('bum): yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag na sems can
5a1('bum): yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam
5a2('bum): par ldang ba dang /de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /mi'i 'jig rten du smyos te/phung po ma lus
5a3('bum): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //rab
5a4('bum): 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub
5a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhong ser
5a6('bum): sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing //
5a7('bum): yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /
5b1('bum): mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang
5b2('bum): 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dgra mthong ngo //rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
5b3('bum): ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgos kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams
5b4('bum): cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i
5b5('bum): sems bskyed cing /yi rigs kyi skyo gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig
5b6('bum): rten dang /mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
5b7('bum): dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
6a1('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na
6a2('bum): sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang /de dag na sems can yi dgus kyi yul pa de dag byang chub
6a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /yi dgos kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag
6a4('bum): nas rnam par langs nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
6a5('bum): mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo //rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
6a6('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
6a7('bum): kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa
6b1('bum): dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang //
6b2('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la
6b3('bum): gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dgra 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa 'du byed thams cad ni sdug
6b4('bum): bsngal ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/'du byed thams cad de ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i
6b5('bum): chos can yin na/'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
6b6('bum): gzigs ra/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa
6b7('bum): dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
7a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /yongs su mya
7a2('bum): ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang
7a3('bum): de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal
7a4('bum): ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur
7a5('bum): ba'i chos can yin na/'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam
7a6('bum): par gzigs na/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gar+b+ha'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la
7a7('bum): chos ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /byang
7b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de zlos nas/thog pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /yongs
7b2('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shes cher myos pa de dag la gzhal
7b3('bum): medo khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/'du byed thams cad ni sdug
7b4('bum): bsngal ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/'du byed thams cad ni rnam par
7b5('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
7b6('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
7b7('bum): rnams la chos ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /
8a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das
8a2('bum): par gyur pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shes
8a3('bum): cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/
8a4('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni me brtan pa/'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/'du
8a5('bum): byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs
8a6('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/byar shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
8a7('bum): dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la cho so ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul
8b1('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya/
8b2('bum): ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas
8b3('bum): shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag
8b4('bum): pa/'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/'du byed thams cad ni yid brtson du mi rung ba/'du byed
8b5('bum): thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin no/'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
8b6('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal
8b7('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la
9a1('bum): chos ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos dbyis nas/theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya
9a2('bum): ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan
9a3('bum): lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khong de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni
9a4('bum): mi rtag pa/'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung
9a5('bum): ba/'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yod phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs
9a6('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
9a7('bum): chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtsham dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
9b1('bum): rnams la chos ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las
9b2('bum): 'das par gyur pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon ton lngas shes
9b3('bum): cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/'du
9b4('bum): byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/'du byed thams
9b5('bum): cod ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
9b6('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal
9b7('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtsho ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos
10a1('bum): ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las
10a2('bum): 'das par gyur pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shes
10a3('bum): cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/
10a4('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/'du byed
10a5('bum): thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas
10a6('bum): kyi sman gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
10a7('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
10b1('bum): rnams la chos ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan
10b2('bum): las 'das par gyur pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan
10b3('bum): lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing /de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad
10b4('bum): ni mi rtag pa/'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi
10b5('bum): rung ba/'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/'du byed rnams la lngaso zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor ngas yang
10b6('bum): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
10b7('bum): dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
11a1('bum): kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/theg pa gsum pos
11a2('bum): rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/rab 'byor de la lha'i
11a3('bum): bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khong de dag 'bar bar srung bar byas shing /de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/'di skad du grogs po
11a4('bum): dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/'du byed thams
11a5('bum): cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas zhes chos ston
11a6('bum): to//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang
11a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig
11b1('bum): lta ba bskyed/chos thams cad gsog dang /gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
11b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /sems can rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshor che ste/byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen
11b3('bum): po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
11b4('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa
11b5('bum): la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/chos thams cad gsog dang /gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang
11b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /sems can rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/byang chub sems dpa'
11b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
12a1('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la//
12a2('bum): kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/chos thams cad gsog dang /gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral
12a3('bum): bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /sems can rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor
12a4('bum): de ni ngo mtshar che ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
12a5('bum): rnam par gzigs na/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i
12a6('bum): lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/chos thams cad gsog dang /gso ba sha stag la ci zhig lta ba
12a7('bum): bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /sems//
12b1('bum): can rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas/
12b2('bum): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
12b3('bum): rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lte ba bskyed/chos thams cad gsog dang gso ba shra stag
12b4('bum): le ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing
12b5('bum): sems can rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshor che ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di
12b6('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/shAr lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
12b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/chos thams cad gsog
13a1('bum): dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
13a2('bum): rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i
13a3('bum): chos so//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
13a4('bum): snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad
13a5('bum): stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/chos thams cad gsog dang /g.yo ba sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor
13a6('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /sems can rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/byang
13a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs no//
13b1('bum): nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snad dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can glang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon
13b2('bum): par zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyod/chos thams cad gasrog dang /gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam
13b3('bum): pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /sems can rnams la chos ston to///
13b4('bum): rab 'byor de ni ngo mtsha ro che ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
13b5('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'o lta
13b6('bum): ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/chos thams cad gsog dang /gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces
13b7('bum): lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing /sems can rnams
14a1('bum): la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du zung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas
14a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
14a3('bum): rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/chos thams cad gsog dang /gsob
14a4('bum): sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la
14a5('bum): gnas shing /sems can rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab
14a6('bum): 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa'
14a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa'o//rab 'byor
14b1('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14b2('bum): chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa'o//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas
14b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi
14b4('bum): rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa'o//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs
14b5('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dog na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams
14b6('bum): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyod pa dang /don mthun pa'o//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
14b7('bum): spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
15a1('bum): po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa'o//rab 'byor
15a2('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems
15a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa'o//
15a4('bum): rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang
15a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don
15a6('bum): mthun pa'o//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi kha mos gang+gA'i klung gi
15a7('bum): bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/smyon pa dang /tshig snyan pa
15b1('bum): dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa'o//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
15b2('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don
15b3('bum): spyad pa dang /don mthun pa'o//rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
15b4('bum): mo snyed dag na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don
15b5('bum): spyad pa dang /don mthun pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya don dgu pa//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
15b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams
15b7('bum): sdud de/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /chos kyi sbyin pa'o//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems
16a1('bum): can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sheng rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gser ram/dngul lam/nor bu
16a2('bum): 'am/mu tig gam/bai DUr+ya 'am/dung ngam/man shel lam/byu ru 'am/sa le sbram mam/zas sam/skom mam/gdugs sam/gos sam/spos sam/'phreng ba
16a3('bum): 'am/byug pa 'am/mal cha'am/stan nam/'tsho ba 'am/bud med dam/skyes pa 'am/rtswa 'am/glang po 'am/bdag po yongs su gtong na/'di skad du kye sems can dag tshur
16a4('bum): sheg/bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bslang mi dgos par khyer cig/long la dengs shig ces brjod de/sbyin pa des sbyin pa byin nas/sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo //chos
16a5('bum): la skyabs su gtong ngo //dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo //la la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin du 'dzud do//la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye
16a6('bum): bar gnas par byed do//la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do//la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do//la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do//
16a7('bum): la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do//la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do//la la ni byams pa la 'god do//la la ni snying rje la 'god do//la la ni dga'
16b1('bum): bal 'god do//la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do//la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do//la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do//la la ni cu pa//
16b2('bum): zad med pa'i skye mched la 'god ngo do//la la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la 'god do//la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni chos
16b3('bum): rjes su dran po la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni
16b4('bum): gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni lus la mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i 'du shes su so sor brtag
16b5('bum): pa la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni yang dag par spong ba
16b6('bum): bzhi la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par
16b7('bum): skul lo//la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni stong pa nyid
17a1('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni mthar
17a2('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang
17a3('bum): dag par skul lo//la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag
17a4('bum): par skul lo//la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag
17a5('bum): par skul lo//la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
17a6('bum): 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni rang byang
17a7('bum): chub la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo//la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo//rab
17b1('bum): 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing thabs mkhas
17b2('bum): pas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
17b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin
17b4('bum): pa ste/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o//rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang /bshad pa dang /ma nor bar
17b5('bum): bstan pa ste/'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par
17b6('bum): shes pa lnga dang /gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang /thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o//rab 'byor byang
17b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las bskyod nas/thabs mkhas
18a1('bum): pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do//de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang /'phags pa'i chos rnams
18a2('bum): kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/'phags pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /
18a3('bum): stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
18a4('bum): pa rnams so//'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa
18a5('bum): nyid de/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes
18a6('bum): pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o//ngagra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o//bzod
18a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes
18b1('bum): pa'o//nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o//don dam
18b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
18b3('bum): nyid shes pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o///
18b4('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o//dran pa
18b5('bum): nye bar bzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o//dbang po lnga shes pa'o//stobs lnga shes pa'o//byang chub kyi
18b6('bum): yan lag bdun shes pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o//bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o//tshad med
18b7('bum): pa bzhi shes pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad shes pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
19a1('bum): shes pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa shes pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o//ting nge 'dzin/
19a2('bum): rnams shes pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
19a3('bum): shes pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'o//byams pa chen po shes pa'o//snying rje chen po shes pa'o//dga' ba chen po shes pa'o//cang snyoms
19a4('bum): chen po shes pa'o//gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang /'dus byas
19a5('bum): dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par/de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags
19a6('bum): pa'i chos so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
19a7('bum): spong ba ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
19b1('bum): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis
19b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/
19b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /de
19b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bye brag yod do//gsol pa/bye brag ji lta bu zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
19b5('bum): stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o//de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i
19b6('bum): phyir zhe na/gang la gnas shing /chos thams cad mun pa med pa thob pa la/byang chub sems dpa' sems kyang gzhan la/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
19b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/de la brten
20a1('bum): pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo //rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos
20a2('bum): kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no//rab
20a3('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
20a4('bum): dran pa nyo bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags
20a5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs
20a6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen
20a7('bum): po dang /mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/'di ni 'jig rten las 'das
20b1('bum): pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nang gi lus dang /phyi'i lus dang /phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
20b2('bum): brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//lus la kun 'byung ba'i
20b3('bum): rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//lus la kun 'byung ba dang /zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//lus la mi gnas par
20b4('bum): rnam par spyod cing /'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do//nang gi tshor ba dang /phyi'i tshor ba dang /phyi nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes
20b5('bum): bzhin dang ldan pa/dran pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//tshor ba la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam
20b6('bum): par spyod do//tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang /blud pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//tshor ba la mi gnas par rnam par
20b7('bum): spyod cing /'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do//nong gi sems dang /phyi'i sems dang /phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing /brtson 'grus can shes
21a1('bum): bzhin dang ldan pa/dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//sems la kun 'byung ba'i
21a2('bum): rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//sems la zad pa'i rjes su lto zhing rnam par spyod do//sems la kun 'byung ba dang /zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//sems la
21a3('bum): mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing /'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do//nang gi chos dang /phyi'i chos dang /phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus
21a4('bum): can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su
21a5('bum): lta zhing rnam par spyod do//chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//chos la kun 'byung ba dang /zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//chos la mi gnas par
21a6('bum): rnam par spyod cing /'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do//rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/sdig to mi dge ba'i tshus ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir
21a7('bum): mos pa bskyod pa dang /skyes pa rnam spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /skyes pa rnams
21b1('bum): 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang /bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o//rab 'byur rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong
21b2('bum): ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang
21b3('bum): ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o//dbang po lnga gang zhe na/dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang
21b4('bum): po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po ste/de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o//stobs lnga gang zhe na/dad pa'i stobs dang /brtson 'grus
21b5('bum): kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i stobs dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /shes rab kyi stobs te/de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/dran pa
21b6('bum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan log dang /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan
21b7('bum): lag dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan log dang /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /btong snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/de dag ni byang
22a1('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
22a2('bum): yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/
22a3('bum): de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o//de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon
22a4('bum): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/stong pa'i rnam pa dang /dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//
22a5('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//smon pa
22a6('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//rnam par thar pa
22a7('bum): brgyad gang zhe na/gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o//nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong
22b1('bum): ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o//bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa
22b2('bum): bzhi pa'o//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o//cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
22b3('bum): par thar pa drug pa'o//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o//'du shes dang /tsher ba 'gog pa la nye bar
22b4('bum): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/'di la la la
22b5('bum): 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye
22b6('bum): bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zho nas/nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa//
22b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gonyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /
23a1('bum): shes bzhin du btung snyoms su gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/tang snyoms
23a2('bum): pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang yid mi
23a3('bum): bde bsnga nas kyang nub pas bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/bsam gtan bzhi pa la rke bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de
23a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam ma
23a5('bum): mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'angs
23a6('bum): te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
23a7('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las
23b1('bum): yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las
23b2('bum): yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bor bsgrubs shing gnas te/'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o//de la mtho' dag gi skye
23b3('bum): mched bcu gang zhe na/mtha' dag sa dang /mtha' dag chu dang /mtha' dag me dang /mtha' dag rlung dang /mtha' dag sngon po dang /mtha' dag ser po dang /mtha' dag dmar po dang /
23b4('bum): mtha' dag dkar po dang /mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang /mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o//de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched
23b5('bum): brgyad gang zhe na/nang gzugs su 'du shes shing /phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang /kha dog sdug pa dang /kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes
23b6('bum): zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o//nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang /kha dog sdug
23b7('bum): pa dang /kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o//nang
24a1('bum): gzugs med par 'du shes shing /phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang /kha dog sdug pa dang /kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes
24a2('bum): zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing /phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang //
24a3('bum): kha dog sdug pa dang /kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched
24a4('bum): bzhi pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/kha dog sngon po/sngon por snang ba/mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/dper na me tog oM ma ko lta bu'am//
24a5('bum): yul ba ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/kha dog sngo ba/sngo bar snang ba/mdog sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /
24a6('bum): de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing /phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/kha dog ser po ser por snang ba/
24a7('bum): mdog ser po 'di lta ste/dper na shing ka shi ka ri'i me tog lta bu 'am/yul ba ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba/kha dog ser ba/ser bar snang ba mdog ser bar mthong
24b1('bum): yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes
24b2('bum): shing /phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/kha dog dmar po/dmar por snang ba mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/dper na man+da dzi ba ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/yul ba ra NA sir byas pa'i gos
24b3('bum): ltar dmar ba/kha dog dmar ba dmar bar snang ba mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil
24b4('bum): /gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing /phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/kha dog dkar po dkar por snang ba/mdog dkar po 'di lta ste/dper na
24b5('bum): skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/yul ba ra NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/kha dog dkar ba dkar bar snang ba/mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis
24b6('bum): mnan te shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o//de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/bsam gtan la
24b7('bum): gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa/sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
25a1('bum): gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o//smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/bsam gtan la gnas te/'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub
25a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa'am/shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas
25a3('bum): de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing shes bya de'ang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o//de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par
25a4('bum): shes pa dang /lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang /lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su
25a5('bum): dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/drug po de dag go//de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/lus yongs su dag pa
25a6('bum): dang /dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /sems yongs su dag pa dang /ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/bzhi po de dag go/de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/tshe la dbang ba dang
25a7('bum): sems la dbang ba dang /yo byad la dbang ba dang /las la dbang ba dang /skye ba la dbang ba dang /mos pa la dbang ba dang /smon lam la dbang ba dang /rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba
25b1('bum): dang /ye shes la dbang ba dang /chos la dbang ba ste/bcu po de dag go/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas
25b2('bum): la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//'das pa dang ma
25b3('bum): 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i las dang /las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang /rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//khams
25b4('bum): sna tshogs can dang khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyis mos pa sna tshogs dang /mos pa du ma
25b5('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang /tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te//
25b6('bum): kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge/
25b7('bum): 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//rnam pa du mar sngon gyi
26a1('bum): gnas rjes su dgongs te/tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/tshe rabs brgya dang /tshe rabs stong dang /tshe rabs brgya stong dang /tshe rabs bye ba khrag
26a2('bum): khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar du'ang rjes su dgongs so//bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/bskal pa brgya'i bar dang /bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang /bskal pa stong
26a3('bum): phrag du ma dang /bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go//
26a4('bum): ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to//rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to//rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to//zas ni 'di za za'o//yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so//tshe'i
26a5('bum): mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang
26a6('bum): bcas/sa mal dang bcas/gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so//lha'i mig rnam par dag po mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi
26a7('bum): 'pho ba dang /skye ba dag kyang gzigs so//kha dog sdug pa dang /mi sdug pa dang /bzang ba dang ngan pa dang /bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang /ngan song na 'khod pa dang /las ji
26b1('bum): lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/yid kyis ngan du spyod
26b2('bum): pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/log par lta ba dag ste/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o//sems
26b3('bum): can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'bogs pa la skur pa mi 'debs
26b4('bum): pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to//zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems
26b5('bum): rnam par grol ba dang /shes rab rnam par grol ba dang /zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so//rab
26b6('bum): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas
26b7('bum): so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar
27a1('bum): 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/bdag byed pa thob pa dang /bag tshab med pa thob pa dang /rma/
27a2('bum): 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bana'o//'khor gyi nang du sang ge'i sgra bsgrag go/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong
27a3('bum): ngam/bram ze'am lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/gzhan sus kyang rung ste/chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o//bdog zags
27a4('bum): pabazad do zhes dam bcas na/de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur te zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/bram ze'am lha 'am bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/skye dgu'i
27a5('bum): tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag por rjes su mi mthong ste/rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/dril
27a6('bum): bdag bde ba thob pa dang /bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod do/khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du se dga'i
27a7('bum): sgra bsgrag ga/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/gzhan sus kyang rung ste/chos dang ldan par bskor
27b1('bum): bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o//gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bsten na/bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/bla ma zla
27b2('bum): 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'amo/skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
27b3('bum): ste/rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/de lo bdag bde ba thob pa dang /bag chu ba med pa thob pa dang /mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas
27b4('bum): su ngam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/gzhan sus
27b5('bum): kyang rung ste/chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o//gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug
27b6('bum): bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'byung ngo zhes/dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am bdud dam/
27b7('bum): tshangs pa 'am/skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/rgyu yang dag par
28a1('bum): rjes su ma mthong bas/de la bdagra bde ba thob pa dang /bgra tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod do/khyu mchog rlabs po che'i
28a2('bum): gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/bram ze'am/lha'amo/bdud dom/tshangs pa 'am/
28a3('bum): gzhan su'ang rung ste/chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya bo ste/bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
28a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par
28a5('bum): rig pa dang /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/de dag kyang gang zhe na/don la dmigs pa dang /chos la dmigs pa dang /nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang //
28a6('bum): spobs pa la dmigs pa'o//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa
28a7('bum): ste/de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcabs par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi
28b1('bum): mdang ste/'di na bsrung ba med par dadabya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa /dbatsun gshegs pa la gas dge sbyong pa yongs su mdag
28b2('bum): pa mi mnga' bas/la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcabs par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o//de bzhin gshegs
28b3('bum): pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang brlabs
28b4('bum): par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/'di ni bsrung ba med pa gsum pa'o//de la de bzhi gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/de bzhin
28b5('bum): gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/la la rna ba btud du rim glor nyan cing /bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang /chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na'ang des de
28b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/yid bde bar mi 'gyur/thugs yang yang por mi 'gyur te/'di ni dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa dang po'o//la la rna ba btud de rim
28b7('bum): gror nyan cing /bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang /chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur
29a1('bum): mi bzod par mi 'gyur/thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/'di ni dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa gnyis pa'o//la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyan/
29a2('bum): pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/la la rna ba btud do rim gror mi nyan cing /bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/chos
29a3('bum): dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed kyang /des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te/thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen
29a4('bum): par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum pa'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/gang gis sangs
29a5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste/de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces
29a6('bum): bya'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi
29a7('bum): 'gyur ba yod kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu'ang mi mnga' ste/de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang
29b1('bum): zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan
29b2('bum): gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste/dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba
29b3('bum): gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa
29b4('bum): la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o//ca co mi mnga'o//dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o//'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o//thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o//ma brtags pa'i btang
29b5('bum): snyoms mi mnga'o//mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//ting nge 'dzin yongs su
29b6('bum): nyams pa mi mnga'o//shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//rnam par grol bu yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o//rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams
29b7('bum): pa mi mnga'o//sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ye shes kyi
30a1('bum): rjes su 'brang ngo //thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i
30a2('bum): ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa'o//da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes
30a3('bum): gzigs pa 'jug ste/de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/gang la dmigs pa
30a4('bum): med pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba/zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
30a5('bum): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/phyag dang zha bas 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang /zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang /phyog dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang /phyag
30a6('bum): dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /bdun shin tu mtho ba dang /sor mo ring ba dang /rting pa yangs pa dang /sku che zhing drang ba dang /zhabs legs par mtho ba dang /yan
30a7('bum): lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang /ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang /phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang /gsing ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang /gser gyi kha dog dang /
30b1('bum): mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang /s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /zhal mdzad spus brgyan pa dang /sang ga'i ro stong lta bu dang /phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang /phrag
30b2('bum): so shin tu rgyas pa dang /ro bro ba'i mchog dang /shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang /ljags shin tu yangs pa dang /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /seng
30b3('bum): ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang /tshems shin tu dkar ba dang /tshems mnyam pa dang /tshems thogs bzang ba dang /tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang /spyan dkor nag 'byes pa
30b4('bum): dang /ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su
30b5('bum): rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/rus pa 'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o//zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cang
30b6('bum): zhabs zhum pa mod pas/zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o//ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o//shing bal gyi be'u
30b7('bum): ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'dzem pa'o//phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas bdun shin tu mtho ba'o//phyag dang zhabs kyi
31a1('bum): sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o//rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o//sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o//pus mo'i lhang dang /mang /
31a2('bum): bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o//spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas/yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o//ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa dang /smyig ma
31a3('bum): dang zlum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rim gyis gzhil bar grub cing /byin pa zlum pas ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu'o//brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang /phyag gi
31a4('bum): mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o//glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/gsang
31a5('bum): ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o//shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gsar gyi kha dog go/gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms
31a6('bum): pa'i mdog tu 'dug la/sku la rdul mi 'go bas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o//shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su med pas/spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su
31a7('bum): 'khyil ba'o//me tog kun+da dang zla ba dang /'o ma dang /ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/nyi ma dang zla bo brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin
31b1('bum): tu brgyan pas/zhal mdzad spus brgyan pa'o//ra stod che bas seng ge'i ro stod do//mgur dang rgyud logs par 'brel cing lhun zlum pas/phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o//
31b2('bum): gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o//rlung dang /mkhris pa dang /bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med
31b3('bum): pas/ro bro ba'i mchog go/sku chu zhong 'dom gang du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'o//spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu
31b4('bum): mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o//me tog ut+pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu
31b5('bum): yangs shing srab pa'o//tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping+ga lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas/tshangs pa'i dbyangs so//'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes
31b6('bum): te/yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o//me tog kun+da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o//tshems la mtho doman
31b7('bum): med pas tshems mnyam pa'o//tshems la mtshams ma dod pas chems thags bzang ba'o//bla 'og dgye dgu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o//dkar nag gi
32a1('bum): tshe ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma yog pas spyan dkar nag 'byas pa'o//rdzi mtha 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings
32a2('bum): pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o//de la bla ma'i bsu bskyal dang /chos mnyan pa la sdod pa dang /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su bsgrub pa la sogs pa la phu drung du byas pas
32a3('bum): phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so//yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/de ni migayo zhing shin tu
32a4('bum): brtan pa'i snga ltas so//sbyin pa dang /ngag snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa ste/de ni
32a5('bum): myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so//bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba phyin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/
32a6('bum): gaganyis ni bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung bzhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i sta ltas so//btsongs pa bkrol ba dang srog gi rim gro byas pa dang /srog gcod pa spangs pas
32a7('bum): sor mo ring ba dang /rting pa yangs pa dang /sku che zhing drang ba ste/de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so//dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang /bzung ba mngon par spel zhing
32b1('bum): 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang /yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/de ni mi nyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so//rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas
32b2('bum): shing gzhan byin pa dang /bdag gis blangs pas ri dgas e ne yaM'i byin pa lta bu ste/de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so//bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na mi 'gong bar
32b3('bum): gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so//grogs po dang mdza' bshes dang gnyen pa ma phye ba dang /bye
32b4('bum): bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang /gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/de ni bu
32b5('bum): mang po'i snga ltas so//stan dang gos dang /khang pa dang /gzhal med khang dang gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang /mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/de gnyis ni gdan
32b6('bum): dang /na bza' dang /khang pa dang /gzhal med khang dang /gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so//'du 'dzi spangs pa dang /mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /pha ma dang phu nu la sogs
32b7('bum): pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gror byas pa dang /btsun par byas pa dang /bcol ba rna la ma gzan pas s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /zhal mdzod spus
33a1('bum): brgyan pa ste/de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so//mi snyan par mi zer zhing mi smod la snyan par smra zhing /legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ro
33a2('bum): stod lta bu dang /phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so//na ba rnams la rtsi dang /rim gro dang /sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang /
33a3('bum): rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang /ro bro ba'i mchog ste/de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so//skyed mos tshal dang /'khor dang /btung ba dang /rdzing bu dang /rgal dka'
33a4('bum): ba'i zam pa dang /kha zas dang /'phreng ba'i gnas dang /stegs dang /gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing /bdag gis gzhan
33a5('bum): byin pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zhing gab pa dang /dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/de ni mnga' bo chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so//yu na ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang /nyams
33a6('bum): su bde bar smras pas ljags shin tu yangs shing sleb pa dang /tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so//gsung yan
33a7('bum): lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing /rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang /mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang /zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba
33b1('bum): dang /btang mi bri zhing rnar snyan pa dang /ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o//yun ring po nas tshig bkyil pa spangs shing dus su sgra sla bas/seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/do ni chag kur gyis
33b2('bum): mnyan pa'i snga ltas so//rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'che ba yongs su dag pas/tshems shin tu da//ra ba dang mnyam pa ste/de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas
33b3('bum): so//yun ring po nas bden zhing phra mo med pa'i tshe mas smra smra bas tshe mas thags bzang ba dang /tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu chang ba ste/de ni 'khor dbyer mi byed pa'i snga ltas so//pang
33b4('bum): gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la/ma chags mi sdang ba dang /rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas/spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/de ni kun
33b5('bum): nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so//rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang
33b6('bum): zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
33b7('bum): 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan po dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
