34a1('bum): ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/sen mo mtho ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/sor me zlum pa yin//
34a2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu chags pa ste/sor mo rgyas pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/sor
34a3('bum): mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang /gsung dang sku'i 'phrin las dang /'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/rtsa mi mngon pa yin/sangs
34a4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'brel pa ste/rtswa la mdud pa med pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba
34a5('bum): ste/long bu mi mngon pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom
34a6('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge skye/seng ge'i 'bros su bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/sangs
34a7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ngang pa'i stobs su bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu
34b1('bum): mchog ste/khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom
34b2('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/mdzes par bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/
34b3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/sku shin tu legs pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams
34b4('bum): shin tu sbyangs pa ste/sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
34b5('bum): 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thug so gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/
34b6('bum): sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
34b7('bum): 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/
35a1('bum): sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/sku legs par mnyam pa yin/
35a2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs
35a3('bum): mnga' ba ste/sku zhum pa med pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
35a4('bum): 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang /
35a5('bum): nying lag legs par ston pa ste/yan lag dang nying lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/snang ba ba
35a6('bum): rib med cing /rnam par dag pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/phyal zlum pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
35a7('bum): rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/phyal
35b1('bum): mnom pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/phyal phyim mer 'dug pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab ma
35b2('bum): shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/lte ba zab pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun por 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/sangs
35b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/kun nas mdzes pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ba
35b4('bum): dang ldan pa ste/kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/sku la sme ba med pa yin//
35b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
35b6('bum): ni rang gi skye ba dang /skye bo pha la la byams pas dge sbyor chen po brnyes pa ste/phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan
35b7('bum): par bzhugos pa ste/phyog gi ri mo thob pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom
36a1('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/zhal hi cang mi ring ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan
36a2('bum): 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste/zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ljags
36a3('bum): shin tu 'jam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ljags shin tu srab pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
36a4('bum): byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag dka' ba ste/ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug
36a5('bum): gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang /nyams su bde bar
36a6('bum): smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/snyan cing 'jam pa dang /nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste//
36a7('bum): tshechoms mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
36b1('bum): rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/tshoms mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/tshoms mtsho
36b2('bum): ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/sangs rgyas
36b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang
36b4('bum): ma mnga' ba ste/shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas
36b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/spyan rnam par dag pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste//
36b6('bum): rdzi ma sdug pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang /skyes bu dang /na chung mchog mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis
36b7('bum): mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/smin ma ring
37a1('bum): ba dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/smon ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
37a2('bum): 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snum par gyur
37a3('bum): pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/snyan legs shing
37a4('bum): snyan shal ring ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/snyan mnyam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
37a5('bum): sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang
37a6('bum): ba ste/zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan
37a7('bum): pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba
37b1('bum): rnam par bzlog pa ste/dbu bung bltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ /
37b2('bum): sdug pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa skye/dbu 'jam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu
37b3('bum): mi 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/dbu mi 'jing ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/dbu mi rngub pa yin/sangs rgyas
37b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/dbu dri zhim pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal
37b5('bum): gyi be'u dang /bkra shis dang /dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin te/rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang
37b6('bum): po brgyad cu'o//rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang /bstan pa dang /yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten lngas 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya
37b7('bum): ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
38a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis
38a2('bum): brgya brgyad cu pa//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
38a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
38a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag
38a5('bum): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos
38a6('bum): thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
38a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa
38b1('bum): de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang
38b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bya bas sems can rnams sdud do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams
38b3('bum): sdud pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
38b4('bum): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams
38b5('bum): sdud do//rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang /rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
38b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'doms shing 'di skad ston to//rigs kyi bu khyed tshur
38b7('bum): sheg/yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig/
39a1('bum): yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/yi ge gnyis kyis byung ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/yi ge bzhi bcu/
39a2('bum): rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig
39a3('bum): 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa
39a4('bum): yin/yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin
39a5('bum): te/de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/la la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin
39a6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang /yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/de la chos la mkhas pa dang /yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge
39a7('bum): mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang /rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang 'bral ba'ang ma yin te/rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo
39b1('bum): mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
39b2('bum): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs/chos kyang mi dmigs/chos
39b3('bum): kyi dngos po'ang mi dmigs pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
39b4('bum): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi
39b5('bum): dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi la
39b6('bum): spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /mthar
39b7('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /
40a1('bum): snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing /rnam par
40a2('bum): smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/sems can du gdags pa'ang mi
40a3('bum): dmigs so//sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas
40a4('bum): 'du shes dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas 'du byed dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis
40a5('bum): so//sems can mi dmigs pas mig dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas sna dmigs su
40a6('bum): ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas lce dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas lus dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas
40a7('bum): yid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas sgra dmigs su ma mchis so//sems
40b1('bum): can mi dmigs pas dri dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas ro dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas reg dmigs su ma mchis so//sems
40b2('bum): can mi dmigs pas chos dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba'i rnam
40b3('bum): par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs
40b4('bum): su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis
40b5('bum): so//sems can mi dmigs pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi
40b6('bum): dmigs pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas lus kyi
40b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
41a1('bum): gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems nan mi dmigs/
41a2('bum): pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi
41a3('bum): dmigs pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so///
41a4('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas sa'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas chu'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas me'i
41a5('bum): khams dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rlung gi khams dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas nam mkha'i khams dmigs su ma
41a6('bum): mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas ma rig pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems
41a7('bum): can mi dmigs pas 'du byed dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas ming dang
41b1('bum): gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas skye mched drug dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems
41b2('bum): can mi dmigs pas tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas sred pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas len pa dmigs su ma mchis so///
41b3('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas srid pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas skye ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rga shi dmigs su ma mchis
41b4('bum): so//sems can mi dmigs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so//
41b5('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so//
41b6('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so//
41b7('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can ma dmigs pas
42a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas chen

42a3('bum): nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas mtha' laso 'das pa stong
42a4('bum): pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
42a5('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su ma

42a7('bum): so//sems can mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can
42b1('bum): mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi
42b2('bum): dmigs pas yang dag par spong ba dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas dbang
42b3('bum): po lnga dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas stobs lnga dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su ma mchis so///
42b4('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems
42b5('bum): can mi dmigs pas bsam gtan dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas tshad med pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs med pa'i

42b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi
43a1('bum): dmigs pas smon pa med pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas mngon par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can ni dmigs
43a2('bum): pas ting nge 'dzin dmigs su mi mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas gzungs kyi sgro dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
43a3('bum): stobs bcu dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas so so yang dag par rig
43a4('bum): pa bzhi dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas byams pa chen po dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas snying rje chen po dmigs su ma mchis
43a5('bum): so//sems can mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su ma
43a6('bum): mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su ma mchis
43a7('bum): so//sems can mi dmigs pas dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rang byang chub dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs
43b1('bum): pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas
43b2('bum): mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can dmigs su ma mchis
43b3('bum): pa la ni sems can ma mchis so//gzugs ma mchis so//tshor ba ma mchis so//'du shes ma mchis so//'du byed ma mchis so//rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//mig
43b4('bum): ma mchis so//rna ba ma mchis so//sna ma mchis so//lce ma mchis so//lus ma mchis so//yid ma mchis so//gzugs ma mchis so//sku ma mchis so//dri ma mchis
43b5('bum): so||ro ma mchis so//reg ma mchis so//chos ma mchis so//mig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//sna'i rnam par shes pa ma
43b6('bum): mchis so//lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//rna
43b7('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma
44a1('bum): mchis so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar
44a2('bum): ba ma mchis so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so//yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma
44a3('bum): mchis so//sa'i khams ma mchis so//chu'i khams ma mchis so//me'i khams ma mchis so//rlung gi khams ma mchis so//nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so//rnam par
44a4('bum): shes pa'i khams ma mchis so//ma rig pa ma mchis so//'du byed ma mchis so//rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//ming dang gzugs ma mchis so//skye mched drug ma
44a5('bum): mchis so//reg pa ma mchis so//tshor ba ma mchis so//srid pa ma mchis so//len pa ma mchis so//srid pa ma mchis so//skye ba ma mchis so//rga shi ma mchis
44a6('bum): so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

44b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so//don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis
44b2('bum): so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis
44b3('bum): so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//
44b4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis so//

45a1('bum): pa nyid ma mchis so//mtshan ma med pa ma mchis so//smon pa med pa ma mchis so//mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so//ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis
