45a3('bum): byams pa chen po ma mchis so//snying rje chen po ma mchis so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so//lan cig
45a4('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so//dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so//rang byang chub ma mchis so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma
45a5('bum): mchis so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma mchis so//mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so//dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na//
45a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/byang chub
45a7('bum): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga las mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin
45b1('bum): no//rab 'byor de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig
45b2('bum): par bya'o//chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//mtha'
45b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//dror po med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//chos
45b4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//ngo bo
45b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//skye mched stong pa
45b6('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//sems can stong pa nyid du
45b7('bum): rig par bya'o//srog stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//'gro ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//gso ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//skyes bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//gang zag stong pa
46a1('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o//shod can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//shod bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//byed pa pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//byed du 'jug pa po stong
46a2('bum): pa nyid du rig par bya'o//slong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//kun nas skyong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//tshor ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//tshor bar byed pa po stong pa
46a3('bum): nyid du rig par bya'o//shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//mthong ba ngo stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//yang dag par spong
46a4('bum): ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//dbang po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//stobs stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//byang chub kyi yan lag
46a5('bum): stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//bsam gtan stong pa nyid du
46a6('bum): rig par bya'o//tshad med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par
46a7('bum): bya'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa stong pa nyid
46b1('bum): du rig par bya'o//mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
46b2('bum): stobs bcu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//byams pa chen po stong pa nyid
46b3('bum): du rig par bya'o//snying rje chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig
46b4('bum): par bya'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rang
46b5('bum): byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong
46b6('bum): pa nyid du rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
46b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams lo chos ston to//ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la'ang mi 'jug
47a1('bum): pa de ltar ston to//des de ltar mthong nas/chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed/gnyis su mi byed do//yang dag pa ji lta//
47a2('bum): ba bzhin du'ang ston pa byed do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing /sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
47a3('bum): phyin pa la sbyor/la lo tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/la la bsam gtan
47a4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/la la bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor/la la tshad med pa bzhi la sbyor/la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms
47a5('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/la la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la sbyor/la la yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyor/la la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyor/la la dbang po lnga la sbyor/
47a6('bum): la la stobs lnga la sbyor/la la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyor/la la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor/la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sbyor/la la
47a7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyor/lo la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor/la la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
47b1('bum): med pa la sbyor/la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sbyor/la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la
47b2('bum): sbyor/la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor/la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor/la la byams pa chen po la sbyor/la la snying rje chen po la sbyor/la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma/
47b3('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/la la dgra bcom pa nyid
47b4('bum): la sbyor/la la rang byang chub la sbyor/la la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sbyor/la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sprul pa des
47b5('bum): chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
47b6('bum): dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams la chos ston te/de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ma bcings ma grol ba'i
47b7('bum): tshul du/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs mo bcings ma grol ba/tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/'du shes ma bcings
48a1('bum): ma grol ba/'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/mig ma bcings ma grol ba/rna ba ma bcings ma grol ba/sna ma bcings ma
48a2('bum): grol ba/lce ma bcings ma grol ba/lus ma bcings ma grol ba/yid ma bcings ma grol ba/gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/sgra ma bcings ma grol ba/dri ma bcings ma grol
48a3('bum): ba/ro ma bcings ma grol ba/reg ma bcings ma grol ba/chos ma bcings ma grol ba/mig gi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol
48a4('bum): ba/sna'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma
48a5('bum): bcings ma grol ba/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/lce'i 'dus te reg paste//
48a6('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma
48a7('bum): grol ba/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
48b1('bum): bam bcings ma grol ba/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/sa'i khams ma bcings ma
48b2('bum): grol ba/chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/me'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/rlung gi khams ma bcings ma grol ba/nam mkha'i khams ma bcangs ma grol ba/rnam par shes pa'i
48b3('bum): khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol ba/'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ming dang gzugs ma bcings ma grol
48b4('bum): ba/skye mched drug ma bcings ma grol ba/reg pa ma bcings ma grol po/tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/sred pa ma bcings ma grol ba/le nA ba ma bcings ma grol ba/srid pa
48b5('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba/skye ba ma bcings ma grol ba/rga shi ma bcings ma grol ba/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings
48b6('bum): ma grol ba/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol
48b7('bum): ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mo bcings ma grol ba/nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba//
49a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings
49a2('bum): ma grol ba/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/dor
49a3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma
49a4('bum): bcings ma grol ba/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/dngos po med
49a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/yang dag par spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
49a6('bum): rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/'phags
49a7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bcings ma grol ba/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/bsam gtan rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/tshad med pa rnams ma
49b1('bum): bcings ma grol ba/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/rnam par thar pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
49b2('bum): pa dgu ma bcings ma grol ba/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ma bcings ma grol ba/mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol
49b3('bum): ba/ting nge 'dzin rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma bcings ma grol ba/mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma bcings
49b4('bum): ma grol ba/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba/byams pa chen po ma bcings ma grol ba/snying rje chen po ma bcings ma grol ba/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
49b5('bum): pa bco brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma
49b6('bum): bcings ma grol ba/dgra bcom pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/rang byang chub ma bcings ma grol ba/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
49b7('bum): pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba ste/gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no//tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no///
50a1('bum): 'du shes kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no//'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no//rnam par shes
50a2('bum): pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no//mig gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig ma yin no//rna ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid
50a3('bum): gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no//sna'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna ma yin no//lce'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lha ma yin no//lus kyi ma bcings
50a4('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus ma yin no//yid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid ma yin no//gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs
50a5('bum): ma yin no//sgra'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no//dri'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dri ma yin no//ro'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ro/
50a6('bum): ma yin no//reg gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg ma yin no//chos kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos ma yin no//mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
50a7('bum): ma bcings ra grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma
50b1('bum): yin no//sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no//lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de /
50b2('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yin no//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol
50b3('bum): ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te reg
50b4('bum): pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//lce'i 'dus
50b5('bum): te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lho'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//
50b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
50b7('bum): pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings mo grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor rab
51a1('bum): ma yin na//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//lha'i 'dus
51a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mi bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings
51a3('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yid kyi
51a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no//sa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no//chu'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
51a5('bum): yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no//me'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de me'i khams ma yin no//rlung gi khams kyi ma bcingasna ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de
51a6('bum): rlung gi khams ma yin no//nam mkha'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de nam mkha'i khams ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol
51a7('bum): ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no//ma rig pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no//'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba//
51b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no//ming dang gzugs kyi ma bcings ma la pa nyid gang
51b2('bum): yin pa de ming dang gzugs ma yin no//skye mched drug gi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no//reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa 'i
51b3('bum): pa ma yin no//tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no//sred pa'i ma bcings ma grul ba nyid glang yin pa de sred pa ma yin no//len pa'i ma bcings ma
51b4('bum): grol ba nyid gang yin pa de len pa ma yin no//srid pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no//skye ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no//
51b5('bum): rga shi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshul
51b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol bya nyid gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcing snyom grol ba nyid gang yin
51b7('bum): po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//bsam gtan
52a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pang bsnam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin na//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol brjod/
52a2('bum): gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol
52a3('bum): ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings
52a4('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no//don dam pa stong pa nyid
52a5('bum): kye ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma btsongs ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no//
52a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yinapa
52a7('bum): de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//dor ba
52b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/
52b2('bum): no//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de
52b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma
52b4('bum): bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//dngos po med
52b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
52b6('bum): pa de dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin no//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
52b7('bum): rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no//dbang po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no//stobs
53a1('bum): rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan
53a2('bum): lag rnams ma yin no//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no//'phags pa'i bden
53a3('bum): pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no//bsam gtan rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam gtan
53a4('bum): rnams ma yin no//tshad med pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshad med pa rnams ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma bcings
53a5('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no//rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa brgyad
53a6('bum): ma yin no//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no//rnam par
53a7('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang //
53b1('bum): smon pa med pa ma yin no//mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba
53b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
53b3('bum): bcu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no//mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no//
53b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no//byams pa chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byams
53b5('bum): pa chen po ma yin no//snying rje chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
53b6('bum): pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no//lan cig phyir
53b7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyir mi 'ong
54a1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no//dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no//rang byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang
54a2('bum): yin pa de rang byang chub ma yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
54a3('bum): pa'i byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag
54a4('bum): pa'o//tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//'du shes ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//'du byed ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
54a5('bum): mig ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rna ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sna ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//lce ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//lus ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
54a6('bum): yid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sgra ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//dri ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//ro ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o///
54a7('bum): reg ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//chos ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par
54b1('bum): dag pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//kye'i rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o///
54b2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg
54b3('bum): pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag
54b4('bum): pa'o/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa las
54b5('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par
54b6('bum): dag pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sa'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//chu'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//me'i
54b7('bum): khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rlung gi khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//nam mkha'i khams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams ni shin tu rnam
55a1('bum): par dag pa'o//ma rig pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//'du byed ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//ming dang gzugs
55a2('bum): ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//skye mched drug ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sred pa ni shin tu rnam par
55a3('bum): dag pa'o//len pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//srid pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//skye ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rga shi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha
55a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//brtson
55a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag
55a6('bum): pa'o//nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin
55a7('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
55b1('bum): sa rgyas nga ba dzin shin rnas dag go// las sa pa dung da na kun d+ha ma parnyan /gas da mamadu rtan ston nam sna da pak+sha/
55b2('bum): yod pastong ba nyid ni gnanam par dU d+hA // zhin byung brjin shin tunam smin dag /sa rnams dang byung ba nyid ni shin rnam par da g+sa/
55b3('bum): na pa//maud sa pa kyang ba rji ni shin rnam 'o//ngas pa nga rnam
55b4('bum): rnam par drug/9/rdzu 'phrul sbyid pa rnams ni sprin d+ha rnam par dag pa'i//dbang gi ldan shin rnarnam par dag pa'o//skyengs ldan shin tu rnam par dge ba'i/
55b5('bum): na shin rnarnam par dag sh+tha/'jigs pa'i lam yin lag brgyad pa na shAn rnam par /'phags pa'i 'dren pa rnams shin turnam par dag s+ho//bsam
55b6('bum): rnamasan shin tu rnam par da pa 'o//tshang med pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rnam par
56a1('bum): brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
56a2('bum): med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//gzungs
56a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//so so yang dag par
56a4('bum): rig pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//byams pa chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//snying rje chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
56a5('bum): ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
56a6('bum): bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rang byang chub ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par
56a7('bum): dag pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
56b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la de mi gnas pa'i tshul
56b2('bum): gyis gnas te/gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /tshar ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /'du shes stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas
56b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mig stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rna ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /sna stong pa nyid mi gnas
56b4('bum): pa'i tshul dang /lce stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /lus stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /yid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
56b5('bum): tshul dang /sgra stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /dri stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /ro stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /reg stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /chos stong
56b6('bum): pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa
56b7('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /yid kyi rnam par
57a1('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
57a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
57a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
57a4('bum): ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas
57a5('bum): pa'i tshul dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
57a6('bum): sa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /chu'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /me'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rlung gi khams stong pa
57a7('bum): nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mi rig pa stong pa nyid
57b1('bum): mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
57b2('bum): skye mched drug stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /sred pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
57b3('bum): len pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /srid pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /skye ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rga shi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /sbyin
57b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
57b5('bum): tshul dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
57b6('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /phyi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /stong pa nyid stong
57b7('bum): pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
58a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi gonas pa'i tshul dang /
58a2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
58a3('bum): mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
58a4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
58a5('bum): dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /dbang po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /stobs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
58a6('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /bsam
58a7('bum): gtan stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /tshad med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rnam
58b1('bum): par thar pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
58b2('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
58b3('bum): stobs bcu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /byams pa chen
58b4('bum): po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rgyun tu zhugs
58b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
58b6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rang byang chub stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rnam pa thams
58b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ni gang yang gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang
59a1('bum): la gnas par bya ba de lta bu ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so//rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so//gzhan gyi dngos po la
59a2('bum): gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la'ang mi gnas so//rab 'byor de ltar na
59a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de rab 'byor shes rab kyi
59a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
59a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang /'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /byang chub
59a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid de rjes su rtogs te/chos nyid de rjes su rtogs nas kyang sems can
59a7('bum): rnams la chos ston te/de la'ang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'do'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do//de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha'
59b1('bum): ni 'da' ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam pa nyis brgya rtsa
59b2('bum): gcig pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis/de bzhin nyid dang
59b3('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis na ci lags/'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
59b4('bum): lags sam/tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/'du shes kyang gzhan la/chos kyi
59b5('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/'du byed kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan//
59b6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
59b7('bum): lags sam/mig kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rna ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi
60a1('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/sna'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid
60a2('bum): kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/lce'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
60a3('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/lus kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/yid kyang
60a4('bum): gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/gzugs kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang
60a5('bum): gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/sgra'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhano//yang dag
60a6('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/dri'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/
60a7('bum): ro'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/reg kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang
60b1('bum): gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/chos kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
60b2('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
60b3('bum): zhig lags sam/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/sna'i rnam
60b4('bum): par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/
60b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
60b6('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
60b7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
61a1('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
61a2('bum): zhig lags sam/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/lce'i
61a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan
61a4('bum): la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
61a5('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang
61a6('bum): gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang
61a7('bum): gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
61b1('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid
61b2('bum): kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan//
61b3('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
61b4('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags
61b5('bum): s+ya ma/chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/me'i khams kyang gzhan la/
61b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rlung gi khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin
61b7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
62a1('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i
62a2('bum): mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ma rig pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam//
62a3('bum): 'du byed kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos
62a4('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de
62a5('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/skye mched drug kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
62a6('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/
62a7('bum): tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/sred pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
62b1('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/len pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan//
62b2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/srid pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags
62b3('bum): sam/skye ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rga shi'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
62b4('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin
62b5('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
62b6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha'
62b7('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
63a1('bum): lags sam/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
63a2('bum): lags sam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/nang stong
63a3('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
63a4('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang
63a5('bum): gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyangs kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha'
63a6('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/
63a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
63b1('bum): gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
63b2('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin
63b3('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
63b4('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
63b5('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/
63b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rang gi mtshan nyid
63b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
64a1('bum): gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
64a2('bum): la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
64a3('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid
64a4('bum): kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang
64a5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
64a6('bum): zhig lags sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhino nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/dbang
64a7('bum): po rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi
64b1('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin
64b2('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan//
64b3('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
64b4('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/tshad med
64b5('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
64b6('bum): kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings/
64b7('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
65a1('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
65a2('bum): med pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos
65a3('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin
65a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
65a5('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha'
65a6('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam//
65a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/byams pa chen po'
65b1('bum): gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/snying rje chen po'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan//
65b2('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid
65b3('bum): kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha'
65b4('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags
65b5('bum): sam/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang
65b6('bum): gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan//
65b7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
66a1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
66a2('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gzugs kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid
66a3('bum): kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa
66a4('bum): ma yin no//'du shes kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//'du byed kyang gzhan la//
66a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhon/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin
66a6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rab 'byor mig kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha'
66a7('bum): yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rna ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//sna'ang gzhan
66b1('bum): la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//lce'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan//
66b2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//lus kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//yid kyang
66b3('bum): gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rab 'byor gzugs kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de
66b4('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//sgra'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
66b5('bum): pa ma yin no//dri'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//ro'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang
66b6('bum): gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//reg kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i
66b7('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//chos kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rab 'byor
67a1('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rna ba'i rnam par
67a2('bum): shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos
67a3('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan le/chos kyi dbyings kyang gnan de bzhin
67a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gnan pa ma yin no//lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
67a5('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
67a6('bum): ma yin no//rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//
67a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gnan la/chos
67b1('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang
67b2('bum): gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
67b3('bum): gzhan pa ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rab 'byor mig/
67b4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rna ba'i 'dus te
67b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
67b6('bum): tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan
67b7('bum): la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi
68a1('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi
68a2('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rab 'byor sa'i khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin
68a3('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i
68a4('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//me'i khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//
68a5('bum): rlung gi khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan
68a6('bum): la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
68a7('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rab 'byor ma rig pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin
68b1('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//'du byed kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
68b2('bum): pa ma yin no//rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//ming dang gzugs kyang
68b3('bum): gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//skye mched drug kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan//
68b4('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//reg pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
68b5('bum): gzhan pa ma yin no//tshor ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//sred pa'ang gzhan la/
68b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//len pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang
68b7('bum): gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//srid pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma
69a1('bum): yin no//skye ba'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rga shi'ang gzhan la/chos kyi
69a2('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid
69a3('bum): kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i
69a4('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin
69a5('bum): no//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//bsam gtan gyi pha
69a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan lnga/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
69a7('bum): gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhano/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang
69b1('bum): gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'o//
69b2('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//stong pa nyid
69b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
69b4('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang
69b5('bum): gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha'
69b6('bum): yang gzhan pa ma yin no//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//

70a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
70a2('bum): kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi
70a3('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
70a4('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang
70a5('bum): gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
70a6('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
70a7('bum): gzhan pa ma yin no//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//dngos
70b1('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
70b2('bum): rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//yang dag par sbyong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/chos
70b3('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de
70b4('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
70b5('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no///
70b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//'phags pa'i lam
70b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

71a3('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin
71a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
71a5('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i
71a6('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid

71b5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//byams pa chen po'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan

76a1('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang

76a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/thog ma dang tha ma
76a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
76a6('bum): la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
76a7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan//
76b1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
76b2('bum): pa ma lags/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/dngos po med pa
76b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi
76b4('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan//
76b5('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
76b6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
76b7('bum): gzhan pa ma lags/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/dbang
77a1('bum): po rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/stobs rnams kyang gzhan
77a2('bum): la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
77a3('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhon/de
77a4('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
77a5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
77a6('bum): gzhan pa ma lags/tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/gzugs
77a7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/rnam par thar
77b1('bum): pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
77b2('bum): dgu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/rnam par thar pa'i ni stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
77b3('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang
77b4('bum): gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang
77b5('bum): gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan//
77b6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha'
77b7('bum): yang gzhan pa ma lags/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/so
78a1('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/byams
78a2('bum): pa chen po'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/snying rje chen po'ang gzhan la/chos
78a3('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/chos kyi
78a4('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang bzhan
78a5('bum): la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings
78a6('bum): kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin/
78a7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag
78b1('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/lam
78b2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
78b3('bum): kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags na/'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod
78b4('bum): cing /nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten/dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin
78b5('bum): pa dkar po ni/lha dang mi dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag ni/bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba/mi gnag cing dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam
78b6('bum): par smin pa mi gnag cing /dkar ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang
78b7('bum): byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa
79a1('bum): tshad mar byas te/'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan gyi/don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos
79a2('bum): de ni rnam par brtag tu med pa/brjod du med pa/tha snyad med pa ste/'di ltar ming bden pa dang /gzugs bden pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon
79a3('bum): mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ste/'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal
79a4('bum): te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi/don dam pa'i bden par ma lags na/byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun du
79a5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /ngagra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
79a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa'am/don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/gal
79a7('bum): te shes na ni de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam
79b1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgad par 'gyur na/rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang med/lam rnam par dgod pa la med/lam bsgom
79b2('bum): pa'ang med par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod par lta ga las 'ong /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang yod/lam bsgom pa'ang yod pas
79b3('bum): na/de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu thob pa 'am/'bras bu
79b4('bum): 'thob par bgyi ba ma mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/'bras bu 'thob par bya ba med
79b5('bum): do//rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa med de/lam gyis 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba'ang med do//lam la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thob par mi 'gyur
79b6('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par
79b7('bum): dgod pa byed de/'dus byas kyi khams sam/'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa mi byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar
80a1('bum): 'dus byas kyi khams sam/'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum
80a2('bum): spangs pas/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /gnod sems bsrabs pas/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu
80a3('bum): sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do//gang ci'ang rung ste kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams
80a4('bum): cod 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes
80a5('bum): gsungs na/bcom ldan 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa ma mchis na/gsungs pa'i don de bdag
80a6('bum): gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong
80a7('bum): ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/gsol
80b1('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o//bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la
80b2('bum): ris su bcad pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am//
80b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/de'i tshe 'dus byas she'am/'dus
80b4('bum): ma byas zhes chos gang la'ang ris su gcod pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
80b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa
80b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
80b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
81a1('bum): mau dmags pa sna dang /dngos po meng pa snang pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid snong pa r+g+ga dang /dngas pa med pa'i ngag nyid spyod pa nyid nye bar brdung /sem
81a2('bum): can rnams la ris su bcad pas chos mi ston to//de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/brtson
