81a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan dang po 'am/bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/bsam
81a4('bum): gtan gsum pa 'am/bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/byams pa'am/snying rje 'am/dga' ba 'am/bat+tad snyoms sam/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug
81a5('bum): pa 'am/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi rloms par 'jug pa'am/'du shes mdo 'du shes med min skye mchod
81a6('bum): kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang drag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs
81a7('bum): rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/lam mam/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med
81b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
81b2('bum): med pa 'am/mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so/
81b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/thams cad shes pa nyid dam/lam gyi rnam pa shes
81b4('bum): pa nyid dam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do//de mngon par zhen pa med pas gang la'ang chags pa med do//'di ltar dper na/de
81b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med do//sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad
81b6('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba
81b7('bum): med de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du tshul khrims srung ngo /bzod pa sgom yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/bzod pa'i 'bras
82a1('bum): bu nyams su myong ba med de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du bzod pa sgom mo//brtson 'grus rtsom yang brtson 'grus
82a2('bum): kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo///
82a3('bum): bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug kyang /bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad
82a4('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/shes rab bsgom yang shes rab kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/shes rab kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba
82a5('bum): med de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du shes rab sgom mo//zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams bsgom yang /
82a6('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa mod pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/gzhan
82a7('bum): du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo//'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das
82b1('bum): pa'i chos rnams bsgom yang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu
82b2('bum): nyams su myong ba med de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom mo//'dus
82b3('bum): byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bsgom yang /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su
82b4('bum): myong ba med de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
82b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
82b6('bum): pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /chos thams cad la spyod de/chos gang la'ang gnas pa'am/chags pa med do//de ci'i
82b7('bum): phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phragra brgya pa las/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mngon par
83a1('bum): bsgrub pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/drug cu gsum pa'o///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya
83a2('bum): gya gnyis pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
83a3('bum): pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug la yongs
83a4('bum): su spyod pa med do//bag la nyal ba dang /kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag
83a5('bum): pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do//tshor ba
83a6('bum): la yongs su spyod pa med do//'du shes la yongs su spyod pa med do//'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do//rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//mig la yongs
83a7('bum): su spyod pa med do//rna ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//sna la yongs su spyod pa med do//lce la yongs su spyod pa med do//lus la yongs su spyod pa med do//yid la yongs
83b1('bum): su spyod pa med do//gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do//sgra la yongs su spyod pa med do//dri la yongs su spyod pa med do//ro la yongs su spyod pa med do//reg la yongs su spyod
83b2('bum): pa med do//chos la yongs su spyod pa med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//sna'i rnam par shes
83b3('bum): pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//lde'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs
83b4('bum): su spyod pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//
83b5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg
83b6('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg po las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su
83b7('bum): spyod pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//yid kyi 'dus
84a1('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//sa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do//chu'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do//me'i khams/
84a2('bum): la yongs su spyod pa med do//rlung gi khams la yongs su spyod pa med do//nam mkha'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med
84a3('bum): do/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do//rnam par shes pa la yongs su
84a4('bum): spyod pa med do//ming dang gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do//skye mched drug la yongs su spyod pa med do//reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa
84a5('bum): med do//sred pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//len pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//srid pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//skye ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//rga shi la
84a6('bum): yongs su spyod pa med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
84a7('bum): pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//shes rab
84b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa
84b2('bum): med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//'dus byas stong
84b3('bum): pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//mtho' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa
84b4('bum): stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid
84b5('bum): la yongs su spyod pa med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
84b6('bum): yongs su spyod pa med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
84b7('bum): la yongs su spyod pa med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//dbang po rnams la yongs su
85a1('bum): spyod pa med do//stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
85a2('bum): la yongs su spyod pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//tshad med pa rnams la yongs su
85a3('bum): spyod pa med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//rnam par thar pa brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i
85a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su spyod pa med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med po la yongs su spyod pa med do//mngon
85a5('bum): par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//de bzhin gshegs
85a6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su spyod po med do//mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su spyod po med do//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa med do//byams
85a7('bum): pa chen po la yongs su spyod pa med do//snying rje chen po la yongs su spyod pa med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do//rgyun du
85b1('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do//dgra bcom pa
85b2('bum): nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa med do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su
85b3('bum): spyod pa med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
85b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs par
85b5('bum): yang mi 'byur/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na'ang mi gda' na lam bsgom du ci mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam
85b6('bum): du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na
85b7('bum): snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la
86a1('bum): zhig la brten te/kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang
86a2('bum): yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin
86a3('bum): no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/'du shes thams cad sprul pa
86a4('bum): lta bu lags sam/'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu legs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
86a5('bum): 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o//tshor ba thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o//'du sheso thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o//'du byed thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o//
86a6('bum): rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu/'du shes
86a7('bum): thams cad sprul pa lta bu/'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu/rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu legs na/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni gzugs ma mchis//
86b1('bum): tshor ba ma mchis/'du shes ma mchis/'du byed ma mchis/rnam par shes pa ma mchis/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/rnam par byang ba ma mchis/gang las 'grol bar
86b2('bum): 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems//
86b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/lha
86b4('bum): 'am mi dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmigs sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
86b5('bum): 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so//de
86b6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so//mthong ngo rtogs so//sprul pa lta bur shes so//mthong ngo rtogs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
86b7('bum): gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/rtogs la sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/rtogs pa lags na//
87a1('bum): gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa lags/tshad med pa dran
87a2('bum): la spyod pa lags/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod pa lags/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
87a3('bum): la spyod pa lags/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa lags/mthor gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa lags/
87a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod pa lags/ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa lags/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod
87a5('bum): pa lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa lags/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/so so yang dag por rig pa bzhi la spyad pa lags/byams pa chen
87a6('bum): po la spyod pa lags/snying rje chen po la spyod pa lags/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa lags/de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
87a7('bum): chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bcom
87b1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
87b2('bum): po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur
87b3('bum): mi shes pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do//sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do///
87b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/sgra brnyan lta bu/smig rgyu lta bu/mig
87b5('bum): yor lta bu/sgyu ma lta bu/sprul pa lta bu lagos na/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
87b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams gyen du bskyod par bgyid/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems can rnams ni ming dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin
87b7('bum): par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /de dag ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du spyod
88a1('bum): do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags/mtshan ma ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ming zhes bya
88a2('bum): ba 'am/mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur gyi ming gis sgro btags pa'o//'di lta ste ming zhes bya ba'am/mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/gzugs zhes bya ba 'am/tshor ba zhes bya ba
88a3('bum): 'am/'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/'du byed ces bya ba 'am/rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/bud med ces bya ba 'am/skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/bu mo
88a4('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/sems can dmyal ba po zhes bya ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas pa zhes bya ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten po zhes bya ba 'om/lha zhes bya ba 'am/mi zhes bya
88a5('bum): ba'am/'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am
88a6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/kra bcom po nyid ces bya ba 'am/rang byang chubo ces bya ba 'am/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgra mo'i
88a7('bum): ming gis sgro btags pa ste/rab 'byor ming ni thams cad ming gau don gyis btags pa ste/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams
88b1('bum): cad ni ming tsam ste/de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas ming thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa
88b2('bum): las byung ba yin gyis/yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen
88b3('bum): par mi byed do zhes skul bar byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can
88b4('bum): rnams la chos ston pa yin no//rab 'byor mtshan mo gang zhe na/gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ste/gnyis gang zhe na//
88b5('bum): 'di lta ste/gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang /gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o//rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i
88b6('bum): gzugs rags pa 'am/phra ba 'am/bzang ba 'am/ngan pa 'am/rgyang ring ba 'am/thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas gzung ba ste/'di ni gzugs
88b7('bum): kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/gzugs med pa'i chos gang la'ang rung ste/mtshan mar gzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs
89a1('bum): paskye bar 'gyur ba ste/'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o//de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
89a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o//'od ni
89a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa'o zhes bya ba gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
89a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol cing /mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
89a5('bum): gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni de tsam du bas te/ming dang mtshan mar bsal/btags pa tsam du bas te/yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/bcom
89a6('bum): ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob la/gzhan yang
89a7('bum): dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la bzhog cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas so yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor
89b1('bum): ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
89b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/khyad par thob par yang mi 'gyur te/gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyar bar mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma'ang
89b3('bum): med par dngos po'ang med pas na/rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
89b4('bum): gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma
89b5('bum): med pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
89b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan
89b7('bum): ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshad med po bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan mo med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med
90a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan
90a2('bum): ma med pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi
90a3('bum): yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
90a4('bum): gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid
90a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs
90a6('bum): su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su
90a7('bum): rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
90b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa
90b2('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
90b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
90b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed //mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs
90b5('bum): su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs
90b6('bum): su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i
90b7('bum): bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par
91a1('bum): byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su
91a2('bum): rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
91a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
91a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs
91a5('bum): par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas
91a6('bum): nas/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod
91a7('bum): na'ang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos mtshan ma med pa dran pa med pa/yid la byed pa med pa de mngon
91b1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos so//
91b2('bum): thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa dran pa med pa yid la byed pa med pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
91b3('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing dran pa ma
91b4('bum): mchis te/yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das 'od ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so//'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so//'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so//'di dag
91b5('bum): ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so//'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so//'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so//'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so//'di dag ni 'dus ma
91b6('bum): byas kyi chos so//'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so//'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so//'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so//'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so//'di
91b7('bum): dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so//'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam
92a1('bum): du sems/mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das
92a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/byang chub
92a3('bum): sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
92a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//
92a5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid do//rang byang chub bo//byang chub sems dpa'i chos so//sangs rgyas kyi chos so//gsol po/bcom ldan 'das de de lta legs so//bde bar gshegs
92a6('bum): pa de de lta lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor chos
92a7('bum): thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
92b1('bum): pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha
92b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nor stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus
92b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang
92b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid
92b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po
92b6('bum): lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad
92b7('bum): med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par
93a1('bum): thar pa'i rgyu stong pa nyid dang /mtshanar skyed pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pakyA dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams
93a2('bum): cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs
93a3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
93a4('bum): dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par
93a5('bum): thar pa'i sgo gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o//mtshon ma dang bral ba ni
93a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o//mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgra ste rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub
93a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/rten cing 'brel por 'byung
93b1('bum): ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
93b2('bum): pa yin/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/shes pak+Shi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yid/nang
93b3('bum): pa nyid la slob pa yin/phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yid/phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la srab pa yin/chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/don
93b4('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/thog
93b5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la sgrub pa yin/da ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin
93b6('bum): rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/dalta ba med pa snang pa nyid la sgrub pa yin da ba nyid stong pa nyid la sgrub pa yin/
93b7('bum): dngos pa med pa'i ji na nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa lanal chu
94a1('bum): pa yin/dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/stobs lnga la slob pa yin/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa
94a2('bum): yin/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/
94a3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
94a4('bum): med pa la slob pa yin/mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
94a5('bum): stobs bcu la slob pa yin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la skyob pa yin/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/snying rje chen po la slob pa
94a6('bum): yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/rnam pa thams cad
94a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
94b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
94b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs rab tu shes te/gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang /gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so//de la
94b3('bum): ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste dper na/dbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin tu gsong ldong dang /shin tu gas tshigs dang /shin tu snying po med par rab
94b4('bum): tu shes te/de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no//ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang /'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /gang du'ang 'gro ba
94b5('bum): med pas/gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no///
94b6('bum): ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med/'gro ba meng kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma
94b7('bum): yin/'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/phyin ci log ma yin zhing /de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes
95a1('bum): pa yin no//ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin na na/'di lta ste dper na chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing /'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/de ltar na tshor bla shas
95a2('bum): pa yin no//ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/tsher bu ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ong 'gro ba med pas/gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro
95a3('bum): bste/gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe
95a4('bum): na/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni me skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/kun nas nyon mongs po ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin/'bri ba ma yin/'phel ba ma yin te/phyin
95a5('bum): log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin na
95a6('bum): na/'di lta ste dper na/smig rgya la chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang /'jig pa shes
95a7('bum): pa yin zhe na/'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/gang gang nas kyang me 'ongs pa de gang dul
95b1('bum): ma song bar shes pa ste/de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag
95b2('bum): 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin/'bri ba ma yin/'phel ba ma yin te/phyin ci log ma yin zhing /de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/de'i
95b3('bum): phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste dper na/chu shing shun pa so sor phye na/snying po
95b4('bum): shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /gang
95b5('bum): du'ang 'gro ba med pas/gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/gang gang nus kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa
95b6('bum): yin no//ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang
95b7('bum): ba ma yin/'bri ba ma yin/'phel ba ma yin te/phyin ci log ma yin zhing /de bzhin nyid du gonas pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid
96a1('bum): shes pa yin no//ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa
96a2('bum): ste/de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing /gang
96a3('bum): du'ang 'gro ba med pas/gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /'jig/
96a4('bum): pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/kun nas nyon
96a5('bum): mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin/'bri ba ma yin/'phel ba ma yin te/phyin ci log ma yin zhing /de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//
96a6('bum): de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong /phyi'i chos rnams
96a7('bum): kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no//ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams
96b1('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang
96b2('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
96b3('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
96b4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //ro'i khams kyang ro'i
96b5('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi
96b6('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin
96b7('bum): gyis stong ngo //yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
97a1('bum): kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes pa ste/de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no//ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par
97a2('bum): 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang /de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang /chad pa med pa dang /rtag pa
97a3('bum): med pa dang /don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /'ong ba med pa dang /'gro ba med pa dang /spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na rten cing 'brel par
97a4('bum): 'byung ba shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /
97a5('bum): 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/sdug bsngal shes pa yin/bden pa shes
97a6('bum): pa yin/'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'i badren pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin
97a7('bum): no//de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin
97b1('bum): no//ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin no//de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam
97b2('bum): gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin te/de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di
97b3('bum): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag
97b4('bum): de ltar 'tshal na/des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrug par mi 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la
97b5('bum): la zhig yod na ni/rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so//gal te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbyings
97b6('bum): kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/byang chub sems dpa' 'am/rang sangs rgyas sum/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
97b7('bum): nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so//de ltar ma dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar btags pa
98a1('bum): med do//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor
98a2('bum): gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la bslab par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
98a3('bum): 'byor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams
98a4('bum): cad ni chos kyi dbyings so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar de
98a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni
98a6('bum): 'di lta ste/dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'i chos dang /kho na ma tho ba
98a7('bum): dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
98b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/chos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi
98b2('bum): dbyings lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/
98b3('bum): ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar khams dang skye mched rnams dang /rten cing
98b4('bum): 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar bzod pa'i
98b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar shes
98b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
98b7('bum): ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'dus byas
99a1('bum): stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar thog ma
99a2('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar chos thams cad
99a3('bum): stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa
99a4('bum): nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
99a5('bum): bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ji
99a6('bum): ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'phags
99a7('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
99b1('bum): 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rnam par
99b2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la
99b3('bum): bslab par bgyi/ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par
99b4('bum): bgyi/ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar dga' ba chen
99b5('bum): po la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar btang snyoms chen po la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu
99b6('bum): rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar
99b7('bum): bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i
100a1('bum): ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bsgrub par bgyi/ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar mtsham lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab
100a2('bum): par bsti/ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'phrul dga'i lhur skye bar bgyi ba la bsgrub par bgyi/ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye
100a3('bum): bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji lta ro tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar tshangs
100a4('bum): pakun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi//
100a5('bum): ji ltar tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab
100a6('bum): par bgyi/ji ltar tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba
100a7('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar tshad med che bo'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'du shes med
100b1('bum): pa'i sems can gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bsdu ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ji ltar nam mkha' mtha'
100b2('bum): yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ji
100b3('bum): ltar cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing
100b4('bum): der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum pa la bslab
100b5('bum): par bgyi/ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sems bskyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar
100b6('bum): sems bskyed pa bdun pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sems bskyed pa brgyud pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu po la bslab par bgyi//ji ltar sems bskyed
100b7('bum): pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' skyon ma mchis pa
101a1('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par/
101a2('bum): bgyi/ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs shing chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
101a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la bslab par bgyi/tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/'du shes la bslab par bgyi/'du
101a4('bum): byed la bsrab par bgyi/rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/mig la bslab par bgyi/rna ba la bslab par bgyi/sna la bslab par bgyi/lce la bslab par bgyi/lus
101a5('bum): la bslab par bgyi/yid la bslab par bgyi/gzugs la bslab par bgyi/sgra la bslab par bgyi/dri la bslab par bgyi/ro la bslab par bgyi/reg la bslab
101a6('bum): par bgyi/cho la bslab par bgyi/mig gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab
101a7('bum): par bkyi/lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/mig gi 'dus
101b1('bum): te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
101b2('bum): la bslab par bgyi/yid kyi 'dus te rig pa la bslab par bgyi/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab
101b3('bum): par bgyi/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
101b4('bum): bslab par bgyi/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/sa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/me'i khams la bslab par
101b5('bum): bgyi/rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/nam mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi/rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/'du byed la
101b6('bum): bslab par bgyi/rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ming dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi/skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/reg pa la bslab par bgyi/tshor ba la bslab
101b7('bum): par bgyi/sred pa la bslab par bgyi/len pa la bslab par bgyi/srid pa la bslab par bgyi/skye ba la bslab par bgyi/rga shi la bslab par bgyi/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
102a1('bum): phyin pa lang slab par bgyi/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par dgyi/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
102a2('bum): phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
102a3('bum): stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/don dam pa stong
102a4('bum): pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/thog
102a5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
102a6('bum): bslab par bgyi/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ngo bo
102a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/yang dag par spong ba
102b1('bum): rnams la bslab par bgyi/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
102b2('bum): la bslab par bgyi/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/tshad med
102b3('bum): pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
102b4('bum): 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/
102b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par
102b6('bum): bgyi/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
102b7('bum): la bslab par bgyi/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/dgra
103a1('bum): bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
103a2('bum): bslab par bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'am/mi spro ba spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur
103a3('bum): lags grang ////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya gyi gsum pa//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos kyi
103a4('bum): dbyings la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/gzugs nyid kyang chos
103a5('bum): kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/tshor ba nyid kyang chos
103a6('bum): kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o//'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/'du shes las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/'du shes nyid kyang
103a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so//'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/'du byed las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/'du byed
103b1('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
103b2('bum): te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//mig kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/mig las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings
103b3('bum): ma mchis te/mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go/rna ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rna ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rna ba
103b4('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o//sna'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/sna las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
103b5('bum): so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o//lce'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/lce las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid
103b6('bum): kyang lce'o//lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/lus las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so//
103b7('bum): yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/yid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do//gzugs
104a1('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
104a2('bum): gzugs so//sgra'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/sgra las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o//dri'ang
104a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/dri las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o//ro'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
104a4('bum): lags/ro las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o//reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/reg las
104a5('bum): gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go/chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/chos las gud na'ang
104a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so//mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/mig gi
104a7('bum): rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes
104b1('bum): 'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
104b2('bum): so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
104b3('bum): /sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/lce'i rnam
104b4('bum): par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o//lus kyi rnam
104b5('bum): par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
104b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
104b7('bum): mchis te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
105a1('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig
105a2('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
105a3('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang
105a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings
105a5('bum): ma lags/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te
105a6('bum): reg pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
105a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na'ang
105b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
105b2('bum): ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos
105b3('bum): kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rna ba'i 'dus te
105b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i
105b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi
105b6('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lce'i 'dus
105b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/lce'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen
106a1('bum): kyis tshor nyid kya chos kyi byi smras//chos kyi shings nyid kyang rje'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis chur ba
106a2('bum): rjes kyi dbyings ma lags/lam kyi dus te go pa'i rkyen gyi tshung ba las bung na byung chos kyi dbyings ma mchis hU~M/lus kyi 'dus TIg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bo nyid kyang chos
106a3('bum): dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus k+Shi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis TI rI dri'o//yid kyi 'dus te rabya ba'i rkyen gyis tshor bang chos kyi dbyangs ma lags/yid kyi 'dus
106a4('bum): te rig pa'i rkyen gyis chur ba las gung na'ang rjes kyi dbyings ma mchis te/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyos tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang
106a5('bum): 'dus te dge pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sna'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lanas/si dpas las bung na nga chos kyi dbyings mo mchisaH/sa'i kha pos nyid tshus
106a6('bum): byas na//rnaMs ky-i byungs nyid byed pa khamasaso//rgyu'i khams kyi dgyis ma lags/rje khams las sringan cos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/chu'i 'am
106a7('bum): nying kyang chas kyi byings sa//chos kyi sa nyid rdzun 'i khams so//me'i khams kya chos kyi bying sem 'das/mi khams las grong da'ang chos kyi dbyings
106b1('bum): te/mekI khams nyid kyang chos kyi byings so//chos byings nyid che'i khams so//rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rlung gi khams las gud da'ang tshus kyi nga
106b2('bum): ma mchis te/rlung gi khams nyid kyi tshus gyi dbyings s+ho/chos kyi sbyis nyid kyang d+hA gA khams so//rnam mtha'i khams kyang chos kyi 'di sem lags/nA bi m+mu 'i khams
106b3('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/nam mkha'i khams nyid rgya chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
106b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lagras/rnam par shes pa'i khams las bud na dang chos kyi dngos ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyis 'di
106b5('bum): klung rnam por shes pa'i khams so//ma rig pa'ang chos kyi dbyings mi lags/mi rig pa las bud na'ang chos kyi dbying sa ma mchis te/ma rig pa nyid kya chos kyi dbyings so//rgyas
106b6('bum): d+hI kyang mi gapa'o//'du bye mchos kyi dbyis so lags/'du byed las rbad na 'jo chis kyi dbyings mo mchisate/'du ts+tshas ng+ge ste sa/
106b7('bum): dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings mo lags/rnam por shes pa las gud na 'di chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rnam
107a1('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//ming dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ming dang gzugs/
107a2('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so//skye mched drug kyang chos kyi dbyings
107a3('bum): ma lags/skye mched drug las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go/reg pa'ang chos kyi
107a4('bum): dbyings ma legs/reg pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o//tshor ba'ang chos kyi
107a5('bum): dbyings ma lags/tshor ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o//srid pa'ang chos kyi
107a6('bum): dbyings ma lags/sred pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o//len pa'ang chos kyi
107a7('bum): dbyings ma lags/len pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o//srid pa'ang chos kyi
107b1('bum): dbyings ma lags/srid pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o//skye ba'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
107b2('bum): lags/skye ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o//rga shi'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rga shi
107b3('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
107b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
107b5('bum): pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud no'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
107b6('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/bzod pa'i
107b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu
108a1('bum): phyin pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/brtson
108a2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
108a3('bum): lags/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi
108a4('bum): dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang chos
108a5('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nang stong pa nyid kyang chos
108a6('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags/nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid
108a7('bum): do//phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/phyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi
108b1('bum): dbyings nyid kyang b+hi stong pa nyid do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos
108b2('bum): kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
108b3('bum): mchis te/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/chen po
108b4('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do//don dam pa stong pa nyid
108b5('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid
108b6('bum): kyang do ni dam pa stong pa nyid do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/'dus byas
108b7('bum): stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/'dus ma byas stong pa
109a1('bum): nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//mtha'
109a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/mtha' los 'das pa stong pa nyid nyid
109a3('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/thog ma dang tha ma
109a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med
109a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
109a6('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud
109a7('bum): na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//chos thams cad stong pa
109b1('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi
109b2('bum): dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ong chos kyi dbyings ma
109b3('bum): mchis te/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rong gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
109b4('bum): ma lags/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs
109b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/dngos po med pa stong pa
109b6('bum): nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud
109b7('bum): na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
110a1('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang
110a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
110a3('bum): rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//yang dag
110a4('bum): par spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
110a5('bum): so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi
110a6('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags//
110a7('bum): dbang po rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//stobs rnams kyang chos
110b1('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags/stobs rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so//byang chub
110b2('bum): yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
110b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/lam las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lam nyid kyang chos kyi
110b4('bum): dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
110b5('bum): mchis te/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
110b6('bum): lags/bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so//tshad
110b7('bum): med pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid
111a1('bum): kyang tshad med pa rnams so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
111a2('bum): las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
111a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rnam par thar pa nyid
111a4('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/mthar
111a5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos
111a6('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang chos kyi dbyings
111a7('bum): ma logs/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa las bud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
111b1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'o//mngon
111b2('bum): par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos
111b3('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ting nge 'dzin
111b4('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lpags/gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang chos
111b5('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings
111b6('bum): ma lags/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings
111b7('bum): nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/mi 'jigs pa rnams las bud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
112a1('bum): mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
112a2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na'ong chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang
112a3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams so//byams pa chen po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/byams pa chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos
112a4('bum): kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o//snying rje chen po'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/snying rje chen po las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/snying
