112a5('bum): rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/sangs rgyas
112a6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams los gud na'ang chos kyi dbyingasnga ma mchis te/sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs
112a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//rgyun du zhugaso pa'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma
112b1('bum): mchis te/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings
112b2('bum): ma lags/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lus bu na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
112b3('bum): lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/phyir mi 'ong
112b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/dgra bcom pa nyid las gud
112b5('bum): na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do//rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags//
112b6('bum): rang byang chub las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
112b7('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings
113a1('bum): nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang
113a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das
113a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no//gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so//
113a4('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o//'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so//'du byed nyid kyang
113a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//mig nyid kyang chos
113a6('bum): kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go/rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o//sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings
113a7('bum): nyid kyang sna'o//lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o//lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so//yid nyid kyang chos
113b1('bum): kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do//gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so//sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings
113b2('bum): nyid kyang sgra'o//dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o//ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o//reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
113b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go/chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so//mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings
113b4('bum): nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid
113b5('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes
113b6('bum): pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
113b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus
114a1('bum): te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid
114a2('bum): kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyangs nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
114a3('bum): so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//mig
114a4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
114a5('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
114a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg
114a7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//
114b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
114b2('bum): so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so//chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so//me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi
114b3('bum): dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so//rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so//nam mkha'i khams nyid
114b4('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par
114b5('bum): shes pa'i khams so//ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o//'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
114b6('bum): 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
114b7('bum): ming dang gzugs so//skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go//reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid
115a1('bum): /du rig rga/rab da pyongs sa//chos kyi rgyas //sa rgyud chos kyi ngas so//chos kyi myos nyid/ srong //
115a2('bum): pa'o//len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len po'o//srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o//skye ba
115a3('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o//rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
115a4('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
115a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brtson 'grus
115a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
115a7('bum): so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi
115b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o//nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nung stong pa nyid do//phyi stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings
115b2('bum): nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do//phyi nang stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so///
115b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//chen po stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do//don dam pa stong pa nyid nyid
115b4('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do//'dus byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa
115b5('bum): nyid do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//mtha' las 'das pa stong po nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
115b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med
115b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi
116a1('bum): dngos so//saHdbyings spyod kyang rang bzhin stong ba da//chos snyoms cad stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings su//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chas
116a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
116a3('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
116a4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
116a5('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid
116a6('bum): kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
116a7('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//
116b1('bum): stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so//byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan
116b2('bum): lag rnams so//'phrogs pa'i lam yan ldog brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//'phags pa'i
116b3('bum): bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam
116b4('bum): gtan rnams so//tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi
116b5('bum): dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam
116b6('bum): par thar pa rnams so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
116b7('bum): rnams so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
117a1('bum): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /sman pa med pa'o//mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams
117a2('bum): so//ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so//gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
117a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//mi 'jigs
117a4('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so//so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
117a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o//snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi
117a6('bum): dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang spangs rgyas kyi chos
117a7('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
117b1('bum): 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
117b2('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do//rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi
117b3('bum): dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid do//rnam pa thams cad
117b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
117b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par
117b6('bum): yang mi 'gyur te/chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos
117b7('bum): thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas/chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te/'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o//'di ni tsho ba zhes bya'o//'di ni 'du
118a1('bum): shas+t+ra zhes bya'o//'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o//'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//'di ni mig ces bya'o//'di ni rna ba zhes bya'o//'di ni sgra zhes bya'o//'a8
118a2('bum): ni lce zhes bya'o//'di ni lus zhes bya'o//'di ni yid ces bya'o//'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o//'di ni sgra zhes bya'o//'di na d+hi zhes bya'o//'di ni ro zhes bya'o//'di ni reg
118a3('bum): ces bya'o//'di ni chos zhes bya'o//'di ni mig gi rnam por shes pa zhes bya'o//'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//
118a4('bum): 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//'dri ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o//
118a5('bum): 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o//'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o//'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o//'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o//'di ni
118a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o//'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o//'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o//'di ni sna'i
118a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o//'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o//'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o//'di ni
118b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o//'di ni sa'i khams zhes bya'o//'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o//'di ni me'i khams zhes bya'o//'di ni rlung gi khams zhes bya'o//
118b2('bum): 'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o//'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o//'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o//'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o//'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o//
118b3('bum): 'di ni ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o//'di ni skye mched drug ces bya'o//'di ni reg pa zhes bya'o//'di ni tshor po zhes bya'o//'di ni sred pa zhes bya'o//'di ni len pa zhes bya'o//'di
118b4('bum): ni srid pa zhes bya'o//'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o//'di ni rga shi zhes bya'o//'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//'di ni
118b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
118b6('bum): pa zhes bya'o//'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni chen po
118b7('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni mtha' las 'das
119a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces
119a2('bum): bya'o//'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni dngos po med pa
119a3('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//'di dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya'o//'di
119a4('bum): dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni dbang po rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni stobs rnams zhes bya'o//'di
119a5('bum): dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o//'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni
119a6('bum): bsam gtan rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni tshad med pa rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni rnam par thar pa
119a7('bum): brgyad ces bya'o//'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o//'di dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
119b1('bum): med pa zhes bya'o//'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya'o//'di drug ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni de bzhin
119b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya'o//'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya'o//'di ni byams pa chen po zhes
119b3('bum): bya'o//'di ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o//'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya'o//'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
119b4('bum): 'bras bu zhes bya'o//'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o//'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya'o//'di ni rang byang chub ces bya'o//'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o//
119b5('bum): 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o zhes ston to//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sgyu ma byed pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis
119b6('bum): rdzas kyi rnam pa gyi na zhig la brten te/gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/glang po'i gzugs sam/rta'i gzugs sam/ba lang gi gzugs sam/rnga mo dang lug gi
119b7('bum): gzugs sam/skyes pa dang bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo'i gzugs sam/skyed mos tshal dang /gzhal med khang dang /dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /kun dga' ra ba
120a1('bum): mdangs dga' ba 'am/rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba 'am/nags tshal mdangs dga' ba dag sprul cing /de dag tu stan dang /'khor gyi stan dang /gzhi rnam pa sna
120a2('bum): tshogs bting ste/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /kha zas dang /spyan gzigs zhim po dag bstan tam/glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byas sam/
120a3('bum): sbyin pa yongs su btang ba 'am/tshul khrims bsrung ba 'am/bzod pa bsgrubs pa'am/brtson 'grus brtsams pa'am/ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba 'am/shes rab
120a4('bum): bsgom pa 'am/rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo dga' bar byas te/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/khyim bdag che
120a5('bum): zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ri rab bostan tam/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bstan tam/mtshe ma'i lha rnams bstan
120a6('bum): tam/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/'phrul dga'i lha rnams bstan tam/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams bstan tam/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/
120a7('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams bstan tam/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams bstan tam/snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/chung snang
120b1('bum): gi lha rnams bstan tam/tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/chung dge'i lha rnams bstan tam/ched
120b2('bum): med dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan tam/che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/chung che'i lha rnams bstan tam/tshad med che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/'bras
120b3('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/mi che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/mi gdung ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams bstan tA ma/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams bstan
120b4('bum): tu ma/'og min gyi lha rnams bstan tam/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchod kyi lha rnams bstan tam/cung zad med pa'i
120b5('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/'du shes med 'du shes med mi no skye mched kyi lha rnams bstan tam/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra
120b6('bum): bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas mang po bstan tam/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spong
120b7('bum): pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
121a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod
121a2('bum): pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid lo spyod pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /'dus ma byos
121a3('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang
121a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos
121a5('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod po dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang //
121a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyad pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams la spyod pa dang /dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan
121a7('bum): lag rnams la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting
121b1('bum): nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang /sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par/
121b2('bum): byed pa dang /sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa bdun pa yongs su
121b3('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /byang chub
121b4('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang /mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par brtse zhing /'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar
121b5('bum): byed pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba dang /spyad par
121b6('bum): dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
121b7('bum): rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dang /byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang /snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub pa de
122a1('bum): dgra bstan tam/sangs rgyas kyi sku yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bstan na/de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag 'di snyam du sems
122a2('bum): te/kye ma mi 'dis legs par bslabs pa ngo mtshar che'i/re mdzes dag byed/de ltar skye bo dga' bar byed cing /gzugs kyi bye brab sna tshogs 'di lta ste/glang po'i gzugs dang /
122a3('bum): rta'i gzugs dang /bal lang gi gzugs dang /rnga mo dang lug gi gzugs dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs ston pa dang /skyed mos tshal dang /
122a4('bum): gzhal med khang dang /dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /kun dga'i ra ba mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang /rdzing bu mdangs dga' ba ston pa dang /nags tshal mdangs dga' ba ston
122a5('bum): pa dang /de dag tu stan dang /'khor gyi stan dang /gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /kha zas dang /spyan gzigs
122a6('bum): mang po de lta bu ston pa dang /glu dang sil snyan gyis skye bo dga' bar byed cing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /bzod pa bsgrub pa dang /brtson
122a7('bum): 'grus brtsam pa dang /ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba dang /shes rab bsgom pa dang /rnam pa 'di dag gis skye bo dga' bar byed cing /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs
122b1('bum): ston pa dang /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs ston pa dang /khyim bdag nong man pa'i tshogs ston pa dang /ri bston pa dang /rgyal chen bani'i ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /sum hA/
122b2('bum): gsum gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /mtshe ma'i lha rnams ston pa dang /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /'phrul dga'i lha rnams ston pa dang /gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi lha rnams
122b3('bum): ston pa dang /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
122b4('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /chung snang gi lha rnams ston pa dang /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /dge ba'i lha rnams ston
122b5('bum): pa dang /chung dge'i lha rnams ston pa dang /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /chung che'i lha rnams
122b6('bum): ston pa dang /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /mi che ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /shin tu
122b7('bum): mthong ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams ston pa dang /'og min gyi lha rnams ston pa dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /
123a1('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams ston pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
123a2('bum): lha rnams ston pa dang /gzugs med pa rnams ston pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams ston pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams ston pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /rogra bcom/
123a3('bum): pa dang /rang sangs rgyas mang po rnams ston cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
123a4('bum): pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsdam
123a5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid
123a6('bum): la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
123a7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod
123b1('bum): pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
123b2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod po dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /
123b3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
123b4('bum): la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams lo spyod pa dang /bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin
123b5('bum): dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par
123b6('bum): byed pa dang /sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs
123b7('bum): par byed pa dang /sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa dgu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /byang chub sems
124a1('bum): dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang /mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par brtse ba dang /'jig rten gyi
124a2('bum): khams rnams snang bar byed pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /yan lag dang nying lag yongs
124a3('bum): su gtong ba dang /dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /so so yang
124a4('bum): dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa dang /byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang /snying rje chen po mngon
124a5('bum): par sgrub pa de dag kyang ston cing /sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yan lag dang /nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ston pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes ngo mtshar cher 'dzin to//de la
124a6('bum): skyes bu mkhas shing gsal ba/yid rno ba dang ldan pa/dpyod pa dam pa dang ldan pa rnams ni 'di snyam ste/'di la chos gang yang dmigs su med na/mi 'di de ltar med pa'i
124a7('bum): chos kyis skye bo mang po 'di dag dga' bar byed pa ni/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so snyam ste/sems can 'di dag ni dngos po med pa la dngos por 'du shes pa'o zhes bya
124b1('bum): par de dag gi shes pa 'byung ngo //rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs
124b2('bum): pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can du mi dmigs/sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs te/bdag
124b3('bum): kyang sbyin pa gtong ba yin/gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa gtong ba de dag gi legs pa brjod
124b4('bum): cing mithun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang tshul khrims srung ba yin/gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par skul ba yin/tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/
124b5('bum): sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang bzod pa la yang
124b6('bum): dag par skul ba yin/bzod pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang bzod pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing /mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag
124b7('bum): kyang brtson 'grus rtsom pa yin/gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul ba yin/brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom
125a1('bum): pade dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang ting po dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la yang dag
125a2('bum): par skul ba yin/ting nge 'dzin gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar
125a3('bum): spyod pa yin/bdag kyang shes rab bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang shes rab la yang dag par skul ba yin/shes rab kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang
125a4('bum): shes rab bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin pa yin/gzhan yang dge ba
125a5('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam lnga yang dag par skul ba yin/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang dge ba bcu'i las kI lam yang dag
125a6('bum): par 'dzin pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' zer spyod pa yin/bdag kyang yan leg brgyad dang ldan pa'i gas sbyin la nye bar gnas pa yin/gzhan yang
125a7('bum): yan lag brgyad deng ldan pa'i gso sbyin la yang dag par skul pa yin/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin gyi legs po brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang
125b1('bum): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin pa yin//
125b2('bum): gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/bslab pa'i gnas lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par 'dzin
125b3('bum): pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par
125b4('bum): skul ba yin/bsnam gtan dang po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas
125b5('bum): dgra' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bsam gtan
125b6('bum): gnyis pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag
125b7('bum): kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bsam gtan gsum pa'i legs pa brjod pa
126a1('bum): yin/sems can gzhan gang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang bsam
126a2('bum): gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan
126a3('bum): gang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan
126a4('bum): yang byams pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/byams pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhon gang byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing
126a5('bum): mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang snying rje la yang dag par skul ba yin/snying rje'i legs pa brjod pa yin/
126a6('bum): sems can gzhan gang snying rje la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa yin//
126a7('bum): gzhan yang dga' ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/dga' ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa
126b1('bum): brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang btang snyoms la yang dag par skul ba yin/btang snyoms kyi legs
126b2('bum): pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhon gang btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
126b3('bum): mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems
126b4('bum): can gzhan gang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dog gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
126b5('bum): la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/semos can
126b6('bum): gzhan gang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms
126b7('bum): par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang dag par skul ba yin/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang cung
127a1('bum): zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med pan sgra
127a2('bum): mched la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang dag par sgrol ba yin/'du shes med 'du shes mid min skye mched kyi
127a3('bum): legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa
127a4('bum): yin/bdag kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang dran po nye bar bzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi
127a5('bum): legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang yang dag
127a6('bum): par spong ba rnams bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi logs pa brjod pa yin/sems
127a7('bum): can gzhan gang yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa yin/
127b1('bum): gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa
127b2('bum): de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang dbang po rnams bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/dbang po
127b3('bum): rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang dbang po rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang stobs rnams
127b4('bum): bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/stobs rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang stobs rnams bsgom pa de dag gi
127b5('bum): legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul
127b6('bum): ba yin/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi legros pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom po de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga'
127b7('bum): bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yin/gzhon yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/'phags
128a1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
128a2('bum): pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo
128a3('bum): gsum gyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang rnam par
128a4('bum): thar pa brgyad bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang rnam
128a5('bum): par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa yin/gzhan
128a6('bum): yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul ba yin/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can
128a7('bum): gzhan gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga
128b1('bum): bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/mngon par shes pa lnga'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang mngon par shes pa lnga/
128b2('bum): bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gnan yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug
128b3('bum): pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
128b4('bum): gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa yi ni/gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/
128b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag
128b6('bum): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i
128b7('bum): legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang
129a1('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can
129a2('bum): gzhan gang mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom pa yin/gzhan
129a3('bum): yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang so so yang dag par
129a4('bum): rig pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang byams pa chen po bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang
129a5('bum): dag par skul ba yin/byams pa chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang byams pa chen po bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar
129a6('bum): spyod pa yin/bdag kyang snying rje chen po bsgom pa yin/gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/snying rje chen po'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can
129a7('bum): gzhan gang snying rje chen po bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa yin//
129b1('bum): gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan
129b2('bum): gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa
129b3('bum): yin/gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par skul ba yin/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang
129b4('bum): mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrub pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa yin/gzhan yang
129b5('bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul ba yin/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i legs pa brjod pa yin/sems can gzhan gang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sgrub pa de dag
129b6('bum): gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod pa yin/rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin nam/bar du'ang de bzhin ma yin du zin na ni///
129b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston par mi 'gyur/sems
130a1('bum): can rnams yongs su smin par byed par mi 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de sngon ji lta bar phyis
130a2('bum): kyang de bzhin bar du'ang de bzhin pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can
130a3('bum): rnams la chos kyi dbyings ston to//sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do//sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing
130a4('bum): yongs su dag par byed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u drug cu ts+tsha bzhi pa'o///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
130a5('bum): pa//bam po nyis brgya gyi bzhi pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te sems can yang shin
130a6('bum): tu dmigs su ma mchis la/sems can du dmigs pa'ang ma mchis na/su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
130a7('bum): labs/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
130b1('bum): po ni yang dag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ste/rab 'byor gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan la/sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan zhig
130b2('bum): ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/sems
130b3('bum): can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ste/shes rab kyi
130b4('bum): pa rol tu phyin pa la bskam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa med par sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god do//
130b5('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i
130b6('bum): mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'gyur na ni/des rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur
130b7('bum): te/bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin la ni rang bzhin gnas pa ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
131a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang
131a2('bum): dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur ba'ang med/rang bzhin la rang bzhin gnas par 'gyur ba'ang med na/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
131a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god de/yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed do//de ci'i
131a4('bum): phyir zhe na/sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin te/de ltar na sems can gyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis
131a5('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pa
131a6('bum): dang ldan pas sems can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god kyang /yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i thabs gong lags/bcom ldan 'das
131a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
131b1('bum): s+ho/sems can rnams sbyin pa la rab tu 'god do//sbyin pa la rab tu bkod nas/sbyin pa de'i thog ma'i mtha' dang /bla ma'i mtha' dang dbus ston te/ji ltar ston pa de thog ra
131b2('bum): mtha' yang stong /tha mi'i mtha' yang stong /dbus kyang stong pa de ltar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang stong /sbyin bdag kyang stong /len pa'ang stong par ston cing /rigs kyi bu de ltar yang
131b3('bum): dag pa'i mtha' la don de dag med kyis/sbyin pa'ang gzhan la/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan na snyam du mo sems shig/sbyin bdag cang gzhan la/len pa'ang gzhan no snyam du rma
131b4('bum): sems shig/rigs kyi bu khyod nam sbyin po'ang gzhan la/skyen po'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no snyam du mi sems/sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la len pa'ang gzhan no snyam du mi sems pa de'i
131b5('bum): che/khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di bdud rtsi dang /bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang /mthar bdud rtsir 'gyurate/sbyin pa 'di gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin cig/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed da /
131b6('bum): rnam por shes pa yongs su ma 'dzin cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni smyon pas byung ngo //de'i 'bras bu'ang 'bras bus sbyong ngo //sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gis
131b7('bum): de//len pa'ang len pas stong ste/stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa mi dmigs/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /sbyin bdag dang /len pa mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos ni
132a1('bum): ngag ni ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu stong nga zhes brjod do//gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i cha/
132a2('bum): thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams tshul khrims la 'god de/tshur rigs kyi bu srog gcod pa spongs la/srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ma byin par len pa
132a3('bum): spongs la/ma byin par len pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/'dod pas log par g.yem pa spongs la/'dod pas log par g.yem pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/brdzun
132a4('bum): du smra ba spongs la/brdzun du smra ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/phra ma spongs la/phra ma las phyir ldog par gyis shig/zhe gcod pa'i tshig spongs la/zhe gcod pa'i tshig las
132a5('bum): phyir ldog par gyis shig/tshig 'khyal pa spongs la/tshig 'khyal pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/chags sems spongs la/chags sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/
132a6('bum): gnod sems spongs la/gnod sems las phyir ldog par gyis shig/log par lta ba spongs la log par lta ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag
132a7('bum): la ji ltar yongs su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang med kyis/rigs kyi bu soms dang gang gi srog bcad par bya ba'i srog chags dang /gang gis srog bcad par bya ba
132b1('bum): de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/gang ma byin par blang ba dang /ma byin par len par btags pa dang /gang gis blang ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/gang 'dod pas log par
132b2('bum): g.yem pa dang /'dod pas log par g.yem par btags pa dang /gang gis 'dod pas log par g.yem par bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/gang brdzun du smra ba dang /brdzun
132b3('bum): du smra bar btags pa dang /gang gis brdzun du smra bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/gang phra ma smra ba dang /phra ma smra bar btags pa dang /gang gis phra mar smra ba de lta bu'i chos
132b4('bum): kyang gang zhig yin/gang zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang /zhe gcod par btags pa dang /gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig tu smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/gang tshig 'khyal pa
132b5('bum): smra ba dang /tshig 'khyal par btags pa dang /gang gis tshig 'khyal par smra ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/gang chags sems bskyed pa dang /chags sems su btags pa
132b6('bum): dang /gang gis chags sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/gang gnod sems bskyed pa dang /gnod sems su btags pa dang /gang gis gnod sems su bya ba
132b7('bum): de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin/gang log par lta ba dang /log par lta bar btags pa dang /gang gis log par lta ba mthong ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang zhig yin zhes ston cing /
133a1('bum): tshul khrims la 'god de/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//
133a2('bum): tshe/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//des de la sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu bstan te/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de'ang ngo bo nyid
133a3('bum): kyis stong par bstan pas/rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rig nas/de la mngon par zhen pa mi byed do//mngon par zhen pa med
133a4('bum): pas/'brug par mi 'gyur zhing shes rab skyed do//shes rab des kyang bgral nyal ba dang /kun nas ldang ba thams cad bcad nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
133a5('bum): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/stong pa nyid la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
133a6('bum): 'am/yongs su mya ngon las 'das pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/de'i mya ngan las 'das po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//
133a7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can phan tshun gnod par sems shing /'khrugs
133b1('bum): par gyur pa dang ldan pa dag mthong na 'di skad du 'dems shing ston te/rigs kyi bu bzod pas skyabs shig/bzod pa sgoms shig/nges pa dang sems zhi ba dang /drang du sems
133b2('bum): pa'i ngang tshul can du gyis shig/gang gnod par byed pa dang /gang gis gnod par bya ba dang /gang la gnod par bya ba'i chos de dag ni thams cad kyang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa
133b3('bum): yin gyis rigs kyi bu gnod par byed pa ni su yod/gnod par ni smra la bya/cis ni gnod par bya/soms dang chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/rang bzhin gyi
133b4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang mi stong par mi 'gyur te/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas so//rang sangs
133b5('bum): rgyas rnams kyis ma byas so//nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas so//lha rnams kyis ma byas so//klu rnams kyis ma byas so//gnod sbyin rnams kyis ma byas so//dri za rnams
133b6('bum): kyis ma byas so//lha ma yin rnams kyis ma byas so//nam mkha' lding rnams kyis ma byas so//mi 'am ci rnams kyis ma byas so//lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma byas so//
133b7('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis ma byas so//sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs pa dang /
134a1('bum): dge rgyas dang /gnas gtsang ma dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mchod dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mchod dang /'du shes
134a2('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyis mi byas te/de ni rtag par yang rong bzhin gyis stong pa'o//rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni su la'ang gnod par mi byed do zhes nas/rab
134a3('bum): 'byor de ltar byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams thabs mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /rgyu dang
134a4('bum): 'bras bu la sbyor te/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bkod cing /rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston to//yang dag par skul lo//yang
134a5('bum): dag par gzong bstod do//yang dag par dga' bar byed do//gzhog go/'dul lo/rab tu 'god do//de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ma yin no//de ci'i
134a6('bum): phyir zhe na/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gang thob par byed pa dang /gang gis thob par bya ba dang /gang thob par bya ba gang yang med do//rab 'byor 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha'
134a7('bum): stong pa nyid de/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/de la sems can
134b1('bum): du dmigs pa med do//sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni sems can gyis dben pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
134b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na/'di ltar lus
134b3('bum): dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul te/rigs kyi bu dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni/chos gang yang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba 'am/gang la zhum zhing le lor
134b4('bum): 'gyur ba 'am/gang gis zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba 'am/gang zhum zhing le lor 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de/chos de dag ni thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid las
134b5('bum): mi 'da' ba yin gyis/lus dang /sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed la/le lo bor te/dge ba'i chos sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam
134b6('bum): gtan nam/shes rab bam/nang stong pa nyid dam/phyi stong pa nyid dam/phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/chen po stong pa nyid dam/don dam pa stong pa nyid
134b7('bum): dam/'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/thog ma drang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
135a1('bum): dam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa sta
135a2('bum): pa nyid dam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
135a3('bum): rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
135a4('bum): sem/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i
135a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams
135a6('bum): sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am//
135a7('bum): snying rje chen po'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson par gyis shig/rigs kyi bu dag stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag thams cad sgrib pa med par rtogs shig/sgrib
135b1('bum): pa med pa'i chos la zhum par 'gyur ba gang yang med do zhes/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas
135b2('bum): pas sems can rnams la rang bzhin stong pa nyid yang dag par ston to//yang dag par skul lo//yang dag par gzeng bstod do//yang dag par dga' bor byed do//gzhog go//
135b3('bum): 'dul lo rab tu 'god do//ci nas kyang gnyis la mi gnas pa de ltar rab tu 'god do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//gnyis//
135b4('bum): su byar med pa'i chos ni gang la'ang gnas pa med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs
135b5('bum): mkhas pas sems can rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'dems shing rjes su ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson
135b6('bum): 'grus sam/bsam gtan nam/shes rab bam/nang stong pa nyid dam/phyi stong pa nyid dam/phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/chen po stong pa nyid dam/
135b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam//
136a1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
136a2('bum): dam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba
136a3('bum): rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
136a4('bum): 'am/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa
136a5('bum): rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/mngon par shes
136a6('bum): pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig
136a7('bum): pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag la brtson 'grus rtsoms la/chos de dag gnyis par yang yid la ma byed
136b1('bum): cig/mi gnyis par yang yid la ma byed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyis par yid la bya ba ma yin/mi gnyis
136b2('bum): par yang yid la bya ba ma yin no//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can
136b3('bum): rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su smin par byed de/yongs su sbyin par byas nas/rim gyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bas bu la 'god do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/
136b4('bum): 'god do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do//dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do//rang byang chub la 'god do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'god do//bla na med pa yang
136b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas
136b6('bum): pas sems can sems g.yeng ba rnams la 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig/g.yeng ba'i 'du shes sam/ting nge 'dzin gyi 'du
136b7('bum): shes su ma byed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos de dag ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang g.yeng ba'am/rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang
137a1('bum): dmigs su yodad//maud kyis tong nga 'dzin da la gnas te/rang bzhi stong pa nyid la swA na/lus dang dag dang ma na rmA
137a2('bum): sbyin pa gtong ngam/tshul khrims srung ngam/bzod pa sgrub pa'am/brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'am/ting nge 'dzin bskyed dam/shes rab sgom mam/nang stong pa nyid la spyod dang/
137a3('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod dam/phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod dam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/chen po stong pa nyid la spyod dam/don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/'dus
137a4('bum): byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod dam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/thog ma dang tha me meng pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/dor ba mid
137a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod dam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod dam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/mi dmigs pa stong
137a6('bum): pa nyid la spyod dam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
137a7('bum): rnams la spyod dam/yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod dam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod dam/dbang po rnams la spyod dam/stobs rnams la spyod dam/byang chub kyi
137b1('bum): yan lag rnams la spyod dam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la snod dam/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod dam/bsam gtan rnams la spyod dam/tshad med
137b2('bum): pa rnams la spyod dam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod dam/rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod dmau/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
137b3('bum): spyod dam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod dam/mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod dam/ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod dom/
137b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod dam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod dam/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod dam/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod dam/byams pa
137b5('bum): chen po la spyod dam/snying rje chen po la spyod dam/dga' ba chen po la spyod dam/btang snyoms chen po la spyod dam/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod dam/mi
137b6('bum): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la spyod dam/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod dam/nyan thos kyi lam la spyod dam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la spyod dam/byang chub
137b7('bum): sems dpa'i lam la spyod dam/sangs rgyas kyi lamo la spyod dam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod dam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad dam/phyir mi 'ong ba'i
138a1('bum): 'bras bu la spyod dam/dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod dam/rang byang chub la spyod dam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod dam/sems can yongs su smin par bya
138a2('bum): ba la spyod dam/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la spyod kyang rung ste/dge ba'i chos de dag las gron chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston te/rab 'byor
138a3('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed de/sems dang po bskyed
138a4('bum): pa nas nye bar bzung nas/bar 'ga' yang las mi byed par mi 'gyur gyi/dge ba thams cad tshol zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
138a5('bum): rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsnyen bkur byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos pa de'ang
138a6('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/tshe rabs rjes kyang nam du'ang rnam par chud mi za ste/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par gzungs thob cing //
138a7('bum): lus kyi dbang po'am/dge gi dbang po'am/yid kyi dbang po mi nyams pa yin/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rtag tu rgyun
138b1('bum): mi chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pa des lam thams cad shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/nyan thos
138b2('bum): kyi lam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/byang chub sems dpa'i lam mam/sangs rgyas kyi lam shin tu bsgom par 'gyur/mngon par shes pa gang byang chub sems dpa'
138b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po la rnam par chud mi za ba'i tshul gyis phan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shin tu bsgoms par 'gyur te/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa de dag la
138b4('bum): gnas shing /sems can rnams kyi don byed na/'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar 'khor yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang yongs su mi nyams so//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
138b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do//rab
138b6('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing /sems can shes rab 'tshal
138b7('bum): pa can blo chung ba rnams mthong na/'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu lus dang ngag gam yid kyi las gang ci byed kyang rung ste/de thams cad rang bzhin stong pa
139a1('bum): nyid du rtogs shig dang /khyod kyi las thams cad bdud rtsi'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/mthar bdud rtsir 'gyur ro//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni gang 'jig par 'gyur
139a2('bum): ba'am/yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/rang bzhin
139a3('bum): stong pa nyid las yongs su nyams pa'i chos kyang gang yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni dngos po yod pa'ang ma yin/dngos po med pa'ang
139a4('bum): ma yin/chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ci zhig yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhes/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
139a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la 'dems shing rjes su ston to//de ltar 'dems shing rjes su ston pa'i tshe/nam yang rjes su
139a6('bum): mA bsgrubs pa ma yin/de ni bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin//gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par skul ba
139a7('bum): yin/bdag kyang bslab pa'i gnas lnga yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/gzhan yang bslab pa'i gnas lnga la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang yan lag brgyad
139b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa yin/gzhan yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas par yang dag par skul pa
139b2('bum): yin/bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms
139b3('bum): par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang bsam gtan
139b4('bum): gsum pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag
139b5('bum): kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par byams pa la gnas pa yin/gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par byams pa bsgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par
139b6('bum): snying rje la gnas pa yin/gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par snying rje bsgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dga' ba la gnas pa yin/gzhan
139b7('bum): yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dga' ba sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/gzhan yang rtag tu rgyun mi chang par/
140a1('bum): btang snyoms sgom pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan
140a2('bum): yang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par
140a3('bum): 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
140a4('bum): la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skal ba yin/bdag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med ma ni
140a5('bum): skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa yin/gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la yang dag par skul ba
140a6('bum): yin/bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol
140a7('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul po yin/bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin//gzhan
140b1('bum): yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
140b2('bum): dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang
140b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang nang stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang
140b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang phyi stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa
140b5('bum): yin/gzhan yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba
140b6('bum): yin/bdag kyang chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang chen po stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang don
140b7('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang
141a1('bum): /dus mnas stong pa nyid sgom pa yon/gzhan yang 'dus ma rgyas stong pa nyid su yang dag par sprul ba yin/bad+ma/pa mapa' las 'das pa byung pa nyid rnam
141a2('bum): yin/gzhan yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang thog ma dang tha ma med
141a3('bum): pabastong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid skom pa yin/gzhan yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag
141a4('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom po yin/gzhan yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang
141a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par
141a6('bum): skul ba yin/bdag kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang dngos po med pa
141a7('bum): stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang ngo bo nyid stong
141b1('bum): pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa yin/gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang dag par skul ba yin//
141b2('bum): bdag kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom pa yin/gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa
141b3('bum): yin/gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par skal ba yin/bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa yin/gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang dag
141b4('bum): par skul ba yin/bdag kyang dbang po rnams sgom pa yin/gzhan yang dbang po rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang stobs rnams sgom pa yin/gzhan yang
141b5('bum): stobs rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa yin/gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag
141b6('bum): kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa yin/gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo
141b7('bum): gsum la slob pa yin/gzhan yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa yin/gzhan yang 'phags
142a1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul ba
142a2('bum): yin/bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la skyob pa yin/gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu la yang dag par skul ba yin//
142a3('bum): bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/gzhan yang mngon par shes pa rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob pa yin/gzhan
142a4('bum): yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag
142a5('bum): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob
142a6('bum): pa yin/gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa
142a7('bum): bzhi la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/gzhan yang byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang snying rje chen po la
142b1('bum): slob pa yin/gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
142b2('bum): pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la slob pa yin/gzhan yang mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la yang dag par
142b3('bum): skul ba yin/bdag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la slob pa yin/gzhan yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul ba yin/bdag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
142b4('bum): bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin/gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/bdag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de
142b5('bum): la'ang mi gnas pa yin/gzhan yang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/bdag kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin//
142b6('bum): gzhan yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god pa yin/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin/gzhan yang dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god
142b7('bum): pa yin/bdag kyang rang byang chub kyi shes pa skyed cing de la'ang mi gnas pa yin/gzhan yang rang byang chub la 'god pa yin/bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
143a1('bum): chub kyi lam skyed pa yin/gzhan yang lam de la 'dems shing rjes su ston pa dang /gzhog cing 'dul ba dang 'god pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems
143a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas shing /sems can rnams
143a3('bum): kyi don byed pa'i tshe/nam yang las med par gnas pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/rang bzhin
143a4('bum): stong pa nyid la ni sems can yang mi dmigs/chos kyang mi dmigs/chos ma lags pa'ang mi dmigs na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
143a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du yang dag par 'jug pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin
