143a6('bum): no//chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ni sems can mi dmigs so//chos mi dmigs so//chos ma yin pa mi dmigs so//rab
143a7('bum): 'byor gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur te/bla na
143b1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong par mi ston to//rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na//
143b2('bum): rab 'byor gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'du shes ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis sbyong ngo //rnam par shes pa ni
143b3('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab 'byor mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sna ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lha ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lus ni rang
143b4('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo //yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab 'byor gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sgra ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dri ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //ro ni rang bzhin
143b5('bum): gyis stong ngo //reg ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //chos ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni
143b6('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sna'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lce'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong
143b7('bum): ngo//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sna'i
144a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //yid kyi 'dus/
144a2('bum): te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis
144a3('bum): stong ngo //sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
144a4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab 'byor sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //chu'i
144a5('bum): khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //me'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rlung gi khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //nam mkha'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rnam
144a6('bum): par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab 'byor ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin
144a7('bum): gyis stong ngo //ming dang gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //skye mched drug ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong
144b1('bum): do//sred pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //len pa na rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //srid pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //skye ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab
144b2('bum): 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //brtson
144b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab 'byor
144b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //phyi stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
144b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/
144b6('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni
144b7('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin
145a1('bum): gyis stong ngo //mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin
145a2('bum): gyis stong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //yang dag par spong ba
145a3('bum): rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dbang po rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //byang
145a4('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
145a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //tshad med pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rnam
145a6('bum): par thar pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
145a7('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mngon par shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gzungs
145b1('bum): kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis snang ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mi 'jigs pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis skyong ngo //so so yang dag par rig pa
145b2('bum): rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //byams pa chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dga' ba chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //btang
145b3('bum): snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dpe
145b4('bum): byebyad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //phyir mi
145b5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis
145b6('bum): stong ngo //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //de bas na byang chub sde mos dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
145b7('bum): phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//skye mched bcu gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//khams bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong
146a1('bum): ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
146a2('bum): steng nga zhes bya bar chos ston to//stong pa nyid thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//dran pa nye bar bzhug pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya
146a3('bum): bar chos ston to//yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong nga zhes bya bar chos ston to//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhes bya ba ro chos ston to//
146a4('bum): dbang po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//stobs lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni rang bzhin gyis stong
146a5('bum): ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong
146a6('bum): nga zhes bya bar tshasgra sbyin to//bsam gtan bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis sbyong ngo zhes bya bar chus ston to//tshad med pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis snying nge zhes bya bar chas stan /
146a7('bum): gzug so med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//
146b1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos skyon to//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni
146b2('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//mngon par shes pa lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes
146b3('bum): bya bar chos ston to//gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar
146b4('bum): chos ston to//mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhin ring bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//
146b5('bum): byams pa chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//dga' ba chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong
146b6('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston to//btang snyoms chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar
146b7('bum): chos ston to//me chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to///
147a1('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston
147a2('bum): to//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//rang byang chub ni rang
147a3('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin
147a4('bum): gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to//rab 'byor gal te nang stong
147a5('bum): pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi
147a6('bum): 'gyur ro//gal te phyi stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes
147a7('bum): bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams
147b1('bum): cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147b2('bum): chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te chen po stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems
147b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin
147b4('bum): na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid rang
147b5('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te
147b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos
147b7('bum): bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad
148a1('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub
148a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis
148a3('bum): stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te rang bzhin
148a4('bum): stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi
148a5('bum): 'gyur ro//gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin
148a6('bum): gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
148a7('bum): chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni//
148b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rang bzhin
148b2('bum): gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//gal te ngo bo
148b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi
148b4('bum): 'gyur ro//gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams cad rang
148b5('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos bstan par mi 'gyur ro//de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bshig par 'gyur na/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'jig par mi 'gyur rtag pa
148b6('bum): ma yin te/phyis med par 'gro ba'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni yul na mi gnas/phyogs nu mi gnas pa ste/de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin/gang du
148b7('bum): 'gro ba'ang ma yin te/de ni chos gnas pa nyid do//de la ni chos gang yang 'phel ba dmigs pa'am/'grib pa dmigs pa 'am/'gog pa dmigs pa 'am/skye ba
149a1('bum): dmigs pa 'am/'byung ba dmigs pa'am/'gag pa dmigs pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs pa 'am/rnam par byung ba dmigs pa med do//de ni chos
149a2('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin te/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/chos gang
149a3('bum): yang 'jug pa 'am/mi 'jug par mthong ba med do//chos thams cad ni 'jug pa med cing gnas pa med pa ste/de ni chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa'o//de bas na byang chub sems
149a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
149a5('bum): las phyir mi ldog go/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des sgrib pa'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med par yang dag par rjes su
149a6('bum): mthong ngo //de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bdag mi dmigs/bdag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sems can mi dmigs/sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs
149a7('bum): srog mi dmigs/srog tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/'gro ba'ang mi dmigs/'gro bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/gso ba'ang mi dmigs/gso par gdags pa'ang mi
149b1('bum): dmigs/skyes bu'ang mi dmigs/skyes bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/gang zag kyang mi dmigs/gang zag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/shed can yang mi dmigs/shed
149b2('bum): can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/shed bdag kyang mi dmigs/shed bdag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/byed pa po'ang mi dmigs/byed pa por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/
149b3('bum): tshor ba po'ang mi dmigs/tshor ba por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/tshor bar byed pa'ang mi dmigs/tshor bar byed par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/slong bar yang mi dmigs/slong
149b4('bum): bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/kun nas slong ba'ang mi dmigs/kun nas slong bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/shes pa po'ang mi dmigs/shes pa por gdags pa'ang mi
149b5('bum): dmigs/mthong ba po'ang mi dmigs/mthong ba por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/gzugs kyang mi dmigs/gzugs su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/tshor ba'ang mi dmigs
149b6('bum): tshor bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/'du shes kyang mi dmigs/'du shes su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/'du byed kyang mi dmigs/'du byed du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs//
149b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/rnam par shes par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/mig kyang mi dmigs/mig tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rna ba'ang mi dmigs/rna bar
150a1('bum): gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sna'ang mi dmigs/snar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/lce'ang mi dmigs/lder gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/lus kyang mi
150a2('bum): dmigs/lus su gdugs pa'ang mi dmigs/yid kyang mi dmigs/yid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/gzugs kyang mi dmigs/gzugs su gdags pa'ang
150a3('bum): dmigs/sgra'ang mi dmigs/sgrar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/dri'ang mi dmigs/drir gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/ro'ang mi dmigs/ror gdags pa'ang mi dmigs
150a4('bum): reg kyang mi dmigs/rag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/chos kyang mi dmigs/chos su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/mig gi rnam
150a5('bum): par shes par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/rna ba'i rnam par shes par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang mi
150a6('bum): dmigs/sna'i rnam par shes par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/lce'i rnam par shes par gdagras pa'ang mi dmigs/lus kyi rnam par
150a7('bum): shes pa'ang mi dmigs/lus kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/yid kyi rnam par shes par gdags pa'ang
150b1('bum): mi dmigs/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang mi dmigs/mig gi 'dus te reg par gdugs pa'ang mi dmigs/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang mi dmigs/rna ba'i 'dus te reg par
150b2('bum): gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang mi dmigs/sna'i 'dus te reg par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang mi dmigs/lce'i 'dus te regs
150b3('bum): bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang mi dmigs/lus kyi 'dus te reg par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang mi dmigs/yid
150b4('bum): 'dus te reg par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang mi dmigs/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/
150b5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang mi dmigs/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang mi
150b6('bum): dmigs/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'ang mi dmyigs/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang mi dmigs/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
150b7('bum): tshor bar gang gis pa'ang mi dmigs/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang mi dmigs/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/yid
151a1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang mi dmigs/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sa'i khams kyang mi dmigs/
151a2('bum): sa'i khams su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/chu'i khams kyang mi dmigs/chu'i khams su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/me'i khams kyang mi dmigs/me'i khams su
151a3('bum): gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rlung gi khams kyang mi dmigs/rlung gi khams su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/nam mkha'i khams kyang mi dmigs/nam mkha'i khams su
151a4('bum): gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mi dmigs/rnam par shes pa'i khams su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/ma rig pa'ang mi dmigs/ma rig
151a5('bum): par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/'du byed kyang mi dmigs/'du byed du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/rnam par shes par gdags pa'ang
151a6('bum): mi dmigs/ming dang gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ming dang gzugs su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/skye mched drug kyang mi dmigs/skye mched drug tu gdugs pa'ang mi
151a7('bum): dmigs/reg pa'ang mi dmigs/reg par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/tshor ba'ang mi dmigs/tshoro bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sred pa'ang mi dmigs/sred
151b1('bum): par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/len pa'ang mi dmigs/len par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/srid pa'ang mi dmigs/srid par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/skye ba'ang mi
151b2('bum): dmigs/skye bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rga shi'ang mi dmigs/rga shir gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
151b3('bum): phyin par gdogs pa'ang mi dmigs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
151b4('bum): po'ang mi dmigs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags
151b5('bum): pa'ang mi dmigs/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi
151b6('bum): dmigs/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/phyi stong pa nyid kyang
151b7('bum): mi dmigs/phyi stong pa nyid du gdogs pa'ang mi dmigs/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/phyi nang stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/stong pa nyid stong pa
152a1('bum): nyid kyang mi dmigs/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/chen po stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs
152a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/don dam pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/'dus byas stong pa nyid du gdags
152a3('bum): pa'ang mi dmigs/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs//
152a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang
152a5('bum): mi dmigs/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/rang bzhin stong
152a6('bum): pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
152a7('bum): nyid kyang mi dmigs/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gdags
152b1('bum): pa'ang mi dmigs/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du
152b2('bum): gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
152b3('bum): kyang mi dmigs/dran pa nye bar bzhag par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs/yang dag par spong bar gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rdzu 'phrul
152b4('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs/dbang por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/stobs rnams kyang mi
152b5('bum): dmigs/stobs su gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs/byang chub kyi yan lag tu gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/'phags pa'i lam yan
152b6('bum): lag brgyad pa'ang mi dmigs/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/'phags pa'i bden par
152b7('bum): gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs/bsam gtan du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/tshad med par gdags
153a1('bum): yarnams cang me dminas/rnam pa dag pa gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnams par 'ju pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/mthar gyis rnanas
153a2('bum): rnams par 'thun par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rnam par bar badzi na stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /ldan pa med pa'ang me migs/rnam par thar pa'i sgo spyo
153a3('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /snron pa myed par gdags pa'ang mi migs/mngon par shes pa rnams snang mi dmigs/mngon par shes pa sa dgus pa 'ang me kyi
153a4('bum): de 'dzin nams kyang mi dmigs/t-ing nge 'dzin du ga gsapa 'ang mi dmigs/zungs kyi so rnams kya mye migs/kluzungs kyis pa dngag su 'ang meng mesmras/de bzhin
153a5('bum): shigs pa'i skyob snarnams mi dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs spyi gdags pa'ang mi rnam gas/ma 'dzags pa nam/ mi dmigs/myi 'dzigs pa
153a6('bum): gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/so so yang dag par rig par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/byams pa chen po'ang mi dmigs//
153b1('bum): byams pa chen por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/snying rje chen po'ang mi dmigs/snying rje chen por gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs//
153b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/lan
153b3('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang mi dmigs/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur
153b4('bum): gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/dgra bcom pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rang byang chub kyang mi dmigs/rang byang chub tu gdags pa'ang
153b5('bum): mi dmigs/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs/rnam
153b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so//mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang mi dmigs/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gdags pa'ang mi
153b7('bum): dmigs/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'ang mi dmigs/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gdags pa'ang mi dmigs na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom za
154a1('bum): bar 'gyur ba lhag pas 'ong /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma la
154a2('bum): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar rgyun du chos bstan na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sprul pa de dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba lta yod
154a3('bum): dam/lon cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'dres bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
154a4('bum): 'gyur ba'i skal ba yod dram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar de dag la dngos po ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
154a5('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/chos thams cad la dngos po med na/sems can gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun du zhugs
154a6('bum): pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/bla na med pa yang dag par
154a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dgod par bya ste/gzhan du na phyin ci log gis yongs su 'khris pa'i skye dgu dag phyin ci log med pa la gzhog go/'dul lo//rab tu 'god do//phyin ci
154b1('bum): log gang yin pa de'ang rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir/phyin ci log ma yin pa ste/rnam par rtog pa med pa ni phyin ci log ma yin pa'o//gang la phyin ci log med pa de la bdag med do//sems/
154b2('bum): can med do//srog med do//'gro ba med do//gso ba med do//skyes bu med do//gang zag med do//shed can med do//shad ngo dag med do//byed pa po med do//tshor ba po
154b3('bum): med do//shes pa po med do//mthong ba po med do//de la gzugs med do//tshor ba med do//'du shes med do//'du byed med do//rnam par shes pa med do//de la mig med do//
154b4('bum): rna ba med do//snga med do//lce mang do//lus med do//yid med do//de la gzugs med do//sgra med do//dri med do//ro med do//reg med do//chos med do//de la mig gi
154b5('bum): rnam par shes pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa med do//lce'i rnam par shes pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do//yid kyi rnam par
154b6('bum): shes pa med do//de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te
154b7('bum): reg pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do//de la mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba med do//sna'i 'dus te ngag
155a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
155a2('bum): gyis tshor ba med do//de la sa'i khams med do//chu'i khams med do//me'i khams med do//rlung gi khams med do//nam mkha'i khams med do//rnam par shes pa'i khams
155a3('bum): med do//de la ma rig pa med do//'du byed med do//rnam par shes pa med do//ming dang gzugs med do//skye mched drug med do//reg pa med do//tshor ba med do//sred pa
155a4('bum): med do//len pa med do//srid pa med do//skye ba med do//rga shi med do//de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bzod pa'i pha
155a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//de la nang stong pa nyid
155a6('bum): med do//phyi stong pa nyid med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do//chen po stong pa nyid med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid med do//'dus byas
155a7('bum): stong pa nyid med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do//maH'alas 'das pa stong pa nyid med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med
155b1('bum): do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med
155b2('bum): do/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do//de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams med do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
155b3('bum): pa rnams med do//dbang po rnams med do//skyongs rnams med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do//de la 'phags pa'i
155b4('bum): bden pa rnams med do//bsam gtan rnams med do//tshad med pa rnams meng ngo //gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do//de la rnam par thar pa rnams med do///
155b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa med do//mngon par shes pa rnams
155b6('bum): med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams med do//so so yang dag
155b7('bum): par rig pa rnams med do//byams pa chen po med do//snying rje chen po med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do//de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do///
156a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//dgra bcom pa nyid med do//rang byang chub med do//thams cad shes pa nyid med
156a2('bum): do//de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya
156a3('bum): gya lnga pa//gang la gzugs med pa dang /tshor ba med pa dang /'du shes med pa dang /'du byed med pa dang /rnam par shes pa med pa dang /gang la mig med pa dang /rna ba med
156a4('bum): pa dang /sna med pa dang /lce med pa dang /lus med pa dang /yid med pa dang /gang la gzugs med pa dang /sgra med pa dang /dri med pa dang /ro med pa dang /reg med pa dang /

156a6('bum): dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang /gang la mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /sna'i
156a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang /gang la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
156b1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
156b2('bum): med pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /gang la sa'i khams med pa dang /chu'i khams med

156b4('bum): byed med pa dang /rnam par shes pa med pa dang /ming dang gzugs med pa dang /skye mched drug med pa dang /reg pa med pa dang /tshor ba med pa dang /sred pa med pa dang /len
156b5('bum): pa med pa dang /srid pa med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /rga shi med pa dang /gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /bzod
156b6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang /gang
156b7('bum): la nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid med pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang /don dam pa stong
157a1('bum): pa nyid med pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma
157a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
157a3('bum): med pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang /gang
157a4('bum): la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med pa dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med pa dang /dbang po rnams med pa dang /stobs rnams med pa
157a5('bum): dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa dang /gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med pa dang /bsam gtan rnams
157a6('bum): med pa dang /tshad med pa rnams med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med pa dang /gang la rnam par thar pa rnams med pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
157a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams med pa dang /
157b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams med pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams med pa dang /gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med pa dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams med pa dang /so so yang dag par
157b2('bum): rig pa rnams med pa dang /byams pa chen po med pa dang /snying rje chen po med pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med pa dang /gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med
157b3('bum): pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid med pa dang /rang byang chub med pa dang /gang la thams cad shes pa nyid med pa dang //
157b4('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
157b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams sems can gyi 'du shes las 'grel te/gzugs
157b6('bum): kyi 'du shes las 'grel to//gzugs med pa'i 'du shes las 'grel to//zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bar las 'grel to//gang zag pa med pa'i chos 'di lta
157b7('bum): ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags
158a1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /'phags pa'i badren pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa
158a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so
158a3('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang de la don drum pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de lta
158a4('bum): bu ma yin te/'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa dang /ma skyes pa dang /dngos po med pa dang /'byung ba med pa 'di ni rang bzhini stong pa nyid do//de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
158a5('bum): rnams kyi byang chub ste/de la bdog med do//sems can med do//srog med do//skye ba po med do//gso ba po med do//skyes bu med do//gang zag med do//shed can
158a6('bum): med do//shed bdag med do//byed pa po med do//tshor ba po med do//shes pa po med do//mthong ba po med do//gzugs med do//tshor ba med do//'du shes med
158a7('bum): do//'du byed med do//rnam par shes pa med do//mig med do//rna ba med do//sna med do//lce med do//lus med do//yid med do//gzugs med do//sgra med do//
158b1('bum): dri med do//ro med do//reg med do//chos med do//mig gi rnam par shes pa med do//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do//sna'i rnam par shes pa med do//lce'i rnam par shes/
158b2('bum): pa med do//lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do//yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa med
158b3('bum): do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//rna ba'i 'dus te reg
158b4('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do///
158b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do//sa'i khams med do//chu'i khams med do//me'i khams med do//rlung gi khams med do//nam mkha'i khams med do//rnam
158b6('bum): par shes pa'i khams med do//ma rig pa med do//'du byed med do//rnam par shes pa med do//ming dang gzugs med do//skye mched drug med do//reg pa med do//tshor
158b7('bum): ba med do//sred pa med do//len pa med do//srid pa med do//skye ba med do//rga shi med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do///
159a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
159a2('bum): do//nang stong pa nyid med do//phyi stong po nyid med do//phyi nang stong pa nyid med do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do//chen po stong po nyid med do//don dam pa stong pa nyid med do//
159a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid med do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
159a4('bum): med do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do//dngos po med pa stong
159a5('bum): pa nyid med do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams med do//rdzu
159a6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med do//dbang po rnams med do//stobs rnams med do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do//'phags
159a7('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams med do//bsam gtan rnams med do//tshad med pa rnams med do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do//rnam par thar pa brgyad med do//mthar
159b1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /sman pa med pa med do//mngon par shes pa rnams med do//ting nge
159b2('bum): 'dzin rnams med do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do//mi 'jigs pa rnams med do//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi med do//
159b3('bum): byams pa chen po med do//snying rje chen po med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do//mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis med do//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu med do//
159b4('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do//dgra bcom pa nyid med do//rang byang chub med do//lam gyi rnam
159b5('bum): pa shes pa nyid med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni gzhan du na/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las
159b6('bum): lam gyi don du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa med de/rang bzhin stong pa nyid da'ang snga nas kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid/phyin chad kyang rang bzhin gyis
159b7('bum): stong pa nyid/bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de/de nam yang rang bzhin gyis mi stong pa ma yin no//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang rang bzhin
160a1('bum): gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can du 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can gyi 'du shes yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir lam
160a2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do//de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi lam dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam
160a3('bum): dang /lam thams cad la spyod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/sangs
160a4('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de bla na med pa
160a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi tshul rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rgyun mi gcod do//de ni sangs rgyas bcom
160a6('bum): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul te/'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/rang bzhin stong
160a7('bum): pa nyid do//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//
160b1('bum): daltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/rang bzhin stong pa nyid
160b2('bum): de/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma gtogs par gzhan las 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
160b3('bum): pos rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams
160b4('bum): par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad la spyod cing
160b5('bum): gzugs kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//tshor ba'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//'du shes kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa
160b6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan no//'du byed kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//mig kyang gzhan no///

161a6('bum): banan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan no//

162b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//
162b6('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//chos thams cad
162b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//mi dmigs pa
163a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//ngo bo nyid stong
163a2('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//dran pa nye bar
163a3('bum): bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
163a4('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//dbang po rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//stobs rnams kyang gzhan no//rang
163a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan no///
163a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin
163a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan no//
163b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan no//
163b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//mngon par
163b3('bum): shes pa rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan no//
163b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin
163b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//byams pa chen po'ang gzhan no//rang bzhi ni stong pa nyid kyang
163b6('bum): gzhan no//snying rje chen po'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
163b7('bum): no//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//phyir
164a1('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang byang chub
164a2('bum): kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid
164a3('bum): kyang gzhan no//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan no zhes bgyi bar rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'khrugs par mi bgyid kyi/gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin
164a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//'du shes nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa
164a5('bum): nyid kyang 'du shes so//'du byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin
164a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//mig nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig go/rna ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa
164a7('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'o//sna nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'o//lce nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'o//lus
164b1('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus so//yid nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid do//gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin
164b2('bum): stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so//sgra nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o//dri nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin

164b4('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos so//mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes
164b5('bum): pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//
164b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o//lus kyi rnam
164b7('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin
165a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o//na
165a2('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin
165a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
165a4('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid
165a5('bum): kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
165a6('bum): tshor ba'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//sna'i 'dus
165a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
165b1('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//nga
165b2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi
165b3('bum): 'dub te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshur ba'o//sa'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so//chu'i khams nyid kyang rong bzhin stong pa nyid do//
165b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so//me'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhini stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so//rlung gi khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
165b5('bum): do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so//nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//rnam par shes pa'i
165b6('bum): khams nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so//ma rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma
165b7('bum): rig pa'o//'du byed nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do//rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam
166a1('bum): par shes pa'o//ming dang gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so//skye mched drug nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
166a2('bum): do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/reg pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o//tshor ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang
166a3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o//sred pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang smod pa'o//len pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid
166a4('bum): kyang len pa'o//srid pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o//skye ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o//rga shi
166a5('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol
166a6('bum): tu phyin pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
166a7('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong
166b1('bum): pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes
166b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin
166b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do//phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do//phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang
166b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//chen po stong pa nyid kyang

166b6('bum): do//'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin
166b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//thog
167a1('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang /
167a2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
167a3('bum): stong pa nyid do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
167a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi

167a7('bum): kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//
167b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin
167b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//dbang po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//
167b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so//byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rang bzhini stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//'phags pa'i
167b4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa

167b6('bum): tshad med pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin
167b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so//
168a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//
168a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
168a3('bum): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'o//mngon par shes pa nyid kyang ring bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so//ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rang
168a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so//gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so///
168a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rang bzhin
168a6('bum): stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so//so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag
168a7('bum): par rig pa rnams so//byams pa chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o//snying rje chen po nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
168b1('bum): do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//rgyun
168b2('bum): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
168b3('bum): do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
168b4('bum): bu'o//dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do//rang byang chub nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
168b5('bum): rang byang chub bo//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang
168b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar spyod pa ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor re re bzhin no///
168b7('bum): de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang gzhan la/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/tshor ba'ang gzhan la/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/
169a1('bum): hUM/'du shes kyang gzhan pa/rang bzhin spyod pa nyid kyang gzhan/'du byed/ gzhan pa/rang brgyan stong pa nyid kyang gnan/rnam par shes pa nga gargyun smra da/

172a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan yin te/gal te gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
172a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
172a6('bum): gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te tshor
172a7('bum): ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi
172b1('bum): rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshor ba rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /
172b2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
172b3('bum): chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems
172b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o///
172b5('bum): gal te 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
172b6('bum): 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du byed rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong
172b7('bum): du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni//
173a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir rnam
173a2('bum): par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas
173a3('bum): shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te mig rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na nI/byang chub sems dpa' sems
173a4('bum): dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir mig rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir
173a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig rang bzhin gyis skyong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
173a6('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
173a7('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir rna ba rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba rang bzhin
173b1('bum): glos stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o//gal te sna rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin
173b2('bum): ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chung mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir sna rang bzhin gyis
173b3('bum): stong ngas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
173b4('bum): tu mngon par rtogs par 'ching rgya'o//gal te lce rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na nI/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
173b5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir lce rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lce rang bzhin
173b6('bum): gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te lus rang bzhin gyis stong pa
173b7('bum): zhig mi yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi
174a1('bum): phyir lus rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing //
174a2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te yid rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems
174a3('bum): dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir yid rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang
174a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
174a5('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
174a6('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs rang bzhin gyis stong pas nu/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs
174a7('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te sgra rang bzhin
174b1('bum): gyis sbyong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor
174b2('bum): gang gi phyir sgra rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa
174b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya'o//gal te dri rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin nu ni/byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po'ang
174b4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir dri rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
174b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po dri rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
174b6('bum): gal te ro rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
174b7('bum): mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir ro rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas
175a1('bum): shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te reg rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub
175a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir reg rang bzhin gyis stong pas
175a3('bum): na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
175a4('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te chos rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
175a5('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir chos rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rang
175a6('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te mig gi rnam par shes
175a7('bum): pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
175b1('bum): mirmya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin
175b2('bum): gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin
175b3('bum): gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor
175b4('bum): gang gi phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya/
175b5('bum): bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
175b6('bum): zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi
175b7('bum): phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du
176a1('bum): chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o//gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa

176a3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud

176a6('bum): shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas

176b3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig mo yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems

176b5('bum): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
176b6('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med
176b7('bum): po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/rab 'byor gang gi phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pas na/de'i phyir byang chub
177a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stod dro zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
177a2('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa

177a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar khong du chud par byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
177a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par
