266a6('bum): logs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci tshad med pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu
266a7('bum): yod dam/yod par gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
266b1('bum): stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur
266b2('bum): tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par do ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci rnam par
266b3('bum): zathar pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan
266b4('bum): 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dngos po
266b5('bum): gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log
266b6('bum): ma gtogs par de ni ma logs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA radwa ti'i bu ci rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i
266b7('bum): dngos po gang la byis pa sa so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yid par gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byin
267a1('bum): ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa
267a2('bum): so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur tA ma/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs
267a3('bum): par de ni mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par
267a4('bum): gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das
267a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur
267a6('bum): tam+ba/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci lob ma gtogs par de ni mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i
267a7('bum): bu ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur tam/yod par
267b1('bum): 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA radwa ti'i bu ci mi 'jigs pa rnams
267b2('bum): kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci
267b3('bum): log ma gtogs par de ni ma lagaso so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
267b4('bum): mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so//
267b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci byams pa chen po'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par
267b6('bum): gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs por de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci
267b7('bum): snying rje chen po'i dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom
268a1('bum): ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
268a2('bum): bco brgyad kyi dngos po gang lo byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/yod par gyur tam/yod par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom
268a3('bum): ldan 'das phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/chos thams cad dngos
268a4('bum): po med pa lo phyin ci log gi dbang gis sems can rnams rnam par rtog ste/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
268a5('bum): tshe/thabs mkhas pas/chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug go/gsol pa/bcom
268a6('bum): ldan 'das thabs mkhas pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
268a7('bum): chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
268b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos gang yang gang la thogs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po 'am/gang la thogs par gyur nas zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/zhum par
268b2('bum): gyur nas/sgyid lug por 'gyur po 'am/sgyid lug par gyur nas/tshi chad par 'gyur ba 'am chi chad par gyur nas/le lor 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
268b3('bum): ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can rnams rmongs pos phung po zhes bya ba 'am/khams zhes bya ba 'am/skye mched ces bya ba 'am/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'am/rten cing
268b4('bum): 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par/chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o//srog med pa'o//srog dang bral ba'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo
268b5('bum): bo nyid do//rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'o//de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
268b6('bum): chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong nas sgyu ma'i mkhan po lta bu'i lus byin
268b7('bum): gyis brlabs nas/sems can rnams la chos ston te/sems can gang ser sna can du gyur pa de dag la sbyin pa'i gtam byed do//tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams la tshul khrims
269a1('bum): kyi gtam byed do//gnod sems can rnams la bzod pa'i gtam byed do//le lo can rnams la brtson 'grus kyi gtam byed do//sems g.yeng ba rnams la
269a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi gtam byed do//shes rab 'chal pa can rnams la shes rab kyi gtam byed do//gang gi tshe sems can de dag sbyin pa la bkod par gyur pa dang /tshul khrims la
269a3('bum): bkod par gyur pa dang /bzod pa la bkod par gyur pa dang /brtson 'grus la bkod par gyur pa dang /ting nge 'dzin la bkod par gyur pa dang /shes rab la bkod par gyur pa de'i
269a4('bum): tshe/de las gong du sems can de dag la 'phags pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang gis/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
269a5('bum): bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang /lam gyi rnam
269a6('bum): pa shes pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gtam byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
269a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de ltar sems can ma mchis shing /yang dag par ma mchis pa rnams sbyin pa la sbyor/tshul khrims
269b1('bum): la sbyor/bzod pa la sbyor/brtson 'grus la sbyor/ting nge 'dzin la sbyor/shes rab la sbyor zhing de las gong du 'phags pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang gis/rgyun du zhugs
269b2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par
269b3('bum): 'gyur ba dang /rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gtam
269b4('bum): bgyid na/ji ltar dmigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
269b5('bum): pa la spyod pa la dmigs pa gang yang med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/kun
269b6('bum): rdzob kyi bo rngas tha snyad du spyod pa ma gtogs par/sems can gang yang mi dmigs te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/kun rdzob
269b7('bum): kyi bden pa dang /don dam pa'i bdon pa dang /bden pa gnyis la gnas nas/sems can rnams la chos ston kyang shA ra dwa ti'i bu bden pa gnyis la sems can du dmigs
270a1('bum): pa med de/sems can du gdags pa'ang med do//'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
270a2('bum): pa'i tshe/sems can rnams la chos ston na/des sems can de dag tshe 'di nyid la bdag tu mi dmigs na/gang thob par bya ba dang /gang gis thob par bya ba lta ci smos te/
270a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas/sems can rnams lo chos ston to//gsol
270a4('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang yang gcig pa 'am/tha dad par yang mi dmigs pas de lta bu'i go cha 'tshal ba dang /go/
270a5('bum): cha 'tshal bas 'dod pa'i khams na'ang mi gda'/gzugs mchis pa'i khams na'ang mi gda'/gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams na'ang mi gda'/'dus byas kyi khams
270a6('bum): na'ang mi gda'/'dus ma byas kyi khams na'ang mi gda' la/sems can rnams kyang khams gsum nas 'grel cing /sems can du'ang mi dmigs/sems can
270a7('bum): du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs pa de ni spro ba chen po dang ldan pa ste/sems can du gdags pa ma mchis pas/sems can bcings pa dang grol ba ma mchis/sems
270b1('bum): can bcings pa dang grol ba ma mchis pas/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pas ldum gyi rgyud rnams
270b2('bum): tha dad pa ma mchis/lam gyi rgyud rnams tha dad pa ma mchis pa la las dang nyon mongs pa ma mchis te/las dang nyon mongs pa ma mchis na/rnam par smin pa gang gis bdag gi matra/
270b3('bum): sems can 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa de lta bu'ang ga las mchi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin
270b4('bum): te/tshig ji skad du brjod pa bzhin te/gal te sngon sems can zhig byung bar gyur la phyis 'byung ba med par gyur tam/'o na de ni de bzhin du sngon yod pa las phyis med par gyur
270b5('bum): ta ma/'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba sngon yod la phyis med par gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' la'ang 'das pa de lta bur gyur na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs
270b6('bum): pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/chos de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang //
270b7('bum): chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de bzhin du gnas
271a1('bum): pa ste/de la bdag kyang med/sems can yang med/srog kyang med/'gro ba'ang med/gso ba'ang med/skyes bu'ang med/gang zag kyang med/shed can yang
271a2('bum): med shed bdag kyang med/byed pa po'ang med/tshor ba po'ang med/shes pa po'ang med/mthong ba po'ang med na/de la gzugs lta ga la yod/tshor ba lta ga la yod/'du
271a3('bum): shes lcu ga la yod/'du byed lta ga la yod/rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/mig lta ga la yod/rna ba lta ga la yod/sna lta ga la yod/lce lta ga la yod/lus lta ga la
271a4('bum): yod/yid lta ga la yod/gzugs lta ga la yod/sgra lta ga la yod/dri lta ga la yod/ro lha ga la yod/reg lta ga la yod/chos lta ga la yod/mig gi rnam par shes
271a5('bum): pa lta ga la yod/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/sna'i rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/lce'i rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/lus kyi rnam par shes pa lta ga la
271a6('bum): yod/yid kyi rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/mig gi 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/sna'i 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/lce'i
271a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lta ga la yod/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/
271b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/lus kyi 'du
271b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lta ga la yod/sa'i khams lta ga la yod/chu'i khams lta ga la yod/me'i khams lhag
271b3('bum): la yod/rlung gi khams lta ga la yod/nam mkha'i khams lta ga la yod/rnam par shes pa'i khams lta ga la yod/ma rig pa lta ga la yod/'du byed lta ga la yod//
271b4('bum): rnam par shes pa lta ga la yod/ming dang gzugs lta ga la yod/skye mched drug lta ga la yod/reg pa lta ga la yod/tshor ba lta ga la yod/sred pa lta ga la yod/len pa
271b5('bum): lha ga la yod/srid pa lta ga la yod/skye ba lta ga la yod/rga shi lta ga la yod/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams lta'ang ga la yod de/chos de dag med na 'gro ba lnga'i
271b6('bum): 'khor ba gang nas sems can rnams dgrol bar bya ba de lta bu dag lta'ang ga la yod de/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom
271b7('bum): ldan 'das rnams las de lta bu'i chos ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de dag thos nas/sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste//
272a1('bum): phyin ci log gi byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa ma gtogs par sems can nam/chos gang yang dmigs pa med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
272a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i go cha chen po gyon te/go cha de bgos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog ste/bdag gis ni bla
272a3('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar bya ba ma yin gyi/gdon mi za bar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
272a4('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o//de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /sems can rnams kyi don chos bzhin du byas te/don bya ba des
272a5('bum): sems can rnams phyin ci log las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o snyam mo//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/sprul pa'i skyes bu zhig gis/srog chags
272a6('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po sprul te/bza' ba dang /bca' ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba shin tu mang bas tshim par byas te/de ltar tshim por byas nas bdag gis ni
272a7('bum): bsod nams mang po spel to//bdag gis ni bsod nams mang po spel to zhes ched du brjod na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems de la la la zhig bstan te tshim par byas
272b1('bum): pa'am/la las bsod nams 'phel bar byas pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du
272b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
272b3('bum): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
272b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /chen po stong pa
272b5('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /'dus mi byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
272b6('bum): nyid la spyad pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong po nyid la spyod pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /chos thams cad stong
272b7('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa
273a1('bum): nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod pa dang //
273a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /dbang po lnga la spyod pa dang /stobs lnga la spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lago bdun la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i la mo yan lag
273a3('bum): brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
273a4('bum): 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
273a5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la
273a6('bum): spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /byams pa chen
273a7('bum): po la spyod pa dang /snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sangs
273b1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshe/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/sems can la la zhig dmigs par byas shing gdul bar bya ba de lta bu'i sems can gang
273b2('bum): yang mi dmigs so///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya dgu bcu pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan
273b3('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyi lam gang lo spyad de/sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyis
273b4('bum): dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
273b5('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
273b6('bum): bzung pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/btsun 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong/bsnam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbrid/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong /na
273b7('bum): nyid la spyod/phyi stong pa nyid la spyod/phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/chen po stong pa nyid la spyod/don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/'dus byas stong
274a1('bum): pa nyid la spyod/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/dor ba med pa stong
274a2('bum): pa nyid la spyod/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod/dngos po
274a3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la spyod/yang dag par spong ba
274a4('bum): bzhi la spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod/dbang po lnga la spyod/stobs lnga la spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
274a5('bum): spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod/bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/tshad med pa bzhi la spyod/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod/rnam par thar
274a6('bum): pa brgyad la spyod/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu lo spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod/
274a7('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod/ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod/mi 'jigs pa
274b1('bum): bzhi la spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod/byams pa chen po la spyod/snying rje chen po la spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod cing /sems cam
274b2('bum): rnams yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
274b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpo'i
274b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/sbyin pa byin nas 'di skad du 'dems shing rjes su ston te/
274b5('bum): rigs kyi bu dag sbyin pa la bzung bas ma 'dzin cig/smyon pa la gzung bas 'dzin ci lus grang mngon par grub pas/sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta
274b6('bum): bu'i lus mngon par grub pa re/rigs kyi bu dag 'di la don dam par na sbyin pa'ang med/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang med/sbyin pa'i bdug po'ang med/len pa'ang med de/chos
274b7('bum): de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o//rang bzhin gyis stong po'i chos ni len pa med de/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gzung du med pa'o zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston
275a1('bum): te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de ltar sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong
275a2('bum): yang sbyin pa mi dmigs so//sbyin pa'i bdag po mi dmigs so//len pa mi dmigs so//de ni mi dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/'di ltar skyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin
275a3('bum): pa'o//de chos gsum po de dag thams cad mi dmigs pas/sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro//phyir
275a4('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro//dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro//rang byang chub la sbyor ro//lam gyi rnam pa shes po nyid la sbyor ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
275a5('bum): pa'i byang chub la sbyor ro//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams yongs su smin
275a6('bum): par byed de/de bdog nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo//sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do//sems can gzhan gang sbyin
275a7('bum): pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi 'ong legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bor spyod de/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin
275b1('bum): zhing /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal
275b2('bum): ba mnyam par skye'o//khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'thob bo//de dag na'ang sems can de dag bsdu ba'o dngos po bzhis yongs su sdud de/bzhi
275b3('bum): gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pas yongs su sdud do//de da ltar sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can de dag kyang rim gyis tshul
275b4('bum): khrims la rab tu 'god do//bzod pa la rab tu 'god do//brtson 'grus la rab tu 'god do//ting nge 'dzin+do la rab tu 'god do//shes rab la rab tu 'god do//bsam gtan/
275b5('bum): bzhi la rab tu 'god do//tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la rab tu 'grong
275b6('bum): do//yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu 'god do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do//dbang po lnga la rab tu 'god do//stobs lnga la rab tu 'god do//byang chub kyi
275b7('bum): yan lag bdun la rab tu 'god do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do//rnam par thar pa brgyad la rab
276a1('bum): tu 'god do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rab tu 'god do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
276a2('bum): med pa la rab tu 'god do//mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu 'god do//ting nge 'dzin rnams la rab tu 'god do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god do//yang dag pa'i
276a3('bum): skyon med par 'jug par byed do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byed do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed
276a4('bum): do//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do//rang byang chub thob par byed do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul lo//kye skyes bu dag bla na
276a5('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi dka' ste/phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pa ma
276a6('bum): gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa med kyis/phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod
276a7('bum): la/'khor ba las bdag cag kyang thar par gyis shig/gzhan yang thar par gyis shig/de ltar khyed bdag cag kyang don chen po gyis shig/gzhan yang don chen po
276b1('bum): la sbyor cig ces yang dag par skul ba byed de/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/de ltar spyod pa'i tshe
276b2('bum): ci nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa na sngo nye bar bzung ste/nam yang ngan song du mi ltung ba dang /nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mi byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do//
276b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa bon ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di
276b4('bum): snyam du sems te/bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par/gzhan gyi don du 'khor los sgyur ba yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes de la 'di skad ces zer te/su ci
276b5('bum): 'dod pa de khyed la byin gyis 'di ni nga'i ma yin gyi khyed kyi'o//nga ni nang gi gzugs la'ang don du gnyer ba med na/gzhan lta ci smos te/gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi
276b6('bum): don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi/bdag ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no zhes te/de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /snying rje chen pos
276b7('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu mi dmigs te/gzhan du na 'du shes dang ming dang /tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/rnam par
277a1('bum): spyod pa de'ang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du med par shes so//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
277a2('bum): la de ltar spyad par byas te/spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdog gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba med par bya na/phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis
277a3('bum): sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya ba dag lta smos su'ang med pa de ltar spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/yo byad de dgo gang logs/bcom ldan 'das
277a4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//brtson 'grus kyi
277a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//bsam btan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad ngo //phyi stong pa
277a6('bum): nyid ni yo byed do//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//chen po stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//don dam pa stong pa nyid na yo byad do//'dus
277a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad de//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//
277b1('bum): dor med pa stong pa nyid ni yo byed do//rang bzhin snang pa nyid no ya byung //chos thams cad spyad pa nyid na ya byud do//rang ga mtshan nyid spyod pa nyid na ya d+d+ha dang //mi dmigs pa/
277b2('bum): stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//nga ba nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dran pa nye bar bzhan
277b3('bum): pa rnams ni yo byad do//yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yo byad do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yo byad ngo //dbang po rnams ni yo byad do//stobs rnams ni yo byad do//byang chub
277b4('bum): kyi yan lag rnams ni yo byad de//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yo byad do//'dogos pa'i bden pa rnams ni yo khyod de//bsam gtan rnams ni ye byad do//
277b5('bum): tshad med pa rnams ni yo byad do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do//rnam par gyur pa rnams ni yo byad do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
277b6('bum): parnams na yo byad do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni yo byad do//mngon por shes pa rnams ni yo byad do//ting nge 'dzin
277b7('bum): rnams ni yo byad do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yo byad do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yo byad do//mi 'jigs pa rnams ni yo byad do//so so yang dag par rig
278a1('bum): pa rnams ni yo byad ngo //byams pa chen po ni yo byad do//snying rje chen po ni yo byad do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni yo byad do//de dag ni
278a2('bum): yo byad de/yo byad de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su bsngos shing rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/theg pa chen po 'am/theg pa
278a3('bum): gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin
278a4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
278a5('bum): spyod cing /sems can rnams tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol
278a6('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/de sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe 'di skad ces brjod do//rigs kyi bu dag tshuro shig/tshul
278a7('bum): khro mos srungs shig/ngas khyed zas dang /skom dang /gos dang /bzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug
278b1('bum): pa dang /khyim dang /nor dang /'bru dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shol dang /b+hu ru dang /gser dang /dngul dang /mi'i rkyen dang /yo byad
278b2('bum): gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa med par bya'o//khyed kyang phongs pas tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod grang na khyed yo byad thams cad dang rin po che sna bdun gyi bar gyis phongs pa med
278b3('bum): par byas/des khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims la mnos la/rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa'am
278b4('bum): theg pa gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal mthar phyin par gyis shig ces nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo //gzhan yang
278b5('bum): tshul khrims la yang dag par skul lo//tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do//sems can gzhan grang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga'
278b6('bum): bar spyod do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar zhing /tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/rim gyis theg pa
278b7('bum): gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha
279a1('bum): rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
279a2('bum): la spyod cing /sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
279a3('bum): pa la gnas shing /sems can gang khro ba dang /gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na/de dag la 'di skad ces zer ro//rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su
279a4('bum): byed par gyur/khyed gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang de nga las long zhig dang /ngas khyed zas dang /skom dang /gos dang /bzhon pa dang /mal
279a5('bum): tshwa dang /me tog dang /bdugra spos dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /khyim dang /nor dang /'bru dang /nor bu dang /mu tag dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /mun
279a6('bum): shal dang /byu ru dang /goser dang /dngul dang /mi'i rkyen dang /yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa med par byas/khro ba dang /gnod sems med par gyis
279a7('bum): shig ces/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can de dog bzod pa la sbyor te/'di skad du gcugs
279b1('bum): gang gis khyod kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying po med pa ste/de ltar dngos po gang yang med do//khro ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/dngos po gang gi phyir
279b2('bum): khyad 'thab cing 'khon po dang /gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang /de ltar 'thab cing 'khon te/gnod sems su gyur nas/dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang //
279b3('bum): phan tshun gyi srog la rgal bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la/dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang med na/de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa mo yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/
279b4('bum): sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/byol song gi skye gnas drag tu ltung bar 'gyur/gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag
279b5('bum): tu'ang khyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang /tsha zhing rtsub la yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis/skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po med pa'i chos rnams kyi don du
279b6('bum): las gang yongs su bzung bas mir skye ba'ang 'thob par mi 'gyur na/sangs rgyas byung ba dang phrad par 'gyur ba lta smos su'ang med pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig/
279b7('bum): grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no//mir skye ba 'thob pa ni dkon no//dal pa phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no//'khor ba las thar pa ni dkon no//de lta yin
280a1('bum): gyis dal ba 'di don med par ma bya zhig mi khom par gyur cing gsor mi rung bar gyur ta re zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid
280a2('bum): kyang bzod pa sgrub bo//gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo//bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do//sems can gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi'ang lags
280a3('bum): pa brjod cing /mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar bzod pa la sbyar cing /bzod pa la rab tu
280a4('bum): bkod de/rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
280a5('bum): granas shing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
280a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
280a7('bum): dpa' chen po sems can le lo con brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na 'di skad du khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces brjod de/de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na//
280b1('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/kye skyes bu dag ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/
280b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/bzod pa'i rkyen tam/gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis/brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngaso nye bar bsgrub par byas/brtson
280b3('bum): 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing lus samo/sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/de dag
280b4('bum): lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo//
280b5('bum): de dag bsgoms pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo//dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob bo//
280b6('bum): rang byang chub 'thob bo//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid
280b7('bum): kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo//gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo//brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do//sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag
281a1('bum): gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar
281a2('bum): cing /brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su myo ngan las zlo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin
281a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
281a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /bas mo gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
281a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan lo mnyam paro mi 'jog ces
281a6('bum): brjod de/de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can de dag
281a7('bum): la 'di skad du 'doms te/kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gong gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/
281b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la rkyen gang dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas/rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrubs te/de'i
281b2('bum): phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas/bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms
281b3('bum): por 'jug go/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/byams pa la snyoms par 'jug go/snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go/dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go/
281b4('bum): btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mtshad la snyoms par 'jug go/cung zad med
281b5('bum): pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/'du shes med 'du shes mod min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/de dag bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i
281b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis/sems dul bar gyur pas/dran po nye bar bu dag pa bzhi sgom mo//yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgrom mo//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgrom
281b7('bum): mau//dbang po lnga sgom mo//stobs lnga sgom mo//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo//rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom
282a1('bum): mo//de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/de la la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
282a2('bum): kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam las yongs su mi nyams te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /ting
282a3('bum): nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas/sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
282a4('bum): spyod cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po sbyin pa'i pha
282a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab mi sgom zhes brjod de/de dag
282a6('bum): rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can de dag la 'di skad
282a7('bum): du 'dems te/nga las yo byad rnams long la/sbyin pa byin cig/tshul khrims srungs shig/bzod pa sgomaso shig/brtson 'grus rtsoms shig/ting nge 'dzin la
282b1('bum): mnyam par gzhog cig/rnam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la/bdag gam/sems can nam/srog gam/'gro ba 'am/
282b2('bum): gso ba 'am/skyes bu 'am/gang zag gam/shed can nam/shed bdag gam/byed pa po 'am/tshor ba po 'am/shes pa po 'am/mthong ba po 'am/gzugs sam/tshor
282b3('bum): ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/mig gam/rna ba 'am/sna 'am/lce 'am/lus sam/yid dam/gzugs sam/sgra 'am/dri'am/
282b4('bum): ro'am/reg gam/chos sam/mig gi rnam par shes pa'am/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'am/sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/lus kyi rnam par
282b5('bum): shes pa 'am/yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/lus kyi
282b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa 'am/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
282b7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/sa'i
283a1('bum): khams sam/chu'i khams sam/me'i khams sam/rlung gi khams sam/nam mkha'i khams sam/rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ma rig pa 'am/
283a2('bum): 'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/ming dang gzugs sam/skye mched drug gam/reg pa 'am/tshor ba 'am/sred pa 'am/len pa 'am/srid pa 'am/skye ba 'am/
283a3('bum): rga shi 'am/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam
283a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/nong stong pa nyid dam/phyi stong pa nyid dam/phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/
283a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dam/don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dom/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/thog ma
283a6('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmo/rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam//
283a7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
283b1('bum): rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags
283b2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
283b3('bum): sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
283b4('bum): 'am/mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so
283b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir
283b6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam
283b7('bum): chos gang yang yod dam/yongs su rtogs shig ces 'dems shing rjes su ston te/des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
284a1('bum): tshe/chos gang la dmigs pa mngon par zhon par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/de la mngon par zhen pa med pas/chos gang yang skyob
284a2('bum): 'am/'gag pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/'di ni sems can dmyal
284a3('bum): ba pa'o//'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o//'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o//'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o//'di ni lha'o//'di ni mi'o//'di ni tshu
284a4('bum): khrims dang ldan pa'o//'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can no//'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//'di ni dgra bcom pa'o//
284a5('bum): 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par mi
284a6('bum): rtog ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams
284a7('bum): yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
284b1('bum): sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te//sems can rnams la 'di skad du
284b2('bum): 'dems shing rjes su ston to//sems can khyod ci'i phyir sbyin pa yongs su mi gtong zhes brjod de/de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/de dag la byang chub sems dpa'
284b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'di skad ces zer te/nga las yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig/sbyin pa de la'ang 'dzin pas ma 'dzin cig/sbyin pa de la 'dzin pas 'dzin cing /lus
284b4('bum): gang mngon par grub pas/sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus mngon par grub pa re/rigs kyi bu dag 'di la don dam par na sbyin pa'ang med/sbyin pa'i
284b5('bum): 'bras bu'ang med/sbyin pa'i bdag po'ang med/len pa'ang med de/chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa med/rang
284b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid ni gzung du med pa'o zhes 'dems shing rjes su ston te/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
284b7('bum): spyod cing /sems can rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /de la sbyin par dmigs pa med/sbyin pa'i bdag por dmigs pa med/len par dmigs pa med
285a1('bum): dod/'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/dmigs su med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de chos gsum po de dag thams cad la mi dmigs pas/
285a2('bum): sems can rnams rgyun du zhugaso pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro//dgra bcom pa nyid la
285a3('bum): sbyor ro//rang byang chub la sbyar ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyor ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
285a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/de bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //gzhan
285a5('bum): yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo//sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do//sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi'ang logs pa brjod cing mthun pas
285a6('bum): dga' bar spyod do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par
285a7('bum): skye'o//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//khams kyi rgyal por
285b1('bum): 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob bo//de de dag na'ang sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su sdud do/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang
285b2('bum): don bya ba dang /don mthun pas yongs su sdud do//de de ltar sems can sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa de dag kyang rim gyis tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do//bzod pa la rab tu
285b3('bum): 'god do//brtson 'grus la rab tu 'god do//ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do//shes rab la rab tu 'god do//bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu 'god do//tshad med pa bzhi la
285b4('bum): rab tu 'grod do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do//yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rab tu 'god do///
285b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do//dbang po lnga la rab tu 'grod do//stobs lnga la rab tu 'god do//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rab tu 'god do//'phags pa'i lam
285b6('bum): yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do//rnam par thar pa brgyad la rab tu 'god do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
285b7('bum): pa dgu la rab tu 'god do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la rab tu 'god do//mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu 'god do//ting
286a1('bum): nge 'dzin rnams la rab tu 'grod do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rab tu 'god do//yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug par byed do//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
286a2('bum): bu thob par byed do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do//rang byang chub thob
286a3('bum): par byed do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul bar byed do//kye skyes bu dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon
286a4('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi dka' ste/de la phyin ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems kyis khong du ma chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par
286a5('bum): gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa med kyis/de bas na phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyun chod la 'khor ba las bdag kyang thar par gyis shig/
286a6('bum): gzhan yang thar par gyis shig/de ltar na khyed bdag cag gi don du'ang tshor 'gyur/gzhan yang don chen po la 'byor par 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par skul ba byed de/rab
286a7('bum): 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/de ltar spyod pa'i tshe/ci nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa
286b1('bum): nas nye bar bzung ste/nam yang ngan song du mi ltung ba dang /nam yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mi byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa bon ji lta ba bzhin
286b2('bum): du 'bras bu 'byung ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung du slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dri 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis sems
286b3('bum): can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan gyi don du 'khor los sbyar ba yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes nas/de 'di skad ces zer te/su ci 'dod pa de khyed la byin gyis 'di ni nga'i ma
286b4('bum): yin gyi khyed kyi'o//nga ni nang gi gzugs la'ang don du gnyer ba med na/gzhan la lta ci smos te/gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi/
286b5('bum): bdag ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no zhes te/de snying brtsa bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang
286b6('bum): sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu mi dmigs te/gzhan du na 'du shes dang /ming dang brda'i tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/rnam par spyod pa de'ang sgra brnyan lta bur
286b7('bum): rnam par spyad du med par shes so//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang
287a1('bum): bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba med par byed na/phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs
287a2('bum): su thar par bya ba dag lta smos su'ang med pa de ltar spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/yo byad de dag gong lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
287a3('bum): pa ni yo byad do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//bsam
287a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//nang stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//phyi stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni
287a5('bum): yo byad do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//chen po stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//'dus
287a6('bum): ma byos stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni ye
287a7('bum): byad do//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni
287b1('bum): yo byud ngo //dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni yo byung ngo //ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
287b2('bum): ni yo byad do//yang dag par spang ba rnams ni yo byad do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yo byad do//dbang po rnams ni yo byad do//stobs rnams ni yo byad do//byang chub kyi
287b3('bum): yan lag rnams ni yo byad do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yo byad do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yo byad do//bsam gtan rnams ni yo byad do//ched
287b4('bum): med pa rnams ni yo byad do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do//rnam par thar pa rnams ni yo byad do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
287b5('bum): pa rnams ni yo byad do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /sman pa med pa ni yo byad ngo //mngon par shes pa rnams ni yo byad do//ting nge
287b6('bum): 'dzin rnams ni yo byad do//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yo byad do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yo byad do//mi 'jigs pa rnams ni yo byad do//so so yang
287b7('bum): dag par rig pa rnams ni yo byad do//byams pa chen po ni yo byed do//snying rje chen po ni yo byad do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni yo byad do//de dag ni
288a1('bum): yo byad de/yo byad de dgu gis sems can rnams yongs su bsdus shing /rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi zlog pa 'am/zlog pa
288a2('bum): chen po 'am/theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
288a3('bum): phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
288a4('bum): po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
288a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can rnams la 'di skad du kye sems can dag ci'i phyir khyad tshul khrims mi srung zhes
288a6('bum): 'dems shing rjes su ston par byed de/de dag 'di skad du rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di skad ces
288a7('bum): zer te/chur shig rigs kyi bu dog tshul khrims srungs shog/ngas khyed zas dang /skom dang /gos dang /bzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /me tog dang /bdug spos dang /
288b1('bum): spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /khyim dang /nor dang /'bru dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shol dang /byu ru dang /gla ser dang /dngul
288b2('bum): dang /mi'i rkyen dang /yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa med par bya'o//khyod gang gis phongs pa'i phyir tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod par gyur pa'i yo byad dang
288b3('bum): longs spyod thams cad kyis phongs pa med par byas/khyed sdom pa'i tshul khrims la mnos la/rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/rnam pa
288b4('bum): thams cod mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa 'am/theg po gsum po de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag
288b5('bum): nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo //gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro//tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do//sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi legs pa
288b6('bum): brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar zhing /tshul khrims la rab tu
288b7('bum): bkod de/rim gyis thag pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
289a1('bum): la gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
289a2('bum): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yino zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
289a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can gang khro ba dang /gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na/de dag la 'di skad ces
289a4('bum): zer ro//rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/gang gis phongs shing gnod sems su byed par gyur pa de dang de nga las long zhig/ngas khyed
289a5('bum): zas dang /skom dang /gos dang /bzhon pa dang /mal tsha dang /me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /khyim dang /nor dang /'bru dang /
289a6('bum): nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /mun shUl dang /b+hu ru dang /gser dang /dngul dang /mi'i rkyen dang /yo byad gang ci'ang rung po'i bar gyis phongs pa med
289a7('bum): par byas/khro ba dang /gnod sems med par gyis shig ces bya'o//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
289b1('bum): shing sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/'di skad du gcugs gang gis khyed kyis khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying po med pa ste/de la dngos po gang yang med do//khro ba de ni yang
289b2('bum): dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/dngos po gang gis phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon pa dang /gnod sems su byed par gyur pa'ang da ltar 'thabs shing 'khon te/gnod
289b3('bum): sems su gyur nas dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang /phan tshun gyi srog la rgal bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang med na/de lta yin yang
289b4('bum): khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/byol srong gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/gshin rje'i 'jig
289b5('bum): rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu'ang khyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha zhing rtsub la yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis//skyes
289b6('bum): bu khyed rnams dngos po med pa'i chos kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas mir skye ba'ang 'thob par mi 'gyur na/sangs rgyas byung ba dang phrad par gyur pa lta smos su'ang med
289b7('bum): pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig/grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no//mir skye ba 'thob pa ni dkon no//dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni dkon no//'khor ba
290a1('bum): las mthar pa ni dkon no//de lta yin gyis dal ba 'di don med par ma bya zhig/mi khom par gyur cing gsar mi rung bar gyur ta ro zhes de la byang chub
290a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub la/gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo//bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do//sems can
290a3('bum): gzhan gang bzod pa sgom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag
290a4('bum): de ltar bzod pa la sbyar zhing /bzod pa la rab tu bkod de/rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
290a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa so sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji
290a6('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba
290a7('bum): yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na 'di skad du khyed ci'i phyi rol lo
290b1('bum): byed ces brjod de/de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems
290b2('bum): tso na de dag la 'di skad ces zer te/kye skyes bu dog ngas sbyin pa'i rkyen tam/tshul khrims kyi rkyen tam/bzod pa'i rkyen tamaM/gzhan yang rnam pa gong dang gang gis brtson 'grus
290b3('bum): brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par byas/brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas/sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la
290b4('bum): spyod cing /lus sam sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste/de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/dge ba'i chos de
290b5('bum): dog gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo//de dag bsgoms pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo//phyir mi
290b6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo//dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob blo//rang byang chub 'thob bo//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de
290b7('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsom mo//gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo//brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod
291a1('bum): do//sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems/
291a2('bum): dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar brtson 'grus la sbyar zhing /brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod de/rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/rab

291a4('bum): yongs su sdud pa yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya go gcig pa//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
291a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di
291a6('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems g.yengs par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir bsam gtan la
291a7('bum): mnyam par mi 'jog ces brjod de/de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag la 'di
291b1('bum): skad du 'dems te/kye sems can dag ngas rkyen gang dang gang gis phyi nang gi chos la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub bo zhes smras so//de nas byang chub
291b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can de dag la rkyen nye bar bsgrub par bya'o zhes nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dge lo rkyen gang
291b3('bum): dang gang nye bar bsgrubs pas/rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen nye bar bsgrub ste/de'i phyir de dag rnam par rtog pa chad nas/bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par
291b4('bum): 'jug go/bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go/bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go//byabs pa
291b5('bum): la snyoms par 'jug go/snying rje la snyoms par 'jug go/dga' ba la snyoms par 'jug go/btang snyoms la snyoms par 'jug go//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
291b6('bum): 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug go/de dag bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis sems dul bar gyur pas//
291b7('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi sgom mo//yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo//dbang po lnga sgom mo//stobs lnga sgom mo//byang chub
292a1('bum): kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsgom mo//rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom mo//de dag bsgoms pas rim gyis
292a2('bum): theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/de la la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam lasra yongs su mi nyams te/
292a3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnos shing /ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams

292a6('bum): shes rab 'chal par gyur pa'i sems can dag mthong na/'di skad du sems can khyed ci'i phyir shes rab mi sgom zhes brjod de/de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/

292b1('bum): yo byad rnams long la sbyin pa byin cig/tshul khrims srungs shig/bzod pa sgoms shig/brtson 'grus rtsoms shig/ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cig/rnam
292b2('bum): pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par gyis la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa la bdag gam/sems can nam/srog gam/'gro ba 'am/gso ba 'am/skyes bu 'am/gang
292b3('bum): zag gam/shed can nam/shing bdag gam/byed pa po 'am/tshor ba po'am/shes pa po 'am/mthong ba po'am/gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du
292b4('bum): byed dam/rnam par shes pa'am/khams rnams sam/skye mched rnams sam/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'am/'dod pa'i khams sam/gzugs kyi khams sam/
292b5('bum): gzugs med pa'i khams sam/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam/stong pa nyid thams cad dam/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nam/'phags pa'i badren pa rnams
292b6('bum): sa ma/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sram/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas
292b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'am/mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ting
293a1('bum): 'dzin rnams sam+b+ha/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mI 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/
293a2('bum): snum/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir
293a3('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du chos gang yang yod dam/rtogs shig ces 'doms
293a4('bum): shing rjes su ston te/des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos gang la dmigs pas mngon par zhen par 'gyur
293a5('bum): ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang mi dmigs te/de la mngon par zhen pa med pas/chos gang yang skye ba 'om/'gag pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar yang
293a6('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o//'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o//'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig
293a7('bum): rten pa'o//'di ni lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'o//'di ni lha'o//'di ni mi'o//'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o//'di ni tshul khrims ngan pa can no//'di ni rgyun
293b1('bum): du zhugs pa'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//'di ni dgra bcom pa'o//'di ni rang sangs rgyas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o//'di ni de bzhin
293b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims

293b6('bum): sbyin pa la 'dzin pas ma 'dzin cig/sbyin pa la 'dzin pas 'dzin cing /lus gang mngon par grub pas/sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus
293b7('bum): mngon par grub pa re/rigs kyi bu dag 'od la don dam par na/sbyin pa'ang med/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang med/sbyin pa'i bdag po'ang mod/len pa'ang med de/chos
294a1('bum): de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa med de/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gzung du med pa'o zhes
294a2('bum): byums shing rjes su spyan te/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams la sbyin pa
294a3('bum): yongs su gtong yang de la sbyin par dmigs pa mod/sbyin pa'i bdag por dmigs pa med/len par dmigs pa med de/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
294a4('bum): dmigs su med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de chos gsum po de dag thams cad la mi dmigs pas/sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro//lan
294a5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor ro//dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor ro//rang byang chub la sbyor ro//bla na med pa yang dag par
294a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sbyar ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
294a7('bum): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/de bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par skul lo//sbyin pa'i legs pa
294b1('bum): brjod do//sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
294b2('bum): chen po de'ang de lta bu'i sbyin pa chen po byin pas/rgyal rigs che zhing mtha ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//
294b3('bum): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dag dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o//khams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob bo de de dag na'ang sems can rnams
294b4('bum): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su sdud de/bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don bya ba dang /don mthun pas yongs su sdud do//de de ltar sems can sbyin

294b6('bum): do/shes rab la rab tu 'god do//bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu 'god do//tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu 'god do//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu 'god

295a1('bum): do//stobs lnga la rab tu 'god do//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rab tu 'god do//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rab tu 'god do//'phags

295a5('bum): bu thob par byed do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par byed do//dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byed do//rang byang chub thob par byed do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
295a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed do//kye skyes bu dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi dka' ste/de la phyin
295a7('bum): ci log gis rmongs pa'i sems kyis khong du ma chud pa ma gtogs par chos gang la sems can rnams chags par gyur pa'i chos de lta bu gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa
295b1('bum): med kyis de bas na/phyin ci log gi 'dzin pa thams cad rgyan chod la/'khor ba las bdag cag kyang thar bar gyis shig/gzhan yang thar par gyis shig/de ltar khyed bdag
295b2('bum): cag gi don du'ang tshar 'gyur/gzhan dag kyang don chen po la 'byor par 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par skul ba byed de/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
295b3('bum): pos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/de ltar spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/nam yang ngan song du mi ltung ba dang /nam yang
295b4('bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mi byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa bon ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i drung ngu
295b5('bum): slongs mo pa gang ji snyed cig 'ongs kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan gyi don du 'khor
295b6('bum): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yongs su ma bzung ngo zhes nas/de 'di skad ces zer te/su ci 'dod pa de khyed la byin gyis 'di ni nga'i ma yin gyis khyed kyi'o//nga ni nang gi gzugs
295b7('bum): la'ang don du gnyer ba med na/gzhan lta la ci smos te/gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi/bdag ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no
296a1('bum): zhes te de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang /sems can gang yongs su
296a2('bum): grub pa de lta bu mi dmigs te/gzhan du na 'du shes dang ming dang brda'i tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de/rnam par spyod pa de'ang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du med par shes
296a3('bum): so/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/spyod pa'i
296a4('bum): tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad kyang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba med par bya na/phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gis sems can rnams 'khor po las yongs su
296a5('bum): thar bar bya ba dag lta smos su'ang med pa de ltar spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/yo byad de dag gong lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
296a6('bum): pa ni yo byad do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//bas mo
296a7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yo byad do//nong stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//phyi stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//phyi nang stong pa nyid
296b1('bum): niyo byad do//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//chen po stong pa nyid ni yo byad ngo do//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad ngo //'dus ma
296b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//rang bzhin
296b3('bum): stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
296b4('bum): ni yo byad do//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yo byad do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni yo byad do//yang dag par spong ba
296b5('bum): rnams ni yo byad do//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams ni yo byad do//dbang po rnams ni yo byad do//stobs rnams ni yo byad do//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni yo byad do//'phags
296b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yo byad do//'phags po'i bden pa rnams ni yo byad ngo //bsam gtan rnams ni yo byad do//tshad med pa rnams ni yo byad do//gzugs
296b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do//rnam par thar pa rnams ni yo byad do//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yo byad do//rnam par
297a1('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni yo byad do//mngon par shes pa rnams ni yo byad do//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yo byad ngo do//
297a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yo byad do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yo byad do//mi 'jigs pa rnams ni yo byad do//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yo byad
297a3('bum): do//byams pa chen po ni yo byad de//snying rje chen po ni yo byad do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yo byad ngo //de dag ni yo byad de/yo byad de dag gis sems
297a4('bum): can rnams yongs su bsdus shing rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/theg po chen po 'am/theg po gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya
297a5('bum): ngan las zlo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams
297a6('bum): yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
297a7('bum): sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can rnams la 'di
297b1('bum): skad du chur shog/rigs kyi bu dag tshul khrims srungs shig/ngas khyod la zas dang /skom dang /gos dang /bzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spros dang /
297b2('bum): phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /khyim dang /nor dang /'bru dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /gser dang /dngul dang /mi'i rkyen
297b3('bum): dang /yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa med par bya'o//khyed kyang phongs pa'i phyir tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod par gyur grang na/khyed zas dang /skom dang /gos dang //
297b4('bum): bzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spros dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /khyim dang /nor dang /'bru dang /nor bu dong /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /drung
297b5('bum): dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /gser dang /dngul dang /mi'i rkyen dang /yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba rin po che sna bdun gyi bar gyis phongs pa med par byas/khyed sdom pa'i
297b6('bum): tshul khrims la mnos la/rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi theg pa 'am/thog pa gsum po de dag
297b7('bum): gis sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyis shig ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims srung ngo //gzhan yang tshul khrims la sbyor ro//
298a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do//sems can gzhan gang tshul khrims srung ba de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do//de ltar byang
298a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can de dag de ltar tshul khrims la sbyar zhing tshul khrims la rab tu bkod de/rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan
298a3('bum): las zlo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can
298a4('bum): rnams yongs su sdud pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /bzod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
298a5('bum): sems can rnams sbyor ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sems can gang khro ba dang /
298a6('bum): gnod sems su byed pa dag mthong na/de la 'di skad ces zer ro//rigs kyi bu dag khyed ci'i rgyus gnod sems su byed par gyur/gang gis phyongs shing gnod sems su
298a7('bum): byed par gyur pa de dang de nga las long zhig/ngas khyed zas dang /skom dang /gos dang /bzhon pa dang /mal cha dang /me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /phreng ba
298b1('bum): dang /byug pa dang /khyim dang /nor dang /'bru dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byu ru dang /gser dang /dngul dang /mi'i rkyen dang /yo byad
298b2('bum): gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar gyis phongs pa med par byas/khro ba dang /gnod sems med par gyis shig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
298b3('bum): pa la gnas shing /sems can de dag bzod pa la sbyor te/'di skad du gdugs gang gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni snying po med pa ste/de ltar dngos po gang yang med do//khro ba de
298b4('bum): ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa ste/dngos po gang gi phyir khyed 'thab cing 'khon pa dang /gnod sems su byed par gyur pa dang /de ltar 'thab cing 'khon te/gnod
298b5('bum): sems su gyur nas dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /mtshon gyis 'dre ba dang /phan tshun gyi srog la rgal bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang med na/de lta yin
298b6('bum): yang khyed yang dag pa mi yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na/sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/gshin rje'i 'jig
298b7('bum): rten dag tu lhung bar 'gyur/de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu'ang khyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pa che zhing rtsub la yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyis skyes bu khyed
