373b6('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dag dang mi 'bral bar shog cig ces bya bar sems skyed do//rab 'byor de de
373b7('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/de nas bsam pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs
374a1('bum): par ma gyur gyi bar du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/de bdag nyid kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa yin//
374a2('bum): sems can thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa yin/sems can de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par byed pa yin te/de bdag nyid kyi lus kyang mdzes pa yin/sems
374a3('bum): can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/bsod nams kyis yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la//
374a4('bum): yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs mngon par 'grub ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ltar yongs su dag par byed de/ci nas kyang ngan song gsum
374a5('bum): du gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /lta bar rnam par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug tu gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /bud
374a6('bum): med dang /skyes par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /theg pa gnyis su gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med par gdags
374a7('bum): pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /yongs su 'dzin par gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /bdag dang bdag gir bya bar gdogs pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /kun
374b1('bum): nas ldang bar gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /phyin ci log tu gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid pa dang /'bras bur gdags pa'i ming yang mi srid cing /gzhan du na sems can de dag
374b2('bum): 'dod pa bzhin du shing rlung gis btab pa 'am/phyi nang gi dngos po dag las 'di lta ste/stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /mi skye mi 'gag pa'i
374b3('bum): sgra dang /chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra dang /chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang /chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba bzhin du/ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra dang /
374b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo //gang stong pa de la ni mtshan ma med do///
374b5('bum): gang la mtshan ma med pa de la ni smon pa med do zhes bya bar chos bstan pa'i sgra nyin mtshan rgyun mi chad par 'gro'ang rung /'dug kyang rung /sdod kyang rung /nyan yang rung ste/rtag tu
374b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo //de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
374b7('bum): nas kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
375a1('bum): bzhugs pa de thams cad legs pa brjod par 'gyur te/sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de thams cad kyang /bla na med pa yang dag/
375a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des chos bstan pa na/sems can gang yang 'di ni chos so///
375a3('bum): 'di ni chos ma yin no zhes bya bar the tshom za bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni chos ma yin pa gang yang med de/thams
375a4('bum): cad kyang chos so//de la sems can gang mi dge ba'i rtsa bas non pa dang /sangs rgyas sem sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
375a5('bum): gyis yongs su zin pa bdag tu lta bar byed pa nas lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du bying ba/rtag pa'am chad pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/log por 'dzin pas yang dag par rdzogs
375a6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa la ni/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par 'du shes pa/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa la ni/yang dag par rdzogs
375a7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par 'du shes pa de dag ni chos ma yin pa la'ang chos so zhes zer/chos la'ang chos ma yin no zhes zer te/de dag chos la spong bar 'gyur te/de ltar
375b1('bum): chos spangs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu shi nas dran song dang /ngan 'gro dang /log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/de lta bu dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
375b2('bum): 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /'khor ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sems can de dag sdig par lta ba'i rnam pa de dag
375b3('bum): las rnam par 'grol te/de ltar rnam par bkrol nas nges pa'i phung por rab tu 'god de/der bkod pa rnams phyin chad ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
375b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin te/de ltar yongs su sbyangs pas sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos sam/'jig rten las
375b5('bum): 'das pa'i chos sam/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos sam/zag pa med pa'i chos sam/'dus byas kyi chos sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la'ang gnas par mi 'gyur te/bla na
375b6('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du nges par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o///de nas
375b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges zhes bgyi'am/ma nges zhes bgyi/
376a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa ste/ma nges pa ma yin no//gsol pa/nyan thos
376a2('bum): phung po 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi phung po 'am/phung po gang du nges pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub
376a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phung por nges pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa ma yin gyi/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpango chen po ni
376a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi phung por nges pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges zhes bgyi 'am/'on tam phyir mi
376a5('bum): ldog pa nges zhes bgyi 'am/'on tam srid pa tha ma pa nges zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'ongs kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
376a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni nges pa'o//phyir mi ldog pa ni nges pa'o//srid pa gcig gis thogs pa ni nges pa'o//gsol pa/bcom lda rno 'das nges po'i byang chub sems
376a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/rab 'byor nges pa'i byang
376b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngan song du mi skye'o//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/brgyad pa 'am/rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/phyir mi 'ong
376b2('bum): ba 'am/dgra bcom pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur rom/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
376b3('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sbyin pa gtong ba dang /tshul khrims srung ba dang /bzod pa sgrub pa dang //
376b4('bum): brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /shes rob sgom pa dang /mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i don du gnas pa de ni ngan song du skye bar 'gyur
376b5('bum): ba'i gnas med do//lha tshe ring por skye ba'i gnas med do//gang na dge ba'i chos rnams mi spyod pa de lta bu skye ba'i gnas med do//glen pa dang lkug par 'gyur ba'i yul du skye ba'i
376b6('bum): gnas med do//mtha' 'khob kyi kla klo dang mi srun zhing 'khor bzhi rgyar med pa'i yul du skye ba'i'og nas med do//log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i gnas med do//gang na sangs
376b7('bum): rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bur skye ba'i gnas med do//bya ba ma yin pa'i lta bor ltung ba'i gnas med do//rab
377a1('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lhag pa'obasam
377a2('bum): pas yang dag par rdzogs pa ni/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya ba'i gnas med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar nges po'i byang chub sems
377a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing /tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i gnas su mi skye ba lags na/gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang byol song
377a4('bum): gi rlung du skyes pa'i rabs bstan na/de'i tshe dge ba'i rna ba de dag gang du mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'tshan
377a5('bum): po ni mau ga ba'i las kyis dz+hal seng gi rgyud du skye ba ma yin gyi/lus gang dang gang gis sems rten rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shIg/sem
377a6('bum): can rnams kyi don du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing /rab 'byor de ltar thabs mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol stong gi skye gnas su skyes shing /de la
377a7('bum): la la zhig gsod du 'ongs kyang /bla na med pa'i bzod pas bdag yongs su gtong zhing /sems can de dag la gnod par mi byed pa do lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dog/dge
377b1('bum): bcom pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas dag la yod dam/rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi phyir/bla na med//
377b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /byol song gi skye gnas su skye'ang byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nyes pas mi gos par rig
377b3('bum): par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing /byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin/bcom ldan 'das
377b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba'i dge ba'i chos de lta bu gang zhig yod do/de dge ba'i chos thams
377b5('bum): cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
377b6('bum): ste/snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba med do//dge ba'i chos gang yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag
377b7('bum): par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu med de/de ni gnas ma yin no//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
378a1('bum): chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la bslab par bya ste/de la bslabs na/rnam pa
378a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo//bag chags kyi mtshamos sbyor ba thams cad kyang yongs su spong ngo //gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
378a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos dkar po zag pa ma mchis pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngan song ngam/byol song gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
378a4('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa zag pa med pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lags/bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/de bzhin
378a5('bum): gshegs pa ni 'phags shing zag pa mi mnga' ba'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog
378a6('bum): chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad cing /de mngon par sprul nas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa de lta bu yod dam med/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mchis so//bcom
378a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor des de bzhin gshegs pa byol song gi skye gnas par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi lags so//bcom ldan
378b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom
378b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa'ang ched du bsams shing /de lta bu'i
378b3('bum): lus yongs su 'dzin te/lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smin par byed do//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/dgra bcom pas sprul pa mngon par
378b4('bum): sprul na/sprul pa des dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing /las des gzhan gyi dge ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te mchis
378b5('bum): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa'ang tshad du bsams
378b6('bum): shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du'ang mi 'gyur te/sdug bsngal gyi tshor
378b7('bum): ba'ang nyams su mi myong ngo //rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma lis glang po'i gzugs sam/rta'i gzugs sam/glang gi gzugs shig bsten tam/
379a1('bum): gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs bstan na/de dag glang po'i gzugs sam/rta'i gzugs sam/glang gi gzugs sam/srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag
379a2('bum): tu'ang 'gyur ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
379a3('bum): dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa'ang ched du bsams shing /de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te/lus de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don byed de/
379a4('bum): sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye
379a5('bum): shis zag pa ma mchis pa dang de ltar ldan zhing lus gang dang gong gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ni thabs shin tu mkhas pa ste/
379a6('bum): de ni ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing /de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang /
379a7('bum): las de lta bus mi gos par spyod pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /byang chub sems dpa'
379b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod de/thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sems can
379b2('bum): rnams kyi don byed kyang des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang /gang gis
379b3('bum): reg par bya ba dang /gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum po de dag thams cad mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis
379b4('bum): stong pas/stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la reg par mi byed do//stong pa nyid kyis chos gang la'ang reg par mi 'gyur ro//stong pa nyid kyang reg par bya ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
379b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par
379b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la mi gnas kyi/
379b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la gnas shing /rnam pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa logs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos
380a1('bum): gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su ma chud pa de lta bu yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid
380a2('bum): kyis stong na/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'du ba lags/bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la ni chos gang yang khongs su chud pa 'am/
380a3('bum): khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis mi stong ngam/gsol pa/bcom
380a4('bum): ldan 'das stong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ste chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong na/chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam/
380a5('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
380a6('bum): dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan
380a7('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /chos thams cad stong pa nyid
380b1('bum): la gnas te/mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing /phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/
380b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa de dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /chos nyan cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
380b3('bum): la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
380b4('bum): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten
380b5('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dog thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo //'jig rten gyi khams de dgon/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
380b6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo //gzhan du na ming dang brdar gdags pa nye bar bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te/gdags pa kun
380b7('bum): kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo //gal te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong ste/gdags pa'i
381a1('bum): rgyud de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong pa zhig yin na ni/nyiche ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/de'adra stong pa nyi che ba ma yin no//de'i phyir chos thams cad
381a2('bum): chos thams cad kyis stong ste/de nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /mngon par shes
381a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing /lha'i mig dang /lha'i rna ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang /pha rol gyi sems shes
381a4('bum): pa dang /sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang /'chi 'pho shes pa mngon par sgrub ste/mngon par shes pa med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/bla na med pa
381a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni
381a6('bum): mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'dus bya ste/mngon par shes po de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o//de col bya'i tshe/lha'i mig rnam par dag pa
381a7('bum): mi las 'das pas bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong /gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te/dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhen par
381b1('bum): 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/stong pa nyid ni gang la mngon par zhen cing /ro myong bar byed par mngon par zhen
381b2('bum): par 'gyur ba med de/stong pa nyid ni ro myong bar byed pa med do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya go drug pa//de ltar byung
381b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/lha'i mig mngon por sgrub ste/lha'i mig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste/
381b4('bum): de chos de dag la gnas shing las mngon par sgrub bo//las mngon par sgrub pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/sems can nam sems can du gdags par dmigs pa
381b5('bum): med do//de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/mngon par shes pa de dag gis
381b6('bum): mngon par shes pas bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag byed do//de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/
381b7('bum): de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /sbyin pa'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam gtan nam/shes rab bamo/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
382a1('bum): sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/
382a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams
382a3('bum): sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam
382a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs
382a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams
382a6('bum): kyi don byed cing /sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston cing /sbyin pa byin cig/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal
382a7('bum): ba ste/phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/bdag kyang bde bor gyis shig/gzhan yang bde
382b1('bum): bar gyis shig/phongs pas zil gyis non cing /nyid sha nyid gis zos te/ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can tshul khrims dran pa can gang
382b2('bum): ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci
382b3('bum): smos te/tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du
382b4('bum): lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod
382b5('bum): pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma
382b6('bum): byed cig/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/sems can dmyal bar skye
382b7('bum): ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis
383a1('bum): 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag la lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste//
383a2('bum): le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i
383a3('bum): 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon por lta ci smos te/de'i phyir khyod kyis la lo'i sems
383a4('bum): 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yengs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
383a5('bum): kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i
383a6('bum): 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon pa ro lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir byed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems
383a7('bum): 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos
383b1('bum): ston te/kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab 'chal bas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/de ltar na shes rab 'tshal
383b2('bum): pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga'
383b3('bum): tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro//zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang
383b4('bum): ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lam ngan par zhugs pa la spyod pa de dag ni yang
383b5('bum): dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/nyan thos kyi lam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing /de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/khyed chos gang la mngon
383b6('bum): par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes
383b7('bum): chos ston te/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /sems
384a1('bum): can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//de lta'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/de de
384a2('bum): dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam gtan nam/shes rab bam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
384a3('bum): sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i
384a4('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam//
384a5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/de
384a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs
384a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can
384b1('bum): rnams kyi don byed cing /sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/sbyin pa byin cig/phongs pa ni sdug
384b2('bum): bsngal ba ste/phongs pas ni bdag gi dron kyang bya bor mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/gzhan
384b3('bum): yang bde bar gyis shig/phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ngan song gsum las mi thor par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can tshul khrims ngan
384b4('bum): pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan
384b5('bum): gyi don lta ci smos te/tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin po ni sems can dmyal ba'am byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum
384b6('bum): du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khrod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//
384b7('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/de ltar khyed gcig la gcig
385a1('bum): gnod sems su ma byed cig/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas na khyod phan tshun sems 'khrugs par
385a2('bum): gyur na/sems can dmyal bar skyo ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/de bas na khyed kyis 'khrugs pa'i
385a3('bum): sems 'ga' tsam gyi go stobs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur to ro zhes chos ston to//sems can lo lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye
385a4('bum): skyes bu dag la lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/
385a5('bum): byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltor khyed ngan slong gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon por lta ci smos
385a6('bum): kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyi le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed
385a7('bum): pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song
385b1('bum): gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed dran song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed
385b2('bum): kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad
385b3('bum): du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/shes rab 'chal
385b4('bum): ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam
385b5('bum): gyi go skabs kyang me dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro//zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji
385b6('bum): snyed pa de dag byams po la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i
385b7('bum): lam la sbyor te/nyan thos kyi lam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par
386a1('bum): gyur pa'i chos de dag na/ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med
386a2('bum): zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /
386a3('bum): sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/de de dag tu rdzu
386a4('bum): 'phrul gyis song zhing /sbyin pa'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam gtan nam/shes rab bam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang
386a5('bum): dge par spong ba rnams sa mo/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan
386a6('bum): lag brgyad pa 'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs
386a7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/de bzhin
386b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
386b2('bum): 'dres pa rnams sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /sems
386b3('bum): can de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/sbyin pa byin cig/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/phongs pas ni bdag
386b4('bum): gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/phongs pas zil
386b5('bum): gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta ro zhes chos ston to//sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston
386b6('bum): to//kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam
386b7('bum): par smin po ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/
387a1('bum): gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbya'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur tA re zhes
387a2('bum): chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur po gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su mi byed cig/sems
387a3('bum): 'khrugs par gyur ba la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am/byol
387a4('bum): song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis
387a5('bum): 'gyod pa can du gyur to re zhes chos ston to//sems can la lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal po ste/le los
387a6('bum): ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal po 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin
387a7('bum): rje'i 'jig rten yin to/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i
387b1('bum): sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te//
387b2('bum): kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i
387b3('bum): 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon por lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyod kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga'
387b4('bum): tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'chal pa tsan gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes
387b5('bum): bu dag shes rab 'chal ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab 'chal bas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par
387b6('bum): smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs
387b7('bum): kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro//zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa
388a1('bum): de dag byams pa la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang
388a2('bum): dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/nyan thos kyi lam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mA ma/sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag lo 'di skad du chos ston te/khyed chos gang la mngon par
388a3('bum): zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni/mngon par zhen par mi nus te/stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos
388a4('bum): ston to//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /sems
388a5('bum): can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis
388a6('bum): song zhing /sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam gtan nam/shes rab bam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag
388a7('bum): par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan
388b1('bum): lag brgyad pa'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i
388b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
388b3('bum): stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
388b4('bum): sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /sems can
388b5('bum): de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/sbyin pa byin cig/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/phongs pas ni bdag
388b6('bum): gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/phongs
388b7('bum): pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ngan song gsum los mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la//
389a1('bum): 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don
389a2('bum): lta ci smos te/tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song
389a3('bum): gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang
389a4('bum): mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta rA zhes chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/de ltar khyed
389a5('bum): gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas na khyed phan tshun du sems 'khrugs
389a6('bum): par gyur na/sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i
389a7('bum): sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur to ri zhes chos ston to//sems can la lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
389b1('bum): kye skyes bu dag la lo ni sdug bsngal ba sku/le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am byol
389b2('bum): song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed dran song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis//de'i
389b3('bum): phyir khyod kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbya'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yeng ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag
389b4('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye
389b5('bum): gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir byed
389b6('bum): kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa deng
389b7('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'tshol pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/
390a1('bum): shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed kyis shes
390a2('bum): rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug
390a3('bum): pa la sbyor ro//zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lam
390a4('bum): ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/nyon thos kyi lam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhingango de dag la 'di
390a5('bum): skad du chos ston te/khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi
390a6('bum): nus te/stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
390a7('bum): pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//de lta'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/byang shar
390b1('bum): gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam
390b2('bum): gtan nam/shes rab bam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams
390b3('bum): sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/
390b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar
390b5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams
390b6('bum): pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/
390b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
391a1('bum): sbyin pa byin cig/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus nA/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/de ltar khyad kyis sbyin pa byin
391a2('bum): bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur te ro zhes
391a3('bum): chos ston to//sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji skad pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims ngan
391a4('bum): pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/
391a5('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyiso tshul khrims
391a6('bum): ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag
391a7('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/de ltar khyed gcig lo gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas
391b1('bum): na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/de bas na
391b2('bum): khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du
391b3('bum): chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can
391b4('bum): dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cig kyang gdon par mi nus ni/gzhan gdon par lta
391b5('bum): ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te re zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yeng ba gang
391b6('bum): skyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal po ste/gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song
391b7('bum): gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig yin to//de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir
392a1('bum): khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gri go skabs kyang mi dbya'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'tshal pa can gang rdza
392a2('bum): snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab 'tshal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos
392a3('bum): te/shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i
392a4('bum): sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa con gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro//zhe sdang
392a5('bum): gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lam ngan par zhugs pa gang
392a6('bum): ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/nyan thos kyi lam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mA ma/sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing /de dag la 'di skad du chos ston
392a7('bum): te/khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen por gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/stong pa
392b1('bum): nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes
392b2('bum): pa rnams la gnas shing /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
392b3('bum): khams thams cad mthong ste/de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam gtan nam/shes rab bam/
392b4('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sa mo/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag
392b5('bum): rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/bsam gtan rnams sam//
392b6('bum): tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
392b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje
393a1('bum): chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi sa ma 'dres pa rnams sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/
393a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston
393a3('bum): te/sbyin pa byin cig/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/
393a4('bum): bdag cog kyang bde bar gyis shig/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/phongs pas zil gyis non cing nyid sha nyid gis zos te/ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes
393a5('bum): chos ston te/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims
393a6('bum): ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas
393a7('bum): sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdod par mi nus na/gzhan gdon por lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyod kyis
393b1('bum): tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag
393b2('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas
393b3('bum): na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bo'i gnas yod kyis de bas na
393b4('bum): khyod kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta ro zhes chos ston to//sems can le lo tsan gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos
393b5('bum): ston te/kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba
393b6('bum): 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lto ci smos
393b7('bum): kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du b+hur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag
394a1('bum): la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol
394a2('bum): song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yon te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus ni/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis//
394a3('bum): de'i phyiraro khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed
394a4('bum): pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci
394a5('bum): smos te/shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyod kyis shes
394a6('bum): rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa ngo dag mi sdug pa
394a7('bum): la sbyor ro//zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lam
394b1('bum): ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/nyan thos kyi lam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du
394b2('bum): chos ston te/khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/stong
394b3('bum): nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa
394b4('bum): rnams la gnas shing /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
394b5('bum): thams cad mthong ste/de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam gtan nam/shes rab bam/dran pa nye
394b6('bum): bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
394b7('bum): sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad
395a1('bum): med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar gyis
395a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams
395a3('bum): pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i
395a4('bum): chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di
395a5('bum): skad du chos ston te/sbyin pa byin cig/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/de ltar khyed
395a6('bum): kyis sbyin pa byin la/bdag cig kyang bde bar gyis shig/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/phongs pas zil gyis non cing /nying sha nying gis zos te/ngan song gsum
395a7('bum): las mi thar por gyur ta re zhes chos ston te/sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug
395b1('bum): bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byul
395b2('bum): song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i
395b3('bum): phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims dran pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur
395b4('bum): pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/de ltar khyad gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la/dge ba'i chos gang yang skye
395b5('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/sems can dmyal bar skyo ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
395b6('bum): skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/dre bos na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can le lo
395b7('bum): con gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i
396a1('bum): rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag
396a2('bum): cag kyang gdon par mi nus ni/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te
396a3('bum): re zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/gang sems g.yeng
396a4('bum): ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed dran song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang
396a5('bum): gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon por lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbya'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur te
396a6('bum): re zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'chil pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'tshal pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab
396a7('bum): 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol
396b1('bum): song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur tar
396b2('bum): zhes chos ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro//zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod
396b3('bum): pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lam dran par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam lo sbyor te/nyon thos kyi lam mam/rong
396b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi lamA mA ma/sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing /de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/khyad chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis
396b5('bum): stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor de ltar ra byang chub
396b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no//de
396b7('bum): lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /sbyin
397a1('bum): pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam gtan nam/shes rab bam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag
397a2('bum): par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan
397a3('bum): lag brgyad pa 'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs
397a4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/de
397a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs
397a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis sems
397a7('bum): can rnams kyi don byed cing /sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cing /phongs
397b1('bum): pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/
397b2('bum): gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ngan song gsum las mi thar por gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can tshul
397b3('bum): khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi dron kyang bya
397b4('bum): bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam porarwa smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye granas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten
397b5('bum): yin te/de ltar khyad ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon por lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyad kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems
397b6('bum): 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur tA raM zhes chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur po glang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du
397b7('bum): chos ston te/de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su mi byed cig/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas na khyed
398a1('bum): phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas
398a2('bum): yod kyis/de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod po can du gyur to re zhes chos ston to//sems can li lo can gang
398a3('bum): ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/le lngas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i
398a4('bum): rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas same/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed dran song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang
398a5('bum): gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re
398a6('bum): zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag lo 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng po ni sdug bsngal ba ste/gang sems
398a7('bum): g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/
398b1('bum): bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur
398b2('bum): ta raM zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag lo 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal po ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab
398b3('bum): 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi dron lta ci smos te/shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba'am/byol song gi skye
398b4('bum): gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed kyis shes rabo 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyu ro tA re zhes chos
398b5('bum): ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa tsan gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro//zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag bya mos pa la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod pa can
398b6('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/nyan thos kyi lam ma mo/rlung
398b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/sangs rgyas kyi lamo la sbyor zhing /de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo
399a1('bum): bo nyid kyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te/stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to//rab
399a2('bum): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /sems can rnams kyi
399a3('bum): dron byed pa yin no//de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song
399a4('bum): zhing /sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsamo gtan nam/shes rab bam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par
399a5('bum): spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
399a6('bum): brgyad pa 'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'am/bsam gtan rnams sama?/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs
399a7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams samaM/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams samaM/de
399b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi/
399b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed
399b3('bum): cing /sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can ser sna can grang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/sbyin pa byin cig/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/phongs
399b4('bum): pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis/de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la/bdag cog kyang bde bar gyis shig/gzhan yang bde bar gyis
399b5('bum): shig/phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/ngan song gsum las mi thar por gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa
399b6('bum): de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus ni/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te//
399b7('bum): gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du ltung
400a1('bum): na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi
400a2('bum): dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur po gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/de ltar khyed gcig
400a3('bum): lo gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas na khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na//
400a4('bum): sems can dmyal bar skye ba 'om/byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rton du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis/de bas na khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga'
400a5('bum): tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can lo lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag
400a6('bum): le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/le los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye
400a7('bum): gnas same/ge shin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon por lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyi
400b1('bum): khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di
400b2('bum): skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag sems g.yeng ba ni ldog bsngal ba ste/gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam gshin
400b3('bum): rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhun gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyed kyis g.yeng ba'i sems
400b4('bum): 'gra' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/
400b5('bum): kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal po ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam
400b6('bum): par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chil pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go
400b7('bum): skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro//zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed
401a1('bum): pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lamya ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de
401a2('bum): ngag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/nyan thos kyi lam mA ma/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/khyed chos gang
401a3('bum): la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon por zhen par mi nus te/stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen
401a4('bum): pa med do zhes chos ston te//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas
401a5('bum): shing /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya go bdun pa//de lha'i mig rnam par
401a6('bum): dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste/de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/
401a7('bum): bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam gton nam/shes rab bam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
401b1('bum): rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
401b2('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par
401b3('bum): thar pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams
401b4('bum): sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs
401b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de/de la sems can
401b6('bum): ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/sbyin pa byin cig/phongs pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/phongs pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don
401b7('bum): lta ci smos kyis de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig/gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig/phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te/
402a1('bum): ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes
402a2('bum): bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/tshul khrims ngan pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam por
402a3('bum): smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon
402a4('bum): par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re
402a5('bum): zhes chos ston to//sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed
402a6('bum): cig/sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/de lta bas na khyad pan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na/sems can dmyal bar
402a7('bum): skye ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yid kyis/de bas na khyod kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi
402b1('bum): dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag le lo ni sdug bsngal ba ste/lo
402b2('bum): los ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i
402b3('bum): 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyod kyis le lo'i sems 'ga'
402b4('bum): tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can sems g.yeng ba gang ji skyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag
402b5('bum): sems g.yeng ba ni sdug bsngal ba ste/gang sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni sems can dmyal ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de
402b6('bum): lhaltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na/bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na/gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis/de'i phyir khyod kyis g.yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang
402b7('bum): mi dbye'o//phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te/kye skyes bu dag shes rab 'chal
403a1('bum): pa ni sdug bsngal ba ste/shes rab 'chal pas ni bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na/gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te/gang shes rab 'chal pa'i rnam par smin pa de ni
403a2('bum): sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te/de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//
403a3('bum): phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to//'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni mi sdug pa la sbyor ro//zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni byams pa
403a4('bum): la sbyor ro//gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro//lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te/
403a5('bum): nyan thos kyi lam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dog la 'di skad du chos ston te/khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos
403a6('bum): de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni mngon paro zhen par mi nus te/stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to//rab 'byor
403a7('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing /sems can rnams kyi don
403b1('bum): byed pa yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/mngon par shes pa rnams la ma gnas par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus+yaH/lam nam/
403b2('bum): bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam du gzud bar mi nus so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/bya 'dab ma med pas ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus so//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
403b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la ma brten par sems can rnams la chos bstan par mi nus so//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems
403b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/de mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs pa de
403b5('bum): dag gis/sems can rnams kyi don ci bya bar dga' ba de bde bar byed do//des lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/de dag tu sems
403b6('bum): can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /sems can de dag gi sems/sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/
403b7('bum): de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/bzod pa'i gtam mam/brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/shes rab kyi gtam
404a1('bum): mam/'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//des lha'i mig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
404a2('bum): ma snyed mthong ste/de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /sems can de dag gi sems//
404a3('bum): sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/de dang mthun por sbyin pa'i gtam mAm/tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/bzod pa'i gtam mam/brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/bsam
404a4('bum): gtan gyi gtam mam/shes rab kyi gtam mam/'phagaso pa'i bden pa'i gtam mamra/'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//des lha'i mig gis nub phyogs kyi
404a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song
404a6('bum): zhing /sems can de dag gi sems/sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/bzod pa'i gtam
404a7('bum): mam/brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/bsam gtan gyi gtam mamo/shes rab kyi gtam mam/'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du
404b1('bum): chos ston to//des lha'i mig gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/de dag tu sems can gang ji skad cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //de ltar
404b2('bum): mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /sems can de dag gi sems/sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/tshul khrims kyi gtam
404b3('bum): mam/bzod pa'i gtam mam/brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/shes rab kyi gtam mam/'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/'byung ba'i gtam gyi
404b4('bum): par du chos ston to//des lha'i mig gis byang shAr gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag
404b5('bum): kyang mthong ngo //de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /sems can de dag gi sems/sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i
404b6('bum): gtam mAm/tshul khrims kyi gtam mom/bzod pa'i gtam mam/brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/bsam gtan byi gtam mam/shes rab kyi gtam mam/'dogs pa'i
404b7('bum): bden pa'i gtam mam/'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//des lha'i mig gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/de dag
405a1('bum): t+ya sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /sems can de dag gi sems/sems
405a2('bum): kyis khong du chud par byas nas/de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/bzod pa'i gtam mam/brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/bsam gtan
