405a4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu
405a5('bum): song zhing /sems can de dag gi sems/sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i gtam mam/tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/bzod pa'i
405a6('bum): gtam mam/brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/bsam gtan gyi gtam momra/shes rab kyi gtam ma mo/'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/'byung ba'i gtam gyi
405a7('bum): bar du chos ston to//des lha'i mig gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ste/de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes
405b1('bum): pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /sems can de dag gi sems/sems kyis khong du chud par byas nas/de dang mthun par sbyin pa'i

405b6('bum): kyi gtam mam/'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtamA ma ma/'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//des lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
405b7('bum): skad mthong ste/de dag tu sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //de ltar mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis de dag tu song zhing /sems can de dag gi sems/sems

406a2('bum): bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/shes rab kyi gtam mam/'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mam/'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//de'i lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis 'di
406a3('bum): lta ste/lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra'ang thos te/de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos
406a4('bum): ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to//de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston te/sbyin

406b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig chos ston pa de dag gi chos lha'i rna bas nyan te/thos nas kyang de bzhin nyid du 'dzin to//de bzhin nyid du bzung nas/de bzhin nyid du

407a1('bum): gtam mam/shes rab kyi gtam mam/'phags pa'i bden pa'i gtam mum/'byung ba'i gtam gyi bar du chos ston to//debyang shar gyi phyogs mtshams

408a7('bum): sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa yin te/de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa des sems can rnams kyi sems shes par byas shing /de dag
408b1('bum): la de bzhin nyid du chos ston te/sbyin pa'i gtam mam/tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/bzod pa'i gtam mam/brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam/bsam gtan gyi gtam mam/shes

408b3('bum): gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa des/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan 'di zhes bya ba nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa

408b7('bum): bkur byed de/bsnyen bkur byas nas/mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/sbyin pa'i gtam mam/tshul khrims kyi gtam mam

409a3('bum): shes pa shin tu rig pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te/sbyin pa'i gtam mam/tshul khrims kyi gtam mam/bzod pa'i gtam mam/brtson 'grus kyi gtam mam//

409a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/de mngon par shes pa shin
409a6('bum): tu 'dris pa de dag gis lus ci dang ci lta bu yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su gzung zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don byed de bde
409a7('bum): ba'am/sdug bsngal ba de dag gis gos par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i skyes bu ni/dgos pa thams cad byed
409b1('bum): kyang bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba des gos par 'gyur ba med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
409b2('bum): mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston kyang bde ba 'am/sdug bsngal ba des phrogs
409b3('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de ltar mngon par shes pas/rnam par rtse bar byas
409b4('bum): te/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhong yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtse bar byas te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' semaso
409b5('bum): dpa' chen pos ni/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gyur pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par ma byas par/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
409b6('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/lam gyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/blo na med pa yang dag
409b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub med do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis
410a1('bum): shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam de dag gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
410a2('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor dge ba'i chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi yan lag go/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lam gyi yan lag gang
410a3('bum): gis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/bcom ldan
410a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog cing de yongs su gtong ba'i
410a5('bum): tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni sbyin pa'o//'di la yongs su btang bar bya'o//bdag gis sbyin par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol
410a6('bum): tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge
410a7('bum): ba'i chos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /de tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni tshul khrims so//bdag gis
410b1('bum): tshul khrims bsrung ngo //'di'i don du tshul khrims bsrung ngo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
410b2('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing
410b3('bum): de bzod pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni bzod pa'o//bo dag gis bzod pa bsgom mo//'di'i don du bzod pa bsgom par bya'o zhes gsum po de dag la mi
410b4('bum): rtog pa ste/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas
410b5('bum): nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /de brtson 'grus rlom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni brtson 'grus
410b6('bum): so//bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam mo//'di'i don du brtson 'grus brnam mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor
410b7('bum): ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
411a1('bum): pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /de bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni bsam gtan no//bdag gis
411a2('bum): bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag go/'di'i don du bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag go zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
411a3('bum): gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos shes
411a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog cing de shes rab bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni shos rab bo//bdag gis ni shes rab bsgom
411a5('bum): mo//'di'i don du shes rab bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol
411a6('bum): ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /nang stong pa nyid
411a7('bum): bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni nang stong po nyid do//bdag gis nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum
411b1('bum): po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas
411b2('bum): nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos phyi stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do//bdag gis phyi
411b3('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/phyi stong pa nyid gang gis bdog kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan
411b4('bum): yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /phyi nang
411b5('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do//bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du phyi nang stong pa nyid
411b6('bum): bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/phyi nang stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so///
411b7('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid
412a1('bum): kyi phyir 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'dri'i don du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de
412a2('bum): dag la mi rtog pa ste/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po
412a3('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos chen po stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chen
412a4('bum): po stong pa nyid do//bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/chen po stong pa nyid
412a5('bum): gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskrad pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos
412a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni den dam pa stong pa nyid do//bdag gis
412a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/don dam pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang
412b1('bum): 'khor pa las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod
412b2('bum): kyang de la mi rtog cing /'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do//bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//
412b3('bum): 'di'i don du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/'dus byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di
412b4('bum): ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /'dus ma byas stong pa
412b5('bum): nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do//bdag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du 'dus ma byas
412b6('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge
412b7('bum): ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i
413a1('bum): tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du mtha'
413a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
413a3('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog cing /thog ma dang tha ma
413a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//
413a5('bum): 'di'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /
413a6('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog
413a7('bum): cing /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do//bdag gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//
413b1('bum): 'di'i don du dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol
413b2('bum): ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog cing /rang bzhin stong
413b3('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do//bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom por bya'o//'di'i don du rang bzhin stong pa nyid
413b4('bum): bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i
413b5('bum): chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod kyang dri la mi rtog cing /chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo
413b6('bum): nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do//bdag gis chos thams cad stong po nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo
413b7('bum): zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
414a1('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog cing /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom
414a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do//bdag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du rang gi mtshan nyid stong
414a3('bum): pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag
414a4('bum): dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog cing /me dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom
414a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do//bdag gis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
414a6('bum): bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dag
414a7('bum): ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe//
414b1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do//bdag gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom
414b2('bum): mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
414b3('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
414b4('bum): 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
414b5('bum): gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyod pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos dngos
414b6('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo
414b7('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid do//bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog
415a1('bum): ste/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrolnga ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems
415a2('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
415a3('bum): rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//bdag gis dran pa nyo bor bzhag pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don
415a4('bum): du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
415a5('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod
415a6('bum): kyang de la mi rtog cing yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so//bdag gis yang dag par spong ba
415a7('bum): rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/yang dag par spong ba gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol
415b1('bum): zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rdzu 'phrul gyi
415b2('bum): rkang pa bzhi la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog cing /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so//bdag gis rdzu
415b3('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba
415b4('bum): las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
415b5('bum): chos dbang po lnga la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing dbang po lnga bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni dbang po rnams so//bdag gis dbang po rnams bsgom par bya'o//
415b6('bum): 'di'i don du dbang po rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/dbang po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lamA gyi yan lag
415b7('bum): dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos stobs lnga la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /stobs rnams
416a1('bum): bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni stobs rnams so//bdag gis stobs rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du stobs rnams
416a2('bum): bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/stobs gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lamau gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
416a3('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog cing byung
416a4('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan log rnams so//bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom
416a5('bum): par bya'o//'di'i don du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/byang chub kyi yan lag gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing //
416a6('bum): gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos
416a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni
416b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo zhes
416b2('bum): gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so///
416b3('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /'phags pa'i
416b4('bum): bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so//bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i
416b5('bum): don du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/'phags pa'i bden pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
416b6('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos bsam gtan bzhi la spyod kyang de la
416b7('bum): mi rtog cing /bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams so//bdag gis bsam gtan rnams bsgom par bya'o///
417a1('bum): 'di'i don du bsam gtan rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/bsam gtan gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol
417a2('bum): ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos tshad med pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la
417a3('bum): mi rtog cing /tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag na tshad med pa rnams so//bdag gis tshad med pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//
417a4('bum): 'di'i don du tshad med pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/tshod med pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lom gyi
417a5('bum): yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
417a6('bum): pa bzhi la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
417a7('bum): 'jug pa rnams so//bdag gis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo zhes
417b1('bum): gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so///
417b2('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /rnam par thar pa brgyad
417b3('bum): bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do//bdag gis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du rnam par thar pa brgyad
417b4('bum): bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/rnam par thar pa brgyad gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so///
417b5('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod kyang de la mi rtog
417b6('bum): cing /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//
417b7('bum): bdag gis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la
418a1('bum): mi rtog pa ste/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos
418a2('bum): so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon
418a3('bum): pa med pa la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di
418a4('bum): dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'o//bdag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshon ma med pa dang /smon pa
418a5('bum): med pa bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/rnam par
418a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//
418a7('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /mngon
418b1('bum): par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams so//bdag gis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i
418b2('bum): dron du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/mngon par shes pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam
418b3('bum): gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod kyang de la mi rtog
418b4('bum): cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so//bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du ting
418b5('bum): nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/ting nge 'dzin gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i
418b6('bum): chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nus nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod kyang de la mi rtog cing /gzungs kyi
418b7('bum): sgo rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du gzungs kyi sgo
419a1('bum): rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/gzungs kyi sgo gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan
419a2('bum): lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod
419a3('bum): kyang de la mi rtog cing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//bdag
419a4('bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/de bzhin gshegs
419a5('bum): pa'i stobs gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang
419a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod kyang de dag la mi rtog cing /mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa
419a7('bum): nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams so//bdag gis mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag
419b1('bum): la mi rtog pa ste/mi 'jigs pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar
419b2('bum): bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod kyang /de la mi rtog cing /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom
419b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so//bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du so so
419b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/so so yang dag par rig pa gang gis bdag kyang /'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni
419b5('bum): lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos byams pa chen po la spyod kyang de la
419b6('bum): mi rtog cing /byams pa chen po bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni byams pa chen po'o//bdag gis byams pa chen po bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du
419b7('bum): byams pa chen po bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/byams pa tshon po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sbrel ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag
420a1('bum): dge ba'i chos so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos snying rje chen po la spyod kyang de la mi
420a2('bum): rtog cing /snying rje chen po bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni snying rje chen po'o//bdag gis snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du snying rje chen
420a3('bum): po bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/snying rje chen po gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lom gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos
420a4('bum): so//sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i chos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod kyang de la mi
420a5('bum): rtog cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa'i tshe/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so//bdag gis
420a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom par bya'o//'di'i don du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom mo zhes gsum po de dag la mi rtog pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos
420a7('bum): ma 'dres pa gang gis bdag kyang 'khor ba las sgrol zhing /gzhan yang sgrol ba 'di ni lam gyi yan lag dge ba'i chos so//rab 'byor dge ba'i chos de dag ni byang chub sems
420b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/lam des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
420b2('bum): chen po rnams sems can tshad med pa de dag/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho los brgal bar gyur pa dang /brgal ba dang /rgal bar 'gyur ba ste/lamo de yongs su rdzogs par byas shing //
420b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro//chos
420b4('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor te/sems can rnams kyi don byed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u drug cu brgyad pa'o////de nas tshe dang
420b5('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos lags na/sangs rgyas kyi chos
420b6('bum): gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gal te chos de dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na/sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin
420b7('bum): zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang chos de dag nyid rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar zad de/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
421a1('bum): nas/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yongs su spong ngo //de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de
421a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/
421a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
421a4('bum): la khyad par de yod do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/zhugs pa'ang gzhan la/'bras bu la gnas pa'ang gzhan te/de gnyis ka'ang 'phags pa'i gang zag ma yin zhes
421a5('bum): mi bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bar chad med pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
421a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs
421a7('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyad par ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong
421b1('bum): palags na/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos de dag la 'di ni sems can dmyal ba pa'o//'di ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o//'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o//'din
421b2('bum): lha'o//'di ni mi'o//'di ni rigs kyi sa'o//'di ni brgyad pa'o//'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//'di ni dgra bcom pa'o///
421b3('bum): 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar khyad par dang /rnam
421b4('bum): par dbye bar ji ltar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang zag de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du las kyang dmigs su ma mchis/las ji ltar dmigs su ma mchis
421b5('bum): pa de bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de
421b6('bum): bzhin te/chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la/las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i
421b7('bum): chos thams cad de ltar ma shes pa de dag ni ngan par spyod pa 'am//legs par spyad pa'am/mi g.yo ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/de dag ngan par spyad pa'i las kyis
422a1('bum): ngan song gsum du lhung ngo //legs par spyad pa'i las kyis lha dang mir skye'o//nyams pa med pa'i las kyis gzugs kyi khams sam/gzugs med pa'i
422a2('bum): khams su skye'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
422a3('bum): pa la spyad/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/nang stong pa nyid la spyad/phyi
422a4('bum): stong pa nyid la spyad/phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/chen po stong pa nyid la spyad/don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad/'dus byas stong pa nyid la
422a5('bum): spyod/'dus mo byas stong pa nyid la spyad/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyang/rang bzhin
422a6('bum): stong pa nyid la spyad/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad/dngos po med pa stong po nyid la spyad/
422a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong po nyid la spyad/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyad/yang dag por spong ba rnams la spyad/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
422b1('bum): pa rnams la spyad/dbang po rnams la spyad/stobs rnams la spyad/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad/'phags pa'i bden pa
422b2('bum): rnams la spyad/bsam gtan rnams la spyad/tshad med pa rnams la spyad/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad/rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad/mthar gyis
422b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa lo spyad/mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad/ting
422b4('bum): nge 'dzin rnams la spyad/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyad/mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad//
422b5('bum): byams pa chen po la spyad/snying rje chen po la spyad/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod de/nyams pa med pa'i spyod pos byang chub kyi lam bskyed nas/rdo rje lta bu'i
422b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'khor dong ldan pa la mnyam par bzhag cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/mngon
422b7('bum): par rdzogs por sangs rgyas nas/sems can rnams kyi don byed do/don byas nas ci nas kyang phyis chud mi zos shing /rgyud lnga'i 'khor bar mi ltung bar de ltar don byed do//
423a1('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par srungs rgyas nas/
423a2('bum): rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba gzigs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/de bzhin gshegs pas
423a3('bum): chos nag po 'am dkar po 'am/gnag pa dang /dkar ba 'am/mi gnag mi dkar ba dmigs pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ma yin no//gsol
423a4('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ste ma dmigs na/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/lha dang mir ji
423a5('bum): ltar gdags pa mdzad/rgyun du zhugs par ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/lan cig phyir 'ong bar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/phyir mi 'ong bar ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/dgra
423a6('bum): bcom par ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/rang sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/byang chub sems par ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
423a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su ji ltar gdags pa mdzad/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ci sems can 'di dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid
423b1('bum): kyis stong par shes sam/gsol pa/ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te sems can de dag 'di ltar chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong/
423b2('bum): ngo zhes bya bar shes na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
423b3('bum): chub tu ma zhugs na/sems can rnams kyang ngan song gsum dang /'khor ba'i rgyud rnams nas mi 'grol te/rab 'byor sems can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong
423b4('bum): par mi shes pas/rgyung lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las
423b5('bum): chos thams cad rang gi mitshan nyid kyis stong par thos nas/sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug ste/chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa
423b6('bum): so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par chags par bya ba de ltar yod pa ma yin na/de dag ni med cing yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yod par brtags shing /sems can med
423b7('bum): pa la sems can du 'du shes/gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes/tshor ba med pa la tshor bar 'du shes/'du shes med pa la 'du shes su 'du shes/'du byed med pa
424a1('bum): la 'du byed du 'du shes/rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/mig med pa la mig tu 'du shes/rna ba med pa la rna bar 'du shes//
424a2('bum): sna med pa la snar 'du shes/lci med pa la lcer 'du shes/lus med pa la lus su 'du shes/yid med pa la yid du 'du shes/gzugs med pa la gzugs su
424a3('bum): 'du shes/sgra med pa la sgrar 'du shes/dri med pa la drir 'du shes/ro med pa la rer 'du shes reg med pa la reg tu 'du shes/chos med pa la chos su 'du shes
424a4('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa la mig gi rnam par shes par 'du shes/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/sna'i rnam par shes pa
424a5('bum): med pa la sna'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa la lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes/lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa la lus kyi rnam par
424a6('bum): shes par 'du shes/yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa la yid kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes/mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa la mig gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/rna
424a7('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa la sna'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes/lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa la lce'i
424b1('bum): 'dus te reg par 'du shes/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes/mig gi
424b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
424b3('bum): tshor bar 'du shes/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/lce'i 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la lce'i
424b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/yid kyi 'dus te
424b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa la/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes/sa'i khams med pa la sa'i khams su 'du shes/chu'i khams med pa la chu'i khams
424b6('bum): su 'du shes/me'i khams med pa la me'i khams su 'du shes/rlung gi khams med pa la rlung gi khams su 'du shes/nam mkha'i khams med pa la nam mkha'i khams su 'du
424b7('bum): shes/rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa la rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes/ma rig pa med pa la ma rig par 'du shes/'du byed med pa la 'du byed du 'du shes//
425a1('bum): rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes/ming dang gzugs med pa la ming dang gzugs su 'du shes/sgyu margyad drug med pa la skye mched drug
425a2('bum): tu 'du shes/rig pa med pa la reg par 'du shes/tshor ba med pa la tshor bar 'du shes/sred pa med pa la sred par 'du shes/len pa med pa la ldan par 'du shes/srid
425a3('bum): pa med pa la srid par 'du shes/skye ba med pa la skye bar 'du shes/rga shi med pa la rga shir 'du shes/'jig rten pa'i chos med pa la 'jig rten pa'i chos su 'du shes
425a4('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos med pa la/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos su 'du shes/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos med pa la/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos su 'du
425a5('bum): shes/zag pa med pa'i chos med pa la/zag pa med pa'i chos su 'du shes/'dus byas kyi chos med pa la 'dus byas kyi chos su 'du shes/'dus ma byas kyi chos med pa la/
425a6('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi chos su 'du shes nas/yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gis/phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las mngon
425a7('bum): par 'du byed pa de dag rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su mi 'grol ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dge ba'i chos thams
425b1('bum): cad 'dus par byas te/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par sangs
425b2('bum): rgyas nas/rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel to////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis brgya go brgyad pa/rab
425b3('bum): 'byor gyis gsol pa/gal te chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bla na med pa yang dag par
425b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las sems can rnams yongs su 'grel pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
425b5('bum): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/sdug bsngal ba dang /sdug bsngal
425b6('bum): kun 'byung ba dang /sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam sems can rnams la ston to//'chang ngo //'jog go/'god do//'grel te//rnam par
425b7('bum): 'grel to//gsal bar byed do//yang dag par brjod do//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'dir dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang ji snyed pa gang gis dkon mchog gsum
426a1('bum): rnam par 'god pa de thams cad yongs su 'dus te/sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /chos dkon mchog dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du byung
426a2('bum): bas/sems can rnams lam rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba las yongs su 'grel to//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las
426a3('bum): 'da' bar 'gyur ram/'on te sdug bsngal gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/kun 'byung ba 'tshal bas/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/'on te kun 'byung bas
426a4('bum): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/'on te sdug bsngal 'gog pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/
426a5('bum): lam 'tshal bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/'on te lam gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
426a6('bum): sdug bsngal shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no//kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/kun 'byung bas
426a7('bum): kyang ma yin no//sdug bsngal 'gog pa shes pas/yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no//lam shes pas yongs su mya
426b1('bum): ngan las mi 'da' ste/lam gyis kyang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'da' bar ngas gsungs te/sdug bsngal shes
426b2('bum): pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin no//sdug bsngal gyis kyang ma yin no//kun 'byung ba shes pas yongs su mya dran los 'da' ba ma yin/kun 'byung bas kyang ma yin ni//sdug
426b3('bum): bsngal 'gog pa shes pas/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/sdug bsngal 'gog pas kyang ma yin no//lam shes pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma yin/lam gyis
426b4('bum): kyang ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis/sdug bsngal 'tshal ba'ang ma mchis/kun 'byung ba'ang ma mchis/kun 'byung ba 'tshal ba'ang
426b5('bum): ma mchis/'gog pa'ang ma mchis/'grog pa 'tshal ba'ang mi mchis/lam yang mi mchis/lam 'tshal ba'ang ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mnyam pa nyid ces
426b6('bum): bgyi bde grang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dri ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin la
426b7('bum): de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang
427a1('bum): rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings chos kyi dbyings mi nyams mi 'grib par 'dug pa ste/de'i phyir byang
427a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bden pa khong du chud par ji ltar bya ba bzhin du/bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du
427a3('bum): spyad do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/bden pa rtogs pa'i
427a4('bum): don du spyod pa lags/ji ltar spyod na bden pa rtogs shing 'tshol te/khong du chud nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma
427a5('bum): mchis par 'jug pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
427a6('bum): pa'i tshe/chos de dag ci nas kyang chos gang yang dmigs su med pa de ltar mthong ste/chos thams cad ma dmigs pas bden par rtogs pa 'am/bden par ma rtogs pa'i
427a7('bum): chos thams cad stong par mthong ste/des de ltar mthong bas skyon med par chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/byang
427b1('bum): chub sems dpa' de rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur nas/spyi bor ltung bar mi 'gyur te/de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i spyi bor lhung ba med do//de byang
427b2('bum): chub sems dpa'i rigs kyis de la gnas shing /bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo//tshad med pa bzhi sgrub bo//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub bo//de ltag mthong gis/
427b3('bum): de la gnas shing /chos thams cad rab tu shes par byed de/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par byed do//de sdug bsngal yongs su shes kyang sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i
427b4('bum): sems mi skyed do//kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs kyang /kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do//'gog pa mngon du byed kyang 'grog pa la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do//
427b5('bum): lam sgom yong lam la dmigs pa'i sems mi skyed do//gzhan du na byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa mthong bar byed do//
427b6('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi no zhes bya ba de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stong pa nyid do//gsol pa/stong
427b7('bum): pa nyid gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de/rnam pa de lta bu'i lhag mthong gis chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar lta ste/jib
428a1('bum): nyid gang la gnas shing byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid chos gang la'ang ngo bo nyid yod par mi mthong ngo //dngos po med pa
428a2('bum): ni byang chub ste/de ni sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/dgra bcom pas ma byas/phyir mi 'ong bas ma byas/lan cig phyir 'ong bas ma byas/rgyun du
428a3('bum): zhugs pas ma byas/de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma byas/gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma byas te/gzhan du
428a4('bum): na yang dag pa ji lta ba de sems can rnams kyis mi shes mi mthong bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /thabs mkhas
428a5('bum): pas sems can rnams la chos ston to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las//le'u drug cu dgu pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
428a6('bum): gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis te/de dag sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma mdzad/rang sangs
428a7('bum): rgyas kyis kyang ma bgyis/dgra bcom pas kyang ma bgyis/phyir mi 'ong bas kyang ma bgyis/lan cig phyir 'ong bos kyang ma bgyis/rgyun du zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis//
428b1('bum): de dag la zhugs pas kyang ma bgyis/gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang ma bgyis na/chos de dag la 'di dag ni sems can
428b2('bum): dmyal ba pa'o//'di dag ni byol song gi skye gnas pa'o//'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'o//'di dag ni lha'o//'di dag mi'o//las 'dis ni sems can dmyal ba pa dang /
428b3('bum): byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten par 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni mir 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni sum cu
428b4('bum): rtsa gsum gyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni mtshe mi'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni dga' ldan gyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni 'phrul dga'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni
428b5('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni tshangs ris kyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni tshangs lha nye pan gyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi
428b6('bum): ltar 'gyur ro//los 'dis ni tshangs chen gyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni spang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni chung sdang gi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni tshad med snang ba'i
428b7('bum): ltar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni kun snang dang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni dge ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni chung dge'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni tshad med dge ba'i
429a1('bum): ltar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni dge rgyas kyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni che ba'i ltar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni chung che'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni tshad med
429a2('bum): che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni 'bras bu che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni mi che ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni mi gdung ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni shin tu
429a3('bum): mthong ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni gya nom snang ba'i lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni 'og min gyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar
429a4('bum): 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni 'du shes med 'du
429a5('bum): shes med min skye mched kyi lhar 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro//las 'dis
429a6('bum): ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni dgra bcom par 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'
429a7('bum): sems dpa' chen por 'gyur ro//las 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar tha dad du dbye ba 'am/rnam
429b1('bum): par dgod par yang ji ltar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa la ni bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis te/bgyi ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/byol song
429b2('bum): gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/mir skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/mtshe mo'i lhar
429b3('bum): skye bo 'am/dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba'am/tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba
429b4('bum): 'om/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/ku no snang
429b5('bum): dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung dge'i lhar skyo ba 'am/tshad med dge ba'o lhar skye ba 'am/dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/che ba'i lhar skyo bo 'am/chung che'i
429b6('bum): ltar skye ba 'amo/tshad med che ba'i lhar skyo ba 'am/'bras bu che ba'i lhor skye ba 'am/mi che ba'i lhar skyo ba 'am/mi gdung ba'i lhar skyo ba 'am/shin tu mthong po'i lhar skye ba 'am/gya
429b7('bum): nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkha'o mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhor skye ba 'am/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/cung zad
430a1('bum): med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/lan
430a2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/rang byang chub thob par 'gyur
430a3('bum): ba'am/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la spyod par 'gyur ba'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba 'am/thob par gyur nas
430a4('bum): sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
430a5('bum): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/rab 'byor dngos po med pa la ni las kyang med/bya ba'ang
430a6('bum): med/'bras bu'ang med na/'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa'i chos la mi mkhas pa rnams kyis chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mi shes te/phyir ci log
430a7('bum): las byung ba'i sems kyis las sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pas de dag gi lus rnam pa de bzhin du mngon par 'grub ste/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye
430b1('bum): gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/mi 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/mtshe ma'i lha 'am/dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/'phrul dga'i lha 'am/
430b2('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha 'am/tshangs ris kyi lha 'am/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha 'am/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha 'am/tshangs chen gyi lha 'am/snang ba'i lha 'am/chung snang
430b3('bum): gi lha 'am/tshad med snang ba'i lha 'am/kun snang dang ba'i lha 'am/dge ba'i lha 'am/chung dge'i lha 'am/tshad med dge ba'i lha 'am/dge rgyas kyi lha'am/che ba'i lha 'am/chung
430b4('bum): che'i lha 'am/tshad med che ba'i lha 'am/'bras bu che ba'i lha 'am/mi che ba'i lha 'am/mi gdung ba'i lha 'am/shin tu mthong ba'i lha 'am/gya nom snang ba'i lha 'am/'og min
430b5('bum): gyi lha 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 'am/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med
430b6('bum): min skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lus mngon por 'grub ste/dngos po med pa la ni las som/bya ba 'am/'bras bu med de/dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa nyid
430b7('bum): do//rab 'byor de la 'di skad du dngos po med pa la ni bya ba gang yang med de/bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/gshin
431a1('bum): rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/mir skye ba'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/man ma'i lhar skye ba'am/dga' ldan gyi
431a2('bum): lhar skye ba'am/'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/gzhon 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba'am/chongs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs lho nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi
431a3('bum): lhar skyo ba 'am/tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba'am/snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/chung snong gi lhar skye ba'am/tshad mod snang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba'am/dge ba'i lhur
431a4('bum): skye ba 'om/chung dge'i lhar skye ba'amo/tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/tsha ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/tshad med che ba'i lhar skye
431a5('bum): bo'am/'bras bu che ba'i lhor skye ba 'am/mi che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/mi gdung pa'i lhar skyo ba 'am/shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/gyano ma snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/'og mon
431a6('bum): gyi lhar skye ba'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skyo ba 'am/rnam shes mtha' yos skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/'du shes
431a7('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bo'am/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'o ma/phyir mi 'ong
431b1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'am/rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'am/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam la
431b2('bum): spyod pa'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'am/de thob nas sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bya ba gang yang med do
431b3('bum): zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/lam dngos po med pa ma yin nam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po med pa ma yin nam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
431b4('bum): bu dngos po med pa ma yin nam/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po med pa ma yin nam/dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po med pa ma yin nam/rang byang chub dngos po med pa ma yin
431b5('bum): nam/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po med pa me yin nam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med pa ma yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lam ni dngos po
431b6('bum): ma mchis pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dngos po
431b7('bum): ma mchis pa'o//dgra bcom pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o//rang byang chub ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o//rnam pa
432a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/dngos po med pa'i chos shig/
432a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i chos thob par byed snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar na dngos po
432a3('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang /lam gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan
432a4('bum): nyid med pa/mtshan ma med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
432a5('bum): tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can phyin ci log bzhis phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/sdug bsngal ba la bde ba'i 'du shes su
432a6('bum): gyur pa/bdag med pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gyur pa/mi sdug pa la sdug pa'i 'du shes su gyur pa/dngos po la mngon par zhen pa rnams dngos po las rnam par 'brel to///
432a7('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la dngos po zhen pa'o zhes nas/mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po
432b1('bum): de bzhin ma nor bde bzhin zhes bgyi ba ma mchis sam/de ste ma mchis na ni mngon par 'du bgyid par yang ji ltar 'gyur/sug las des kyang shul rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba nas ci ste mi 'grol/
432b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor phyin ci log ma gtogs par gang la gnas te/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams las mngon par 'du byed pa'i dngos po ni chung ngu na
432b3('bum): sgra'i rtse mo cha shas bshags pa tsam yang med do//rab 'byor de lta bas na ci nas kyang don 'di gsal zhing rdzogs pa dang /mkhas pas shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bshad do//
432b4('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rmi lam du mthong ba la rmi la mo mthong ba de gang la gnas shing /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dum/
432b5('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rmi lam nyid kyang ma mchis na/rmi lam mthong ba de la granas shing /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su spyod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis
432b6('bum): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa'am/zag pa
432b7('bum): med pa'am/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la rmi lam dang 'dra ba ma yin pa de lta bu yod dmo/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa 'am/'jig
433a1('bum): rten las 'das pa'am/zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang rmi lam lta bu ma lags pa
433a2('bum): de lta bu ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ci rmi lam la rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan
433a3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rmi lam la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba
433a4('bum): de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/brjod po dang /tshig dang /sgra dang //
433a5('bum): yi ge thams cad kyis gdags su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/me long la gzugs brnyan snang ba de la gang
433a6('bum): las mngon par 'du byed cing /mngon par 'du byas pas/sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
433a7('bum): 'gro ba 'am/mi dang lhar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ni gzhan du na/byis pa rnams
433b1('bum): la bslu ba ma gtogs par dngos po ma mchis pa ste/gzugs brnyan nyid kyang ma mchis na/gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing /mngon par 'du bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar
433b2('bum): mchi ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba'am/gro shin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/mi dang lhar 'gyur ba'i sug las lha smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis lo//bcom
433b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba
433b4('bum): de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/lam bsgoms pas kun
433b5('bum): nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
433b6('bum): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/nags stug po dang /ri dang /gtsong rong dang /lung ba nas sgra brnyan byung na/sgra brnyan de las mngon par 'du byed cing /mngon par 'du byas
433b7('bum): pas/sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/lha dang mir 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/gsol
434a1('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/de la gang sug las mngon par 'du bgyi zhing mngon par 'du
434a2('bum): bgyis na sems can dmyal bar mchi ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/lha dang mir skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i
434a3('bum): ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhor skye ba 'am/mtsha ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/'phrul dga'i lhar skyo ba 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang
434a4('bum): byed kyi lhar skyo ba 'am/tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'amo/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/snang
434a5('bum): ba'i lhar skye bo 'am/chung snang gi lhar skye ba 'om/tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'amo/kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung dge'i lhar skye ba
434a6('bum): 'am/tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am//dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/tsha ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung che'i lhor skye ba 'am/tshad med tshe ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/'bras bu
434a7('bum): che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/mi tsho ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/mi gdong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye bo 'am/gya nom snang ba'i lhar skyo ba 'am/'og min gyi
434b1('bum): lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/'du shes
434b2('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bo lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du semaso/sgra brnyan gyi lam
434b3('bum): gang la bsgoms pas/kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa de lta bu yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
434b4('bum): da ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan nyid kyang shin tu ma mchis pa lags na/lam gang bsgoms pas/kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar
434b5('bum): yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/smig rgyu la chu med par chu'i 'du shes
434b6('bum): su gyur pa dang /chu klung med par chu klung gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang /grong khyer med pa la grong khyer gyi 'du shes su gyur pa dang /skyed mos tshal med par skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes
434b7('bum): su gyur pa de la 'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'du byas pas/sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro
435a1('bum): ba 'am/mir skye ba'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/mtsho mra'i lhar skye ba 'am/dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/
435a2('bum): 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'o ma/tshangasA ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skyo ba 'am/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar
435a3('bum): skye ba 'am/tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/snang po'i lhar skye bo 'am/chung snang gi lhar skye ba'am/tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/dge
435a4('bum): bo'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung dge'i lhar skye ba 'am/tshad mdo dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/dog rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung che'i lhar skyo ba 'am/tshad
435a5('bum): med che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/'bras bu tsho ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/mi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/mi gdung po'i lhar skye ba'am/shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/gya nom snang
435a6('bum): ba'i lhar skye ba 'amo/'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/cung zad
435a7('bum): med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye moched kyi lhar skye bo de lta bu yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das smig rgyu la 'du shes
435b1('bum): phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /mig gris log par mthong ba ma gtogs par chu klung dang /grong khyer dang /skyed mos tshal shin tu ma mchis na/sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis
435b2('bum): pos/sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/mir skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba
435b3('bum): 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'amo//
435b4('bum): tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/chongs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhor skye ba 'am/tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung snang
435b5('bum): gi lhar skye ba'am/tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/dge ba'i lhor skye ba 'am/chung dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/ched med dge bo'i lhar skye ba 'am/
435b6('bum): dag rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/tshad med che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/mi che ba'i lhararo skye ba 'am/
435b7('bum): mi gdung ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/gyen mo snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/'ogo min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkho' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhor skye ba
436a1('bum): 'am/zlum shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar
436a2('bum): skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/phyin ci log gi 'du shes de la lam
436a3('bum): gong bsgoms pas/kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
436a4('bum): de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log gi 'du shes de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/lam gang bsgoms pas/kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi
436a5('bum): 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du
436a6('bum): sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma sna tshogs glang po'i tshogs sam/rta'i tshogs sam/glang gi tshogs sam/dpung bu chung gi tshogs sam/bud med kyi gzugs sam/
436a7('bum): skyes pa'i gzugs mngon par sprul nas/sgyu ma de la gang mngon par 'dra byas pas/sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/gshin
436b1('bum): rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/mir skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/
436b2('bum): 'phrul dga'i lhar skye ba 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs lho nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/
436b3('bum): tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba 'am/snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/tshong snang gi lhar skye ba 'am/tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/kun snang drang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/dge ba'i lhor skye ba
436b4('bum): 'am/chung dge'i lhor skye ba'am/tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye bi'am/dgro rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/che ba'i lhor skye ba 'am/chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/tshad med che ba'i lhar skye
436b5('bum): ba 'amA/'bras bu che bo'i lhar skye ba 'am/mi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/mi gdung ba'i lhor skye ba 'am/shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/
436b6('bum): 'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'om/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba
436b7('bum): 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhor skye ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/sgyu ma de la gang gnas te//
437a1('bum): sug lngas de gang mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas
437a2('bum): su mchi ba'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'am/mir skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye ba 'am/mtsho ma'i lhar
437a3('bum): skye ba 'am/dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba'am/'phrul dga'i lhar skyo bo 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhur skye ba'am/tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba 'om/tshangs lha nye phan
437a4('bum): gyo lhar skye ba 'am/tshengs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs chen gyi lhar skye ba'am/snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung srung gi lhar skyo ba 'am/tshad med snang ba'i
437a5('bum): lhar skye bo'am/kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung doga'i lhar skye bri 'am/tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/drage rgyas kyi lhar skye ba 'am/
437a6('bum): che bri'o lhar skye ba 'am/chung che'i lhar skyo ba 'am/tshad med che ba'i lhor skye ba 'am/'bras bu che bo'i lhar skye ba 'am/mi che ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/mi gdung ba'i lha ro skye ba 'am/
437a7('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/gya nom snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/na mo mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod kyi lhar skye ba 'am/rnam shes mtha'
437b1('bum): yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba ni skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bshags
437b2('bum): pa tsam yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma la lom gang bsgoms pas/kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur
437b3('bum): la rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa gang yang yod dmo/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos
437b4('bum): la nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa mdzad
437b5('bum): na/sprul pa de la las gang mngon par 'du byas pas/sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/mir skye
437b6('bum): ba'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhor skye ba 'am/mtshe ma'i lhar skye ba 'am/dga' ldan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/'phrul dge'i lhar skye ba 'am//
437b7('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye ba 'amo/tshangs ris kyi lhar skye ba'am/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lhar skye ba 'am/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhor skye ba 'am/tshangs chen gyi lhor skye ba 'am/
438a1('bum): snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/chung snang gi lhar skye ba'am/tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/kun snang dang ba'i lhur skye ba'am/dge ba'i lhur skyo ba 'am/chung dga'o//
438a2('bum): lhar skye ba 'am/tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye ba'am/dge rgyas kyi lhar skye ba'am/che ba'i lhor skye ba 'am/chung che'i lhar skye ba 'am/tshad med tsha ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/'bras bu
438a3('bum): che ba'i lhar skye ba'am/mi che ba'i lhar skye bo'am/mi gdung ba'i lhar skyo ba'am/shin tu mthong ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/gya no mo snang ba'i lhar skye ba 'am/'og mon gyi lhar skye ba 'am/
438a4('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'am/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye ba 'am/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha ro skye ba 'am/'du shes med 'du shes
438a5('bum): med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur po de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa de la dngos po ma mchis so//
438a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bkro' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sprul pa de la la me gang bsgoms pas/kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang
438a7('bum): bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
438b1('bum): de la gang la la zhig kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
438b2('bum): de de bzhin te/ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med pa de bzhin du/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba'ang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe no//
438b3('bum): bdag dang bdag gir bya ba la gnas shing /sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/yang dag pa mthong ba ni/kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam
438b4('bum): par byang bar 'gyur ba med do//ji ltar yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang
438b5('bum): bamed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u bdun cu pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di
438b6('bum): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'ang ma mchis pa de bzhin du/yang dag pa ma mthong
438b7('bum): ba la'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma mchis te/de ni chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma
439a1('bum): mchis pa la nI/kun nas nyan mongs pa'am/rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das nga ba nyid la kun nas nyan mongs pa dang /rnam par byung ba ma mchis/
439a2('bum): te/dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/bcom
