439a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ngas rnam par byed bar gsungs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
439a4('bum): kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang
439a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa rnyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa
439a6('bum): rnams ma byung yang rung ste/de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas nyid dang /dbyings 'di lta ste/chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni rab 'byor rnam par byang ba ste/de ni 'jig
439a7('bum): rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi/de ni brjod du med cing smos su med pa ste/sgra dang tshig thams cad kyil ma las 'das pa'i chos so//gsol po/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos
439b1('bum): thams cad rmi lam lta bu/sgra brnyan lta bu/mig yor lta bu/smig rgyu lta bu/sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu lags na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rmi lam/
439b2('bum): lta bu dang /chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang /chos thams cing mi g.yor lta bu dang /chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu dang /chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang /chos thams cad sprul/
439b3('bum): pa lta bu ste/dngos po ma mchis pa/rdzas ma mchis pa la/bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
439b4('bum): bya'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
439b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
439b6('bum): stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//phyi stong pa nyid yongs
439b7('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//don dam
440a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//mtha' las
440a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rang bzhin stong
440a3('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa
440a4('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
440a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su
440a6('bum): rdzogs par bya'o//dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//'phags pa'i
440a7('bum): lam yan log brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//tshang med pa
440b1('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i
440b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dbu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//mngon par shes pa
440b3('bum): lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
440b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par
440b5('bum): bya'o//snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//mi chen po'i mtshon sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
440b6('bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems
440b7('bum): kyis yongs su shes par bya ste/dbyings gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bgyi bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
441a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmi lam lta
441a2('bum): bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu ma yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag rmil ma
441a3('bum): lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu lags na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
441a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das rmi lam ni yang dag pa ma legs/sgra brnyan ni yang dag pa ma lags/mig yor ni yang dag pa ma lags/smig
441a5('bum): rgyu ni yang dag pa mi lags/sgyu ma ni yang dag pa ma legs/sprul pa ni yang dag pa ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa ma lags pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
441a6('bum): pa la spyad pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /bsam gtan
441a7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /phyi nong stong pa nyid la spyad
441b1('bum): pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /chen po stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /'dusu ma byas stong pa
441b2('bum): nyid la spyad pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /thig ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyaspyod pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
441b3('bum): spyad pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lo spyod pa
441b4('bum): dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la spyad po dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyad pa dang /
441b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang /stobs lnga la spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang
441b6('bum): pa la spyad pa dang /'phagos pa'i bden pa bzhi le spyod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang /tshod med pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
441b7('bum): la spyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyad pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med
442a1('bum): pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyad pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang //
442a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyad pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /byams pa chen po la spyad pa dang /snying
442a3('bum): rje chen po la spyad pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya b.ro mi nus so//
442a4('bum): bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/yang dag pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyad pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad
442a5('bum): pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad po dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol
442a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /chen po
442a7('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /mtho'i las 'das pa
442b1('bum): stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang //rang bzhin stong pa nyid lnga spyad pa dang /chos thams cad
442b2('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lo spyad pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa
442b3('bum): nyid la spyad pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lo spyad pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi lo spyad pa dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
442b4('bum): pa bzhi lo spyad pa dang /dbang po lnga la spyad pa dang /stobs lnga la spyad pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyad pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yon lag brgyad pa la spyadapa
442b5('bum): dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi la spyad pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /
442b6('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /mthir gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /sman pa meng
442b7('bum): pa la spyad pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la spyad pa dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyad pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
443a1('bum): bcu la spyang pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /sos yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyad pa dang /byams pa chen po la spyad pa dang /snying rje chen po la spyad
443a2('bum): pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so///
443a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//ba mo pa nyis brgya go dgu pa//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
443a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du
443a5('bum): sems/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das don ma
443a6('bum): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du semaso/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
443a7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du soms/brtson 'grus
443b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
443b2('bum): bka' stsal po/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/bsom gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol
443b3('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
443b4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsol pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
443b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yid dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
443b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/phyi stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan

444a1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/stong pa
444a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
444a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/chen po stong pa nyid bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom

444a5('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems//'dus
444a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das
444a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol
444b1('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
444b2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma logs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/thog
444b3('bum): mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan

444b6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/chos thams
444b7('bum): cad stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
445a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

445a3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
445a4('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan
445a5('bum): 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/
445a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/dngos
445a7('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
445b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol
445b2('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/yang dag par spong ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
445b3('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rdzu 'phrul gyi
445b4('bum): rkang pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
445b5('bum): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/dbang po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan
445b6('bum): 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
445b7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub kyi yan lag
446a1('bum): rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan
446a2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
446a3('bum): 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
446a4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
446a5('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/bsam gtan rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan
446a6('bum): 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ched med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
446a7('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du semaso/gzugs
446b1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom
446b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rnam por thar pa rnams bla nu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol
446b3('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na med pa
446b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de
446b5('bum): ji snyam du sems/rnam por thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
446b6('bum): 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/mngon par shes pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag
446b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
447a1('bum): snyam du sems/ting nge 'dzin rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de
447a2('bum): ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
447a3('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs
447a4('bum): pa'i stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan
447a5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du semos/mi 'jigs pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol
447a6('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag
447a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de rje
447b1('bum): snyam du sems/byams pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom
447b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/snying rje chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/gsol pa/
447b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das don mi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bla na med pa yang drag par
447b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
447b5('bum): de de bzhin to/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang
447b6('bum): drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang
447b7('bum): mi rgyu'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa
448a1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
448a2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu'o//nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya'o//phyi stong pa nyid blo na med pa yang
448a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//
448a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//chen po stong pa nyid blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
448a5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//'dus byas stong
448a6('bum): pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
448a7('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//thog mo dang tha ma med pa
448b1('bum): stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
448b2('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//chos thams cad stong po nyid bla na med pa yang
448b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi
448b4('bum): rgya'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par
448b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//dngos
448b6('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
448b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//yang dag par spong ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//rdzu 'phrul
449a1('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//dbang po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
449a2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//byang chub kyi yan
449a3('bum): lag rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
449a4('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//bsam
449a5('bum): gtan rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//tshad med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
449a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o///
449a7('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
449b1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bla na med pa yang
449b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//mngon par shes pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi
449b3('bum): rgya'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
449b4('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//mi 'jigs
449b5('bum): pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
449b6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//byams pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'cha mi rgya'o//snying rje chen po bla na med pa yang
449b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
450a1('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa mngon par 'dus byas pa ste/'dus byas pa dang /
450a2('bum): mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos kyis ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so//rab 'byor 'on kyang chos de dag ni thams cad kyang la mi bsgrub pa dang /lam
450a3('bum): bskyed pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ste/'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ni ma yin no//chos de dag gi mi skye ba dang /mi 'byung ba gang yin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'ang de yin te/de lta bas na byung
450a4('bum): chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge ba'i chos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/bzod
450a5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/nang stong pa nyid dam/phyi
450a6('bum): stong pa nyid du ma/phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/chen po stong pa nyid dam/don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/'dus ma/
450a7('bum): kyis stong pa nyid dam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmo/rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/
450b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med
450b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams
450b3('bum): sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams
450b4('bum): sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo
450b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'am/mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs
450b6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
450b7('bum): pa rnams sam/dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom yang de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
451a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong
451a2('bum): pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang //
451a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
451a4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
451a5('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs
451a6('bum): rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i badren pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med
451a7('bum): pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam
451b1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs//
451b2('bum): pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
451b3('bum): po de dag yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par/sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya bar mi nus pas/de'i phyir de lta bas na byang
451b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rlom yang de thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes so//sgra brnyan lta bur
451b5('bum): shes so//mig yor lta bur shes so//smig rgyu lta bur shes so//sgyu ma lta bur shes so//sprul pa lta bur shes so//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha
451b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so//sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yorari lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur shes so//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
451b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so//sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur shes so//
452a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so//sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bru dang /
452a2('bum): sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur shes so//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so//sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yod
452a3('bum): lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur shes so//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur
452a4('bum): shes so//A ban+d+han lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyum lta bu dang /sprul pa lto bur shes so//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/shes rab
452a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rmi lam lta bur shes so//sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig mor lta bu dang /smigaN+DI lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur shes so//do shes rab kyi pha rol tu
452a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nang stong pa nyid rmi lam lte bur shes so//sgra brtan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur shes so//
452a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/phyi stong pa nyid rmi lam lta bur shes so//sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul

459b2('bum): zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa ste/gnyis kyis ni gang yang thob pa 'am/mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan
459b3('bum): 'das de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis na/gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das
459b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med de/gnyis su med pas kyang thob pa dang /mngon par rtogasu par 'gyur ba med do//
459b5('bum): gang la gnyis kyang med la/mi gnyis pa'ang med pa ni thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'di ni thob pa'o//'di ni mngon par rtogs
459b6('bum): pa'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste/chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de/spros pa med pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i
459b7('bum): ngo bo nyid rnams la/chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'ang gang zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang la dngos po med pa dang /dngos po med pa la'ang
460a1('bum): ma yin pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa dang /yongs su brjod pa med pa 'di ni/chos mnyam pa nyid de/chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni brjod du med pa'o//chos mnyam/
460a2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par yang dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de/chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o//chos mnyam pa nyid
460a3('bum): ni byis pa 'am/'phags pa 'am/chos gang gis kyang shes par mi rung zhing /yul ma yin pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni de
460a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin te/
460a5('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/dgra bcom pa 'am/rang byang chub bam/byang chub sems dpa' lam/de bzhin
460a6('bum): gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad
460a7('bum): kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan la/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
460b1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la
460b2('bum): mnga' sbyar bar yang 'gyur na/rab 'byor so so'i skye ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /lhan cig
460b3('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
460b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
460b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang med do//de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin
460b6('bum): pa dang /'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o//'di ni rgyun du zhugs
460b7('bum): pa'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//'di ni ngag bcom pa'o//'di ni rang sangs rgyas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o//'di ni de bzhin
461a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba med do/rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so//
461a2('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ste/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o//'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni
461a3('bum): mi 'ong ba'o//'di ni dgra bcom pa'o//'di ni rang sangs rgyas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i
461a4('bum): sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag mi dmigs na/des so so'i skye bo rnams dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir
461a5('bum): mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
461a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/chos thams cad
461a7('bum): mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /len cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang
461b1('bum): sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par med do//gsol pa/bcom
461b2('bum): ldan 'das de ste/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra
461b3('bum): bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chubo sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad
461b4('bum): par ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /chos dkon mchog dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog dang /dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten
461b5('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan
461b6('bum): te/dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
461b7('bum): pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la/chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan
462a1('bum): pa ma lags kyi/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags
462a2('bum): bapa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma lags/mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/gzugs ma mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa/thogs pa ma
462a3('bum): mchis pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o//de ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o//'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o//
462a4('bum): 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//'di ni dgra bcom pa'o//'di ni rang sangs rgyas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs
462a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par dgod par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
462a6('bum): de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de ste de bzhin
462a7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/chos rnams
462b1('bum): rnam par dgod par ma mdzad na/sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/byol song gi skye gnas yod par mngon nam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten yod par mngon nam/mi yod par
462b2('bum): mngon nam/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/dun cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yod par mngon nam/mtshe ma'i lha yod par mngon nam/dga' ldan gyi lha yod par mngon
462b3('bum): nam/'phrul dga'i lha yod par mngon nam/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod par mngon nam/tshangs ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha yod par mngon
462b4('bum): nam/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha yod par mngon nam/tshangs chen gyi lha yod par mngon nam/snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/chung snang gi lha yod par mngon nam/tshad med
462b5('bum): snang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/kun snang dang ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/dge ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/chung dge'i lha yod par mngon nam/tshad med dge ba'i lha yod par
462b6('bum): mngon nam/dge rgyas kyi lha yod par mngon nam/che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/chung che'i lha yod par mngon nam/tshad med che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/'bras bu che ba'i
462b7('bum): lha yod par mngon nam/mi che ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/mi gdung ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/shin tu mthong ba'i lha yod par mngon nam/gya nom snang ba'i lha yod par
463a1('bum): mngon nam/'og min gyi lha yod par mngon nam/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod kyi lta yod par mngon nam/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha yod/
463a2('bum): par mngon nam/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin
463a3('bum): pa yod par mngon nam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod
463a4('bum): par mngon nam/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par
463a5('bum): mngon nam/nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/phyi stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon
463a6('bum): nam/chen po stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod
463a7('bum): par mngon nam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod par
463b1('bum): mngon nam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/mi dmigs pa
463b2('bum): stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod par mngon
463b3('bum): nam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod par mngon nam/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod par mngon nam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod par mngon nam/dbang po rnams yod
463b4('bum): par mngon nam/stobs rnams yod par mngon nam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod par mngon nam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/'phags
463b5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yod par mngon nam/bsam gtan rnams yod par mngon nam/tshad med pa rnams yod par mngon nam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
463b6('bum): yod par mngon nam/rnam par thar pa rnams yod par mngon nam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod par mngon nam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
463b7('bum): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yod par mngon nam/mngon par shes pa rnams yod par mngon nam/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod par mngon nam/gzungs
464a1('bum): kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod par mngan nam/mi 'jigs pa rnams yod par mngon nam/so so yang dag
464a2('bum): par rig pa rnams yod par mngon nam/byams pa chen po yod par mngon nam/snying rje chen po yod par mngon nam/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon
464a3('bum): nam/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod par mngon nam/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam/sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/chos
464a4('bum): dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/nyan thos kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/
464a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yod par mngon nam/theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon nam/chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yod par mngon
464a6('bum): nam/brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/rgyun du zhugs pa yod par mngon nam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/phyir mi 'ong ba yod par mngon nam/dgra bcom
464a7('bum): pa yod par mngon nam/rang sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/byang chub sems dpa' yod par mngon nam/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
464b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
464b2('bum): 'byor de lta bas na/de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o////shes
464b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po sum brgya pa//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba de bzhin du/so
464b4('bum): so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/de bzhin
464b5('bum): du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/de bzhin du brgyad pa'ang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/de bzhin du rgyun
464b6('bum): du zhugs pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/de bzhin du
464b7('bum): phyir me 'ong ba rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/de bzhin du
465a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid lngas mi g.yo ba
465a2('bum): lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o//chos
465a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang //
465a4('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag
465a5('bum): pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni/so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi
465a6('bum): dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/de nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin
465a7('bum): nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'o//de nyid ni/
465b1('bum): chos kyi rjes su 'byung ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma min pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang //
465b2('bum): chos sbyin med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'o//de nyid ni brgyad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /
465b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mna'o//de nyid ni rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang /
465b4('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'o//de nyid ni lan cig phyir
465b5('bum): 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi grwanas nyid dang /chos skyon med
465b6('bum): pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i bana'o//de nyid ni phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang /gzhon ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos
465b7('bum): kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'o//de nyid ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan
466a1('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'o//de nyid ni rang
466a2('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhon ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos
466a3('bum): skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'o//de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /mi nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin
466a4('bum): po de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/de dag thams cad ni chos
466a5('bum): mnyam pa nyid de las rnam par mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag gi chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /de bzhin
466a6('bum): nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtho' ni de nyid yin te/de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang
466a7('bum): yang med do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa nyid/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba
466b1('bum): rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi
466b2('bum): chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa
466b3('bum): nyid/de nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
466b4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam po nyid lags na/bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /
466b5('bum): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /
466b6('bum): chos dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg
466b7('bum): pa dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i rnam
467a1('bum): par shes pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
467a2('bum): dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sa'i
467a3('bum): khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /
467a4('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang
467a5('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
467a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /smon lam gyi pha
467a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang
467b1('bum): dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
467b2('bum): pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi
467b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las
467b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan
467b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /rnam par thar pa
467b6('bum): brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin
467b7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
468a1('bum): bco brgyad dang /mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /'dus byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams te/bcom ldan
468a2('bum): 'das chos de dag ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba/gcig las gcig 'odas pa'o//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang
468a3('bum): gzhan la/tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/'du shes kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan te/mig gi chos
468a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/rna ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/sna'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/lce'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/lus kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/yid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
468a5('bum): gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/sgra'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/dri'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ro'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/reg gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/chos kyi chos nyid kyang
468a6('bum): gzhan/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/lce'i rnam
468a7('bum): par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos
468b1('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/lus kyi 'dus
468b2('bum): te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
468b3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/lce'o 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/lus
468b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/sa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/chu'i
468b5('bum): khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/me'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/rnam par shes
468b6('bum): pa'i khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ma rig pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/'du byed kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/ming dang gzugs kyi
468b7('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/skye mched drug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/reg pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/tshor ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/sred pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/len pa'i
469a1('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/srid du'i chos nyid kya gnan/skye ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/rga shi'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang glan na/
469a2('bum): sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/tshul khrims kyi
469a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/bsam gtan gyi pha rol
469a4('bum): tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/phyi nang
469a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/stong pa nyid stong po nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/
469a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/thog ma dang
469a7('bum): mamado pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/chos thams cad stong pa nyid
469b1('bum): kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan///
469b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag par spong
469b3('bum): ba rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/byang chub kyi yan
469b4('bum): lag rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/bsam gtan rnams kyi
469b5('bum): chos nyid kyang gzhan/tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang
469b6('bum): gzhan/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi cho sna nyid kyang gzhan/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos nyid kyang
469b7('bum): gzhan/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhin/de bzhin gshegs
470a1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/byams pa
470a2('bum): chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/snying rje chen po'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/mi chen po'i mtshan rnams kyi chos nyid
470a3('bum): kyang gzhan/dpe byad bzang po rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/'dus byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/bcom
470a4('bum): ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur pa lags/chos rnam par dgod par ni ji ltar 'gyur/byang chub sems
470a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags/chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni
470a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi
470a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags/ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/
470b1('bum): mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /tshul khrim
470b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
470b3('bum): bgyi ba dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /de dag la rnam par brtse bas
470b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mche ba lags/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa legs/de dag tu'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa lags//
470b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gang
470b6('bum): 'di skad du de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid//
470b7('bum): de nyid chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid brgyad pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid lan cig
471a1('bum): phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid rang
471a2('bum): rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid/de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
471a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor de
471a4('bum): ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/'du shes kyi chos nyid gang yin
471a5('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/'du byed kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/mig
471a6('bum): gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rna ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/sna'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam//
471a7('bum): lce'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lus kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin na ma/yid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
471b1('bum): nam/gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/sgra'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/dri'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yid
471b2('bum): nam/ro'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/reg gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/chos kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
471b3('bum): yin nam/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid mA yin nam/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/sna'i
471b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lus kyi rnam par shes
471b5('bum): pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid mi yin nam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid
471b6('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
471b7('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
472a1('bum): nam/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid
472a2('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid
472a3('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
472a4('bum): ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/sa'i khams kyi
472a5('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/chu'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/me'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
472a6('bum): ma yin nam/rlung gi khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/nam mkha'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rnam par
472a7('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ma rig pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/'du byed kyi chos nyid gang
472b1('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ming dang gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
472b2('bum): yin nam/skye mched drug gi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/reg pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/tshor ba'i chos nyid gang yin
472b3('bum): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/sred pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/len pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/srid pa'i chos
472b4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/skye ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rga shi'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam//
472b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/bzod
472b6('bum): po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/bsam gtan
472b7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/nang stong pa nyid
473a1('bum): kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
473a2('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/chen po stong pa nyid kyi chos
473a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid
473a4('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
473a5('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/dor ba med pa stong
473a6('bum): pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/chos thams cad stong pa
473a7('bum): nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/mi dmigs pa
473b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
473b2('bum): kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/dran pa nye bar bzhag
473b3('bum): pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
473b4('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/dbang po rnams kyi chos nyid grang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/stobs rnams kyi chos nyid gang
473b5('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nAm/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
473b6('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/bsam gtan rnams kyi chos
473b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/tshad med pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
474a1('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/mthar gyis/gnas
474a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan pa med pa dang /smor pa med pa'i
474a3('bum): chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi chos nyid
474a4('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi chos nyid
474a5('bum): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi chos nyid
474a6('bum): grang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/snying rje chen po'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang
474a7('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos
474b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa
474b2('bum): de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rang byang chub kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
474b3('bum): yin nam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/lan
474b4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/dgra bcom pa'i chos nyid gang
474b5('bum): yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
474b6('bum): ma yin nam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das
474b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dam/'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/rnam
475a1('bum): par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/mig gi mtshan nyid dam/rna ba'i mtshan nyid dam/sna'i mtshan nyid ngam/lce'i mtshan nyid dam/lus
475a2('bum): kyi mtshan nyid dam/yid kyi mtshan nyid dam/gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/sgra'i mtshan nyid dam/dri'i mtshan nyid dam/r-i'i mtshan nyid dam/reg
475a3('bum): gi mtshan nyid dam/chos kyi mtshan nyid dam/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/sna'i rnam par
475a4('bum): shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan
475a5('bum): nyid dam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
475a6('bum): mtshan nyid dam/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan
475a7('bum): nyid dam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
475b1('bum): gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/sa'i khams kyi
475b2('bum): mtshan nyid dmA/chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dmA/rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid dmau/nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/rnam
475b3('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid dam/'du byed kyi mtshan nyid dam/rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ming dang gzugs kyi
475b4('bum): mtshan nyid dam/skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid dam/reg pa'i mtshan nyid dam/tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dam/sred pa'i mtshan nyid dam/len pa'i mtshan nyid dam/
475b5('bum): srid pa'i mtshan nyid dam/skye ba'i mtshan nyid dam/rga shi'i mtshan nyid dam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan
475b6('bum): nyid dam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam
475b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/stong pa
476a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi
476a2('bum): mtshan nyid dam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
476a3('bum): dam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/rang gi mtshan nyid
476a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/
476a5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/rdzu 'phrul gyi
476a6('bum): rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/'phags pa'i
476a7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid
476b1('bum): dram/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan
476b2('bum): nyid dam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dam/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/ting nge 'dzin rnams
476b3('bum): kyi mtshan nyid dam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/so so
476b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dam/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/
476b5('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
476b6('bum): dri ma/rang byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dmA/lAm gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam+ba/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/lan
476b7('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/phyir mi 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid dam/dgra bcom pa'i mtshan nyid dam/rang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid dam/byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid
477a1('bum): dam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
477a2('bum): 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de lta bas na rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste/chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa
477a3('bum): de la'ang so so'i skye bo med/so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba med/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang chos kyi
477a4('bum): rjes su 'brang ba mod/chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang brgyad pa med/brgyud pa las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa med/rgyun du zhugs
477a5('bum): pa las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang lan cig phyir 'ong ba med/lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang phyir mi 'ong ba med/phyir mi 'ong ba las gud na'ang de med/de
477a6('bum): la'ang dgra bcom pa med/dgra bcom pa las gud na'ang de med/de la 'od rang sangs rgyas med/rang sangs rgyas las gang na'ang de med/de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' med//
