477a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa med/de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na'ang de med par rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom
477b1('bum): ldan 'das chos nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam/'dus ma bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin/'dus ma byas kyang
477b2('bum): ma yin te/'dus byas las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas dmigs su med do//'dus ma byas las gud na'ang 'dus byas dmigs su med do//rab 'byor de ltar 'dus byos kyi
477b3('bum): khams gang yin pa dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/gzugs med pa bstan du med po/thogs
477b4('bum): pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod kyi/don dam par ma yin te/don dam
477b5('bum): pa la lus kyi 'du byed dam/ngag gi 'du byed dam/yid kyi 'du byed med de/lus kyi 'du byed dang /drag gi 'du byed dang /yid kyi 'du byed las gud na'ang don dam pa
477b6('bum): dmigs su med do//'on kyang 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don dam pa ste/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
477b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/don dam pa las kyang mi g.yol/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang byed do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
478a1('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o///de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
478a2('bum): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stod pa ste/de'i slad du chos gang la'ang gang yang ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis na/de ltar
478a3('bum): chos thams cad ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis shing /ci'ang ma lags pa la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
478a4('bum): don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa dang /don bgyi ba dang /don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don bgyid pa lags/bcom
478a5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gang la'ang ci la'ang byed pa'ang
478a6('bum): mingad/ci'ang mi byed pa'ang med de/gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni/de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/snyems can
478a7('bum): rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /sems can gyi 'du shes
478b1('bum): dang bral bar byed cing /sems can gyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel bdud/srog gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /stsog/
478b2('bum): gi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /'gro ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /'gro ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa
478b3('bum): nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /gso ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /gso ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa
478b4('bum): dang /skyes bu'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /skyes bu'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /gang zag gi 'du shes dang
478b5('bum): bral bar byed cing /gang zag gi 'du shos dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /shed can gyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /shed can
478b6('bum): gyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /shed bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /shed bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong
478b7('bum): pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grol ba dang /byed pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /byed pa po'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
479a1('bum): ba dang /tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grol ba dang /shes
479a2('bum): pa po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /shes pa po'i 'du shes dang phul nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral
479a3('bum): bar byed cing /mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /gzugs
479a4('bum): kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong
479a5('bum): pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /'du shes kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /'du shes kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las
479a6('bum): 'grel pa dang /'du byed rnams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /'du khyod rnams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /
479a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rnam por shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /mig gi 'du
479b1('bum): shes dang bral bar byed cing /mig gi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba dang /rna ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rna bu'i 'du shes drang
479b2('bum): phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /sna'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /sna'i 'du shes dang bral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /lce'i 'du
479b3('bum): shes dang bral bar byed cing /lce'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /lus kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /lus kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong
479b4('bum): pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /yid kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /yid kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor po las 'grel ba dang /gzugs kyi 'du shes
479b5('bum): dang bral bar byed cing /gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /sgra'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /sgra'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis
479b6('bum): 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /dri'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /dri'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grol ba dang /ro'i 'du shes deng bral bar byed cing /ro'i
479b7('bum): 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba los 'brel ba dang /reg gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /reg gi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las
480a1('bum): 'grel pa dang /chos kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /chos kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
480a2('bum): 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'gral ba dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar
480a3('bum): byed cing /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /sna'i rnam par
480a4('bum): shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'gel ba dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang
480a5('bum): phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa
480a6('bum): nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor
480a7('bum): ba las 'grel pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /mig go 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa
480b1('bum): dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grol ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
480b2('bum): 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing //
480b3('bum): lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /lus kyi 'dus te rig
480b4('bum): pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes dang
480b5('bum): phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
480b6('bum): ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rna ba'i 'dus te
480b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshir ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'brel ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing
481a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phul nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
481a2('bum): ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /lus kyi 'dus
481a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
481a4('bum): ba dang /yod kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis
481a5('bum): 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /sa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /
481a6('bum): chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /chu'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /me'i khams kyi 'du shes dang
481a7('bum): bral bar byed cing /me'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /rlung gi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rlung gi khams kyi
481b1('bum): 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid
481b2('bum): kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor
481b3('bum): ba las 'grel pa dang /ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /ma rig pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /'du byed kyi 'du shes dang
481b4('bum): bral bar byed cing /'du byed kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rnam par shes
481b5('bum): pe'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /ming dang gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/
481b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /skye mched drug gi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las
481b7('bum): 'grel ba dang /reg pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /reg pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /tshor ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar
482a1('bum): byed cing /tshor ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /sred pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /sred pa'i 'du shes
482a2('bum): dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /len pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /len pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las
482a3('bum): 'grel pa dang /srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /srid pa'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /skye ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing //
482a4('bum): skye ba'i 'du shes deng phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /rga shi'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rga shi'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor
482a5('bum): bo las 'grel ba dang /'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel
482a6('bum): ba dang /'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa nyid yin yang /'du so ma byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthur mi 'gyur ro//gsol
482a7('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'du shes 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/rab 'byor la la
482b1('bum): zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul na de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//sprul pa de la gang stong pa nyid ma
482b2('bum): lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma lags/mi ldan pa'ang ma lags te/
482b3('bum): de gnyis ka'ang stong pa nyid kyis stong na/de ci'i slad du 'dri ni stong pa nyid do//'di ni sprul pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcab par mdzad/de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di lta ste/
482b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang /sprul pa gnyis ka'ang stong pa nyid la dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes
482b5('bum): sam/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa gang sprul pa ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul pa
482b6('bum): lags kyang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /
482b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /rnam par
483a1('bum): thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs
483a2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
483a3('bum): brgyad dang /de dag gi 'bras bu gang gis gang zag rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gshegs
483a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes gang zag rnam par dgod pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
483a5('bum): chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/de la la la ni nyan thos kyis sprul pa'o//la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o//la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o//la la ni de bzhin
483a6('bum): gshegs pas sprul pa'o//la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o//la la ni las kyis sprul pa'o//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni sprul pa'o//gsol pa//
483a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba'am/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom
483b1('bum): pa nyid dam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/bcom ldan
483b2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor bskyed pa 'am/bgag pa'i chos gang ci'ang rung ste/de thams cad ni sprul pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i ches
483b3('bum): de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos gang la skye ba'ang med/'gag pa'ang med pa de ni ma sprul pa'o//gsol pa/de gang lags/bcom
483b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste/chos de ni ma sprul pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du stong pa nyid las kyang mi
483b5('bum): g.yo la/gnyis su'ang mi dmigs te/chos grang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu med do zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das
483b6('bum): pa'ang sprul par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/de dag ni nyan thos
483b7('bum): kyis ma byas/rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
484a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad de/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das las dang
484a2('bum): po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na/ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
484a3('bum): ci sngon dngos po yod par gyur la/phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba yod dam/rab 'byor 'di la dngos po yod pa'ang med/dngos po med pa'ang med/ngo bo nyid kyang med//
484a4('bum): gzhan gyi dngos po'ang med na/de la gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skan/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
484a5('bum): las/le'u bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po sum brgya gcig po//de nas bcom
484a6('bum): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/byang chub
484a7('bum): sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'tshal bas/gzugs la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la ji
484b1('bum): ltar bslab par bgyi/mig gi skye mched dang /rna ba'i skye mched dang /sna'i skye mched dang /lce'i skye mched dang /lus kyi skye mched dang /yid kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par
484b2('bum): bgyi/gzugs kyi skye mched dang /sgra'i skye mched dang /dri'i skye mched dang /ro'i skye mched dang /reg bya'i skye mched dang /chos kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/mig gi
484b3('bum): khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams
484b4('bum): dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams
484b5('bum): dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/mig gi reg pa'i
484b6('bum): skye mched dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyi reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/'du byed rnams dang /
484b7('bum): rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg po dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi la ji ltar
485a1('bum): bslab par bgyi/sdug bsngal gyi badren pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /'gog pa'i bden pa dang /lam gyi bden pa la ji
485a2('bum): ltar bslab par bgyi/gzugs can gyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/gzugs can ma lags pa dang /bstan du mchis pa dang /bstan du ma mchis pa dang /
485a3('bum): thogs pa dang bcas pa dang /thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /'dus bgyis pa dang /'dus ma bgyis pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa ma mchis pa dang /kha na
485a4('bum): mtho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang /bsten par bgyi ba dang /bsten par bgyi ba ma lags pa dang /ngan pa dang /gya nom pa dang /nang dang /phyi dang /
485a5('bum): mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /bye brag phyed pa dang /rnam par shes pa dang /'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba dang /dge ba dang /mi dge ba dang /lung du ma
485a6('bum): bstan pa dang /'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang /gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa dang /gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang /ldan pa ma lags pa dang /slob
485a7('bum): pa dang /mi slob pa dang /'dod chags dang /khong khro ba dang /nga rgyal dang /ma rig pa dang /lta ba dang /the tshom la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ser sna dang /sbyin pa
485b1('bum): dang /'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /tshul khrims bzang po dang /gnod sems dang /bzod pa dang /le lo dang /brtson 'grus dang /rnam par ga yeng ba dang /bsam gan
485b2('bum): dang /'chal pa'i shes rab dang /shes rab la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/rnam par rtog pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /mtshan ma mchis pa dang /log pa'i
485b3('bum): smon lam dang /smon pa ma mchis pa dang /mi sdug pa'i chos rnams dang /mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/nyon mongs pa
485b4('bum): rnams dang nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byung ba dang /'khor ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa dang /byang chub dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
485b5('bum): la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
485b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas/gzugs ming tsam mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o//tshor ba
485b7('bum): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ming tsam mo zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsamo mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o//
486a1('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/'dri
486a2('bum): lta ste/gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/'di lta ste tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba'i
486a3('bum): ming 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa nas/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming 'di ni/'du byed kyi mtshan ma nye bar bzung ste/dngos po
486a4('bum): dang bcas par dmigs pa lags na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas gzugs ming tsam zhes bgyi bar bslab par bgyi/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
486a5('bum): dang /rnam par shes pa ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming tsam zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bslab par bgyi/dngos po ma mchis lags na/de'i
486a6('bum): ming de'ang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags te/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so//'di lta ste tshor ba dang /'du shes
486a7('bum): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'ang ming tsam kho
486b1('bum): na zhes bgyir mi rung lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'di lta ste/gzugs zhes
486b2('bum): bya ba de dang /'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/glo bur du ming btags pa'o//'di lta ste/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
486b3('bum): zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming btags pa'o//'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar 'di'ang glo bur du ming btags pa'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan
486b4('bum): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming ma mchis par ni/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po
486b5('bum): des ming de rig pa dang /rtogs pa dang /'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur la gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming des ni/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rtogs pa dang /'tshal bar
486b6('bum): yang 'gyur na/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la/glo bur du ming btags so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das
486b7('bum): 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des/tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang /'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba
487a1('bum): dang /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po des/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming rig pa dang /rtogs pa dang //
487a2('bum): 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur la/tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang /'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de dang /sangs rgyas
487a3('bum): kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar des ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de nyid reg pa dang /rtogs pa dang /'tshal bar yang 'gyur na/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba dang /
487a4('bum): 'di lta ste/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du/'du
487a5('bum): byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/glo bur du mong btags so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
487a6('bum): byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/'di lta ste/khyod
487a7('bum): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming de la ma brten ma gnas/gnas ma bcas par 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/'di
487b1('bum): ni gzugs yin no zhes bya bar de jig do snyam du sems sam/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//byams pa de ji snyam du sems/khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/
487b2('bum): 'di lta ste/tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/'du byed
487b3('bum): kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming de la ma brten/ma gnas/gnas ma bcas par 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos
487b4('bum): po de dang de la/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar la/khyod ji ga de snyam du sems sam/gsol
487b5('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang /'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du
487b6('bum): byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/'du byed kyi mtshan mA'i dngos po de dang de la/glo bur du ming btagos pa dang /'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos
487b7('bum): rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de'ang 'du byed kyi mtshan mo'i dngos po de dang de la/glo bur du ming btags pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o//byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ming dang
488a1('bum): /brda dang tha snyad dang /btags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la nye bar 'dogs pa'am tha snyad dum/'dogs pa 'am/mngon par
488a2('bum): zhen pa yin nam/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so//byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang /'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba dang /'di lta ste/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
488a3('bum): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de ni/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la glo bur du ming btags pa
488a4('bum): yin par de ltar rig par bya'o//byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/'di la 'ga' zhig 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de nyid la/de las gzhan pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i
488a5('bum): dngos por ming 'dogs sam/'du shes sam/rjes su tha snyad 'dogs sam/mngon par zhen par byed dam/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so//byams pa rnam grangs
488a6('bum): 'dis kyang /'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba dang /'di lta ste/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /'di lta ste/sangs rgyas
488a7('bum): kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar 'ad ni/glo bur du ming btags pa yin par de ltar rig par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
488b1('bum): byams pas 'dind ces gsol///bcom ldan 'das de lta lags nAn/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes paskye ba dang /'dasasku tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnam /
488b2('bum): rnam par shes pa dang /'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang nye bar bzung nas/ming dang /'du shes dang /'odags pa dang /
488b3('bum): rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par 'gyur ba/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lcags sam/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
488b4('bum): dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'di lta ste/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la/gzugs zhes bya bar ming dang /'du shes dang /'dogs po dang /rjes sum
488b5('bum): snyid 'dogs par byed pa la/byams po 'di ji snyam du sems/de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin nam/btags po tsam du zad /gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das btags patsam
488b6('bum): du bas lags so//byams pa'o na 'di lta ste/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs
488b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar ni/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar/byams pa khyod ji ltar de snyam du sems/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/
489a1('bum): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid de btags pa tsam du zad dam/bcom
489a2('bum): ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas lags so//byams pa'o na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar
489a3('bum): gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar khyod ji ltar de ji snyam du sems/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
489a4('bum): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs ming dang /'du shes dang /brda dang /btags pa dang /tha snyad tsam kho na lags shing /tshor ba dang /'du shes
489a5('bum): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du/ming dang /'du shes dang /badz+ra dang /btags pa dang /tha snyad tsam kho na
489a6('bum): lags na/de lta na 'di lta ste/ming dang /'du shes dang /brda dang btags pa dang /tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi bas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags
489a7('bum): sam/de lta na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam//
489b1('bum): deskad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs zhes bya ba'i mi
489b2('bum): dang /'du shes dang /brda dang /btags pa dang /tho snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la jig skye ba 'am/'jig pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba yod dam/bcom
489b3('bum): ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'o na khyod 'di snyam du/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/byams pa 'di
489b4('bum): ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang /'du shes dang /brda dang btags
489b5('bum): pa dang /tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la jig skye ba 'am/'jig pa'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
489b6('bum): mchis lags so//bkra' stsal pa/byams pa 'o na khyod 'di snyam du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs
489b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams
490a1('bum): pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/bcom ldan 'das ni rnam
490a2('bum): pa thams cad du/mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis
490a3('bum): pa kho na lags sam/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams
490a4('bum): cad kyis gzugs med do zhes nga mi smra'o//byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
490a5('bum): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med do zhes nga mi smra'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol
490a6('bum): to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/gzugs mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs
490a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mchis pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'jig
490b1('bum): rten gyi brda dang /tha snyad kyis gzugs yod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no//byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda dang /tha snyad kyis tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
490b2('bum): par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar yod kyi/don dam par ni ma yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams
490b3('bum): pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/dbyings 'di ni don dam par na brjed du ma mchis pa'o//
490b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings don dam par mchis su lags na/'o na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bgyi bar glo bur du ming du
490b5('bum): 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/don dam par mchis na/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /
490b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni/'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings su'ang ji ltar
490b7('bum): 'gyur te/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings zhes bgyir mi rung lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
491a1('bum): dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/gang gi
491a2('bum): tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba zhes bya
491a3('bum): ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags
491a4('bum): pa 'di khyod kyis dmigs sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi dmigs legs so//bka' stsal pa/byams pa rnam gangs 'dis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po
491a5('bum): gang yin pa de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin la/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o//'di lta
491a6('bum): ste/gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
491a7('bum): rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshon ma'i dngos po de la/gal te brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin du zin na/'o na ni byis po so so'i skye
491b1('bum): bo thams cad kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur ro//byams pa
491b2('bum): gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni/'o na mtshan ma de'ang mi dmigs na/'di ltar brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs
491b3('bum): par 'gyur ram/byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang /'du byed kyi mtshan ma de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin la/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba
491b4('bum): zhes bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags
491b5('bum): pa de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin pa'ang ma yin par rig par bya'o//de skad ces bkra' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas
491b6('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa lo gnas pa na/'di lto ste/gzugs
491b7('bum): zhes bgyi ba dang /tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang /'du shes zhes bgyi ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bgyi ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
492a1('bum): rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar dag/gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mi dmigs na/bcom ldan 'das ci mchis pa mi dmigs
492a2('bum): pa lags sam/'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa
492a3('bum): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ni/rang dubang nyid dam yod pa nyid gang yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la
492a4('bum): rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de/rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur ram/gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab
492a5('bum): kyi spyod pa la gnas te/rnam par mi rtogs pa de'i tshe/rnam par mi rtogs par gzung bar 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so//byams pa de lta yin na/'di lta ste/
492a6('bum): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la/'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par
492a7('bum): shes pa zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar glo bur du ming du btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du ma zad dam/rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do//de de
492b1('bum): ltar rnam par mi rtogs pa'i dbyings la gnas te/rnam par rtog pa rnams dang bral bar gyur pa na/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /
492b2('bum): 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de la yod pa gang yin gong yod
492b3('bum): pa ni dmigs par 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
492b4('bum): dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas pa la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
492b5('bum): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags po rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /
492b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/chos rab tu dbye ba mkhas
492b7('bum): pa la zhugs pas/gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs
493a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bye ste/'di lta ste/'di ni kun brtags pa'i gzugs so//'di ni rnam par
493a2('bum): btags pa'i gzugs so//'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so//'di lta ste/'di ni kun brtags pa'i tshor ba'o//'di ni rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o//'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o///
493a3('bum): 'di lta ste/'di ni kun brtags pa'i 'du shes so//'di ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so//'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes so//'di lta ste/'di dag ni kun brtags pa'i
493a4('bum): 'du byed rnams so//'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so//'di dag ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed rnams so//'di lta ste/'di ni kun brtags pa'i rnam par shes
493a5('bum): pa'o//'di ni rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o//'di ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o//'di lta ste/'di dag ni kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag
493a6('bum): go/'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so//'di dag ni chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya ba'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom
493a7('bum): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kun brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/rnam par btags pa'i gzugs ni
493b1('bum): gang lags/chos nyid kyi gzugs ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /kun brtags/
493b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni gang lags/rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/
493b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang /'du shes dang /btags pa dang /tha snyad la
493b4('bum): brten nas/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni kun brtags pa'i gzugs so//byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la/tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /
493b5('bum): 'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang /'du shes dang /btags
493b6('bum): pa dang /tha snyad la brten nas tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su rtog
493b7('bum): pa 'di ni kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'o//'di dag ni kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/'du
494a1('bum): byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi chos nyid la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas/mngon par brjod de/glang la 'di ni gzugs so zhes
494a2('bum): bya ba dang /tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang 'du shes so zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya ba'i
494a3('bum): bar gyi ming dang /'du shos dang /btags pa dang /tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so//'di ni rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o//'di ni
494a4('bum): rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so//'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du byed rnams so//'di ni rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o//'di dag ni rnam par btags
494a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa
494a6('bum): nyid dang /chos gnas pa'i dbyings dang /gang kun brtags pa'i gzugs des/rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang /ther zug ther zug gi dus su ngo bo
494a7('bum): nyid med pa kho na dang /chos la bdag med pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so//'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang /'du shes
494b1('bum): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'o//'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems/
494b2('bum): dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gzugs gsum po 'di dag las/rdzas su ma mchis par lta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags/rdzas su mchis par lta
494b3('bum): ba ni gong lags rdzas su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/rjes su mchis pa'ang ma lags shing don dam pas rab tu phye bar lta ba ni gang lags/tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang /'du
494b4('bum): shes gsum po 'di dag dang /'du byed gsum po 'di dag dang /rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma
494b5('bum): mchis pa dag ni gang lags/rdzas su mchis pa dag ni gang lags/rjes su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/rdzas su mchis pa'ang ma lags shing /don dam pas rab tu phye ba dag
494b6('bum): ni gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa gang kun brtags pa'i gzugs de ni rdzas su
494b7('bum): med par blta bar bya'o//rnam par btags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni/rnam par rtog pa rjes su yod pa'i phyir/rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/rang dbang du 'byung ba'i
495a1('bum): byir no ma yin no//glang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni rdzas su med pa'ang ma yin/rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin nang/don dam bus rab tu bye bar blta bar byar//ga
495a2('bum): kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /gang dag kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdzas su
495a3('bum): med par blta bar bya'o//gang rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /gang dag rnam par btags pa'i sangs
495a4('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni/rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir/rdzas su yod par blta bar bya ste/rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no//byams pa gang chos
495a5('bum): nyid kyi tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /byams pa gang dag chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rjes su med
495a6('bum): pa'ang ma yin la/rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing /don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bor bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
495a7('bum): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btogs pa'ang mchis la/de ltar tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
495b1('bum): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang mchis na/'jo lta ste gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas
495b2('bum): pa'o//'di lta ste/tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i blor
495b3('bum): 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bka' stsal pa do/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas/'di lta ste gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyisas
495b4('bum): med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//'di lta ste tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /'du shes zhes bya ba dang /'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi pha
495b5('bum): zhes bya ba de ni/gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa
495b6('bum): byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/kun brtags pa'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/'on te ma yin/gsol po/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
495b7('bum): logs so//de la gzugs zhes bya ba ming dang 'du shes dang /btags pa dang /tha snyad tsam gang yin pa de jig gzugs yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das do na ma lags
496a1('bum): so//byams pa rnam grangs 'dis gang kun brtag pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin/gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/
496a2('bum): gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni/gnyis su med pa ste/ngas 'di la dgongs nas/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bkra'
496a3('bum): stsal par rig par bya'o//byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems//gang la brten nas gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming dang /btags pa dang /tha snyad du 'gyur ba rnam par btags pa'i
496a4('bum): gzugs rdzas su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ji ga gzugs ma yin pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das do ni mA lags so//byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/rnam
496a5('bum): par btags pa'i gzugs de nyid la/kun brtags pa'i gzugs des/de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing /de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin po de gzugs yin nam/gsol pa/
496a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de'ang /gzugs kyang ma yin la/gzugs ma yin pa'ang
496a7('bum): ma yin te/gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de gnyis su med pa ste/ngas de la dgongs nas/'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su
496b1('bum): med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o//byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/gang chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med pas rab tu phye ba'i gzugs de jig gzugs/
496b2('bum): yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//chos nyid kyis gzugs de nyid kyi gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
496b3('bum): 'das de ni ma lags so//byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de'ang /gzugs kyang ma yin la/gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/gang
496b4('bum): gzugs kyang ma yin la/gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/ngas de la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su
496b5('bum): byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya ste/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar
496b6('bum): la'ang sbyar bar bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes
496b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar gzugs la gnyis su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhaso shing /de ltar tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
497a1('bum): pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mkhas pa/mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa'i yongs su 'tshul ba/
497a2('bum): mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/spong ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/mngon sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid nin ji lta bur blta bar bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa
497a3('bum): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/mtha' gnyis spangs
497a4('bum): nas/'di ltar dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o//gang tshor
497a5('bum): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du/yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/yongs su mi
497a6('bum): shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o//gang gzugs spong ba'ang ma yin mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o//gang tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
497a7('bum): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du spong ba'ang ma yin/mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o//gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum
497b1('bum): du'ang mi byed la/mngon sum du mi byed pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o//gang gzugs spang ba'i phyir/lam bsgom pa'ang ma yin/mi bsgom pa'ang ma yin pa
497b2('bum): de nyid de'i bsgom pa'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o//de skad
497b3('bum): ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
497b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di lta bu'i yongs su 'tshal ba dang /spong ba dang /mngon sum du bgyid pa dang /bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags/de skad
497b5('bum): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab bo//mchog
497b6('bum): tu zab bo//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/byang chub sems
497b7('bum): dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar zab pa dang /mchog tu zab pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan
498a1('bum): las 'das pa ni 'di ltar/mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin/mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin te/de'i phyir zab pa dang /mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o//de
498a2('bum): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan
498a3('bum): las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma lags/mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa gzhan gyi don las brtsams
498a4('bum): te/'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin no//bdag gi don las brtsams te/mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bas/mya ngan las ma
498a5('bum): 'das pa'ang ma yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
498a6('bum): chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don las brtsams te 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na de 'khor ba yongs su ma bting bas/'dis ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su btang bar mi
498a7('bum): 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong na/'dis ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su
498b1('bum): btang bar mi 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/'khor ba la'ang 'khor
498b2('bum): ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog/mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste/de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/'di lta ste/'khor ba dang mya ngan las
498b3('bum): 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de 'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas/'khor ba las yid byung bar mi 'gyur ro//de
498b4('bum): bzhin du mya ngan lus 'das pa la'ang mya ngan las 'das po nyid du mi rtog pas/mya ngan las 'das pa las nyams par yang mi 'gyur te/de bzhin du 'khor ba na'ang mi nyams so///
498b5('bum): de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de/rigs pa 'dis 'khor ba'ang yongs su mi gtong la/mya ngan las 'das pa'ang yongs su mi gtang bar rig par bya'o//de
498b6('bum): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha
498b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pas 'khor ba ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma mchis shing /mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang ba de
499a1('bum): ltar blangs pa 'dra ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags snum/bcom ldan 'das gal te/byungs pa ma mchis nA rdo ltar ma btang ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
499a2('bum): bka' stsal pa/byams pa nga ni 'di ltar 'khor ba len to zhe 'am/mi len to zhes mi smra'o//byams pa 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
499a3('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis sems la dbang thob pa/thabs la mkhas pas 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/'jig rten gyi
499a4('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba'o zhes nga mi smra'o//stong pa nyid mi dmigs
499a5('bum): pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams
499a6('bum): pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus pa ji ltar lta bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa gzugs
499a7('bum): gang yin pa dang /tshor ba gang yin pa dang /'du shes gang yin pa dang /'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
499b1('bum): kyi bar du gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /chos de dag dang /stong pa nyid de'i dngos po dang /dngos po med pa gnyis su med pa spros pa
499b2('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/byams pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par blta'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas
499b3('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci nyan thos thams cad gcig tu nges par gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
499b4('bum): byams pa de ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa 'jig rten 'di ni khams sna tshogs pa/khams du ma pa ste/khams sna tshogs pa khams du ma pa'i 'jig rten de na/sems
499b5('bum): can gyi rigs dang /rang bzhin mang du dmigs te/byams pa gang thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer te/bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi rigs
499b6('bum): kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod/gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te/dman pa nyid thob la/de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu'ang yod/gang
499b7('bum): thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te/dman po nyid thob la/dman par shes nas/de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin gyi/de'i gong du bzang po'i bye brag tshol zhing //
500a1('bum): /bzang po thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bye brag de lta bu'ang yod do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas
500a2('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi rigs kyi rnam pa gsum po gang lags pa de/dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
500a3('bum): pa'i byang chub don du gnyer kyang /skye ba ma mchis pas ji ltar thob par 'gyur/bsgrub pa nyid de'i skye ba lags par ni/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal lags so//bcom
500a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa de'i skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'gyur bar ni ngo mi 'dogs kyi/de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /sprul pa dang /yongs
500a5('bum): su bsngos pa'o zhes nga 'dogs so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
500a6('bum): thog me nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer zhing /bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba/byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rlabs po che dang /che ba'i lhag
500a7('bum): pa'i bsam pa ni ngo mtshar logs so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che ni gang lags/che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid ni gang lags/
500b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin nyid dang /tshangs pa nyid dang /'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang /'khor los sgyur ba nyid thams cad
500b2('bum): dang /'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/de dag la mi chags shing /mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs
500b3('bum): po che'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di lta ste/'du byed yongs su mi gtong bas/de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang /'dzin pa med pa'i badre ba dang /mya ngan las 'angs pa'i bde ba sems
500b4('bum): can thams cad dang thun mong du bya bar 'dod cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/de dag gi che ba nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam par blta bar
500b5('bum): bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byamos pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni ngo mtshar
500b6('bum): rmad du byung ba lags so//byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung po lags so//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar
500b7('bum): rmad du byung ba rnams la slob por 'tshal bas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi lags so///shes rab kyi pha rol
501a1('bum): tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po sum brgya gnyis pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rigs
501a2('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo des/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
501a3('bum): rtag tu ngu/da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des/yongs su
501a4('bum): btsal ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su btsal bar bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis 'di
501a5('bum): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su tshol ba na/ji ltar yongs su
501a6('bum): btsal lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
501a7('bum): tu ngu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba ni/lus la ched cher mi 'dzin/srog la mi lta/rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas
501b1('bum): par yongs su btsal byas yongs su btsal to//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing /'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na/bar snang las sgra thos par gyur te/rigs
501b2('bum): kyi bu shwar phyogs su song zhig dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ci nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang /gnyed dang /rmugs pa yid la
501b3('bum): byed pa mi bskyed pa dang /bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang /btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang /mtshan mo yod la byed po mi bskyed pa dang /nyin mo yid la byed pa mi
501b4('bum): bskyed pa dang /grang ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang /tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa de ltar song zhig/nang ngam phyi rol gang la'ang sems smon par ma byed cig/rigs kyi bu
501b5('bum): shor dang lhor ma lta bar song zhig/nub dang /byang dang /steng dang /'og dang /phyogs mtshams su'ang ma lta bar song zhig/rigs kyi bu ci nas 'jigs tshogs las kyang ma
501b6('bum): g.yos pa dang /ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang /ci nas tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song zhig
501b7('bum): gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro//ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro//gang sangs rgyas kyi chos
502a1('bum): rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de ni 'khor ba la spyod do//gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi thob bo//de skad ces smras pa dang //
502a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/sgra de la 'di skad ces smras so//de bzhin du bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag ni sems can thams cad la snang ba byed par
502a3('bum): 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro//de skad ces smras pa dang /sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces
502a4('bum): smras so//rtag tu ngu lags so//legs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang sgra thos te/'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang /
502a5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos dag la mos po bskyed la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o//khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang bar bya/
502a6('bum): dngos po yongs su spang bar bya/sems can du lta ba yongs su spong bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spong bar bya'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong
502a7('bum): pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /ma byung ba dang /ma skyes pa dang /dngos po med pa dang /ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya
502b1('bum): bsten par bya/bsnyen bkur bya'o//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na/ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am/dge slong chos smra ba'i lus
502b2('bum): la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing /khyod kyis byas
502b3('bum): pa bzo ba dang /byas pa tshor bar bya ste/gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni/bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag
502b4('bum): gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
502b5('bum): bsnyen par 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin ga shogs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro//mi khoms pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro//dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par
502b6('bum): 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la/dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten
502b7('bum): gyi zeng zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'o/khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos donar gnyer ba dang /chos la gus par bya bas phyi
503a1('bum): bzhin 'brang bar bya'o//khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
503a2('bum): la gzugs dang sgra dang /dri dang ro dang /reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang /bsten pa dang /spyod par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrib ste/de dag des zil gyis mnan nas thabs la mkhas pas
503a3('bum): 'grogs shing bsten pa dang /bsnyen par byed pa'ang yod de/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o//gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/
503a4('bum): bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/'di ni thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so//'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung ba'i
503a5('bum): phyir chos 'di dag la bsten cing 'grogs te/bsnyen par byed kyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la'ang chags pa 'am/sgrib pa med kyis/skad
503a6('bum): tsocig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod nyid kyis yang dag pa'i tshul sa so brtag par bya'o//rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams
503a7('bum): cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/chos thams cad ni sems can med pa
503b1('bum): srog med pa/gang zag med pa/sgyu ma lta bu/rmi lam lta bu/brag cha lta bu/mig yor lta bu ste/rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra
503b2('bum): ba'i phyir 'brang na/ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las la sems shig
503b3('bum): rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na/de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir dgyed par mi bya ste/gzhan
503b4('bum): du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang /chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang /yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so//de nas byang chub sems
503b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas/shar phyogs ga lwa ba der song ba dang /ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag
503b6('bum): gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snyam nas/de sa phyogs de nyid na ngu zhing mya ngan byed de sme zhing 'dug go/des phyogs de na nyin zhag gcig 'das par byed/nyin zhag
503b7('bum): gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhi'am/lnga'am/bdun 'das kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par mi gyur gyi bar du/lus ngal ba yid lo byed pa mi bskyed
504a1('bum): rmugs pa dang /gnyid yid la byed pa mi bskyed/bzla' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed/
504a2('bum): nyin mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed/grang ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i
504a3('bum): dus byas na/sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yang la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan
504a4('bum): gang yang mi 'byung ngo //rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang de'i tshe/bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur
504a5('bum): snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo //rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun
504a6('bum): du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas/legs so zhes bya bar byin te/rigs kyi bu khyod tshig de skad smra ba legs so legs so//ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar
504a7('bum): yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
504b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal to//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang /spro ba 'dri dang /don du gnyer ba 'di dang /'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang
504b2('bum): zhing /shar phyogs nyid du song zhig dang /rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag ched lnga brgya na/spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/'bas
504b3('bum): rim pa bdun dang /shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/'byor pa/rgyas pa bde ba/lo legs
504b4('bum): pa/skye bo mang po dang /mis gang ba/grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/khyogs khri nyam mi nga bo dang /bar bar dag
504b5('bum): tu zam pa btags pa/grong khyer gyi kher yug tu zhol gyi phyir ba rin po che sna bdun las legs par byas shing /bskor ba rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni dzam+bu
504b6('bum): chu bo'i gsor las byas pa/mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/mnga' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thog gi 'bras bu chags
504b7('bum): pa/mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i tha gu byung bas mda' yab gnyis pa gzhin dang 'brel po/grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra
505a1('bum): bas khebs te/gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na/sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba/'di lta ste dper na/yan lag lnga dang
505a2('bum): ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/sgra 'jam zhing kanA la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du/dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis
505a3('bum): btab na/sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing /dga' dgur spyod do//grong khyer dri khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang
505a4('bum): zhing /chu ha cang yang mi gleng /ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do//chu de la sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa/rin po che sna bdun gyi gru dag yod de/der sems can de
505a5('bum): dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o//chu de thams cad kyang me tog ut+pa la dang /ku mu dra dang /pad+ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la/dr-i
505a6('bum): zhim pa'i ngad ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na myed pa gang yang med do//grong khyer de'i
505a7('bum): nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu
505b1('bum): khor drug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas rin po cha sna bdun gyi me tog ut+pa la dang /ku mra dA dang /pad+ma dkar po rnam par/
505b2('bum): bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/de dag gis chu de khebs shing /me tog ut+pal dang /ku mu dang /pad+ma dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i pang le tsam ste/sngon
505b3('bum): po kha dog sngon po/sngon po lto bur ston pa/'od sngon po 'byung ba/ser po/kha dog ser po/ser po lta bur ston pa/'od ser po 'byung ba/dmar po/kha dog dmar po/dmar
505b4('bum): lta bur ston pa/'od dmar po 'byung ba/dkar po/kha dog dkar po/dkar po lta bur ston pa/'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do//rdzing bu de dag thams cad na/ngang ngur dang /
505b5('bum): khrung khrung dang /bya ka ran+d+ra pa dang /gzhad sgra 'byin pa dag yod do//skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing ris su bcad pa med de/'di ltar sems can dag
505b6('bum): yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /yun ring por ches zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag gri ston gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no//rigs kyi
505b7('bum): bu grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi gzhi mngon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi
506a1('bum): tshad tsam yod pa/rnam par bkra zhing blta sdug pa/ra ba rim pa bdun dang /ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de/khang pa de na khang
506a2('bum): pa'i longs spyod du rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /mya ngan med ces bya ba dang /mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang /me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /skyed
506a3('bum): mos tshul bzhi yod de/skyed mas tshal de dag re raM na'ang /rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang /bzang mchog ces bya ba dang /dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /dga' mchog ces bya ba dang /
506a4('bum): bde ba zhes bya ba dang /bde ldan zhes bya ba dang /nges pa zhes bya ba dang /mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser las byas/ngos gnyis pa
506a5('bum): ni dngul las byas/ngos gsum pa ni bai DUr+ya las byas/ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/nang gi sa gzhi ni ke ke ru la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/rdzing bu de dag re re la'ang them
506a6('bum): skas them pa rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so//rdzing bu
506a7('bum): de dag thams cad kyi chu ni/me tog ku mu da dang /ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing /ngang ngur dang /khrung khrung dang /gzhan rnams skad 'byin to//rdzing bu de
506b1('bum): ngag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/shing de dag rlung gis bskyod pa dang /me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/rdzing bu de thams cad kyi chu'ang tsan+dan gyi drir phyogs
506b2('bum): shing kha dog dang ldan dri dang ldan no//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa/bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang /lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon
506b3('bum): tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do//grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang /bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam
506b4('bum): rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te/rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang
506b5('bum): lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste/dga' mgur spyod cing /de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to//sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi
506b6('bum): dbus kyi gzhi mdor/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshes 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang /dngul gyi rkang pa dang /bai DUr+ya'i rkang pa dang /shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/shing bal
506b7('bum): bting ba stan nang tshangs can bting ba/stan snying po can du byas pa/ka shi ka'i ras bting ba/'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa ba shams te/steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu
507a1('bum): tig gis brgyan pa bres shing /de ltar chos la gus par byed pas/sa phyogs de khor yug kyang me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing /sa phyogs
507a2('bum): de'ang spos sna tshogs dang /bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed de/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
507a3('bum): pa ston te/rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni de lta bur gus par byed cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to//
507a4('bum): de ni gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po srog chags stong phrag mang po srog chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag la snga la la ni lung nod/la la ni kha ton
507a5('bum): byed de/la la ni yi ger 'dri/la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/bla na med pa
507a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song zhig dang /de las shes
507a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
507b1('bum): ston pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no//rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar 'tshol ba bzhin
507b2('bum): du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyis/rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par song zhig dang /ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol
507b3('bum): tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/de thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes par
507b4('bum): gyur pas/'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na/yid la byed pa gzhan mi bskyed kyi/gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar byed pa/zug rngu
507b5('bum): 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu blang /gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par
507b6('bum): byed cing /chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong ba ma sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yod la mi byed do//
507b7('bum): do nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngos sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo ru mo mngon/
508a1('bum): du gyur pa 'di lta ste/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
508a2('bum): dang /chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad snang bar
508a3('bum): byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams
508a4('bum): cod mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
508a5('bum): sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad kyi sgra bsgrub pa zhes bya
508a6('bum): bai'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems
508a7('bum): can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sgra dang /tshig dang /'bru sna tshogs bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ma khengs
508b1('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdul dang bral
508b2('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang /'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad la rnam par blta bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos
