508b3('bum): thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzugs
508b4('bum): kyi rdul sel ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /phyir mi ldog po'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos kyi dbyings las nges par
508b5('bum): byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /seng ge mngon par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems can thams
508b6('bum): cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin drang /rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya
508b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang /nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snying po thams cad kyis rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad las mngon par
509a1('bum): 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mngon par shes pa dang /stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad las nges
509a2('bum): par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad bye brag med par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
509a3('bum): dang /lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mtshon ma dang bral ba zhes
509a4('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chags pa thams cad las rnam par grolo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos zab mo'i 'od
509a5('bum): byibyad ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed
509a6('bum): po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /de bzhin gshegs
509a7('bum): pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
509b1('bum): glagrangs med dpag tu med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
509b2('bum): glis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/tshig 'di skad kyang gsung ngo //rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na/shes rab
509b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal te/yongs su tshol ba na'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob skye/ting nge 'dzin 'dri dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du
509b4('bum): chud par gyur te/phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to//nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/gang mnyam par bzhag par
509b5('bum): bya ba'am/ldang bar bya ba 'am/byang chub tu spyad pa 'am/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang
509b6('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/rigs kyi bu chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/rlom sems med par mi byed pa
509b7('bum): la gnas nas/nged kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /'od 'dom gang ba dang /
510a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang /yon tan thams cad kyi
510a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la/de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad bzung ba 'am/mtha' bstan par mi nus na/nyan thos dang /
510a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang /'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/rigs
510a4('bum): kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang /'dun pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no//khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen lo shin du gus pa bskyed
510a5('bum): par bya'o//phang bar bya'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
510a6('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces gsol to//bodag
510a7('bum): gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
510b1('bum): 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la bslabs
510b2('bum): so//rigs kyi bu de ni khyod yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyis/des khyod la ci bsgo ba bzhin du zung zhig/rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems
510b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa 'am/bskal pa gnyis sam/bskol pa brgya 'am/bskal pa stong ngam/de las lhag par yang mgo la tha~Md bzhin du
510b4('bum): thogs shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang ro dang /reg pa ji snyed yod pa
510b5('bum): de dag thams cad phul yang /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan len pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/
510b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa thos shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
510b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'ang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so//de bzhin
511a1('bum): gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar
511a2('bum): gyur to//yang de 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams
511a3('bum): la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/bdag yongs su 'dzin pa/bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis/bdag byang chub sems
511a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di
511a5('bum): nyid dri'o snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang /dad pa dang /ri mo
511a6('bum): dang gus par bya ba nye bar bzhag ste/nye bar bzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so//bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur sti bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
511a7('bum): de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/bdag ni dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags la bdog gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos rin po che'am/gser
511b1('bum): ram/nor bu 'am/mu tig gam/bai DUr+ya 'am/dung ngam/man+ta shol lam/byu ru 'am/dngul lam/sa lo sbrum mAm/me tog gam/spros sam/me tog phreng ngam/
511b2('bum): byug pa 'am/gdugs de lta bu'ang bdag la med na/bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/bdag
511b3('bum): dga' ba 'am/rangs pa'ang mi skye'o snyam du sems so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang /bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang /
511b4('bum): ldan pas/song nas mthar gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang /de'i grong bar gyi dbus su de 'dri snyam du sems te/'di ltar bdag gis lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis/byang
511b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o//yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de btsongs la/'khor ba dpag tu med pa dag 'dod pa'i
511b6('bum): rgyas yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang /'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ni
511b7('bum): mo yin no snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar du 'dug ste/mau su nyo 'dod mi su nyo 'dod ces sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis bos so//de nas
512a1('bum): bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/byang chub sems
512a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na/myur du bla na med pa

512a4('bum): tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur zhes/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/der sems can mang po
512a5('bum): ngag gi don byed par 'gyur/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed/sems can
512a6('bum): gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/bdog gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam nas/bdud sdig can gyis ci nas/bram ze dang /khyim bdag de dag
512a7('bum): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/mi su nyo 'dod su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mo thos par 'byur ba de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so//de nas
512b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma byung ste/'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la byang chub sems
512b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na/lus nyo ba'ang bdag gis ma rnyed de/kye ma bdag ni rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed do snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di

512b4('bum): tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la/bdag gis bgam par bya'o snyam ste/lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon
512b5('bum): par sprul nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras
512b6('bum): so//rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar yid mi dga' zhing yid gdung la mchi ma 'byung ba ci nyes des smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u kho bo ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/chos la mchod
512b7('bum): pa bya bar 'dod na/lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas/de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so//kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
513a1('bum): /mchod pa byung dang /'phags pa byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'dzin gas 'a mags sa da ba klung ste san/rtswadag gis las pa 'ang ma rgyad dusas pa//

513a3('bum): der mi'i snying dang khrag dang /rus pa dang /rkang dag kho bo la dgos na/de rin gyis nyor byan cig ces byas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam
513a4('bum): dusems te/gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang /khrag dang /rus pa dang /rkang nyo brnyed pa 'di ni/bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do//bdag gi
513a5('bum): lus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa rnams la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to snyam ste de sems dga' ba dang /sems bde ba dang /sems rab tu dga' bar
513a6('bum): gyur nas//bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze'i khye'u kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no//des de la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod rin du
513a7('bum): ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes byas pa dang des de la 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btong ba de kho bo la byin cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
513b1('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po thogs nas/lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzugs so//brla ga yas pa sha med par btogs nas/rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo //de nas/
513b2('bum): tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu brla sha med par btogs nas/rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song
513b3('bum): ba mthong nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa/bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam nas tshong dpon
513b4('bum): gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dug la ba der song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so//rigs
513b5('bum): kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tshe dag byed/khrag dang rus pa dang /rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/rtag tu dus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze'i khye'u 'di la

513b7('bum): dpon gyi bu mo des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang /khrag dang /rus pa dang /
514a1('bum): rkang yang btsongs te/rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/des de la smras pa/bu mo rigs kyi bu de

514b1('bum): byu blon med pa'i chos rin po che'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro//dranas tshong dpon gyi bu ma ngas byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po d+hag tu dul 'das ces smras so//rongs/

514b5('bum): phye ma 'am/gos som/gdugs sam/khyod la ni dgos pa de khyod la skyon gyis/bdag nyid la 'di lta dri'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs pa/

516a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/

516b1('bum): gur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/de'i lus nyo bar su'ang ma byung ste/de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mi dga' bar sems shing mchis te/des nga ni lus 'tshong bar 'dod na/lus nyo
516b2('bum): ba ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang /brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang /rtag tu ngu des

516b5('bum): sbyin zhig byed pa der/mi'i snying dang /khrag dang rus pa dang /rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang /rigs kyi bu des yi ma sad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras nas de mtshon
516b6('bum): rnon po thogs te bdag gi lhag pa phug nas khrag gzags/brla'i shwa btegs te rus pa gtsug tu song nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/rus pa dang rkang sbyin no snyam nas/dri khrag
516b7('bum): gzugs pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do//mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/de'i thad
517a1('bum): du mchis nas 'di skad bgyis so//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang /de bdag la 'di skad mchi
517a2('bum): ste/bram ze'i khye'u 'di la/khrag dang /steng dang /rus pa dang /rkang sbyin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nga ni dbul te/dA la nor gzhan ci'ang med do zhes mchi'o//bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig
517a3('bum): bya zhes bgyis pa dang /de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchod par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
517a4('bum): 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya'o zhes mchi nas/bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te/rigs kyi bu des khyed la yon tan gyi rnam po 'am/khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/de
517a5('bum): bdag la 'di skad du/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro//'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las
517a6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang /rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam bgyid de/
517a7('bum): rigs kyi bu 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to//rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na/bdag
517b1('bum): cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa mi bgyi/'di lta bu'i gnas ngag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gangab snyam nas/rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad
517b2('bum): ces bgyis so//rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya
517b3('bum): ba'i nor mang po de dag khyod la sbyin no//bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'gogs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o//bdag gis kyang rigs
517b4('bum): kyi bu de la mchod pa bgyi'o//gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o zhes bgyis shing mchis na/yab yum
517b5('bum): gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol//bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi'o///
517b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bram po sum brgya gsum pa ste tha ma//de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas
517b7('bum): dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/chos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab pa/'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa sems can thams cad bde ba thob par
518a1('bum): byed pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na/khyod nged kyis gnang gis/bu mo da kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems
518a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro yis/nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye shig/de nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
518a3('bum): 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang /bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so//bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi'ang bar chad mi bgyid do//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
518a4('bum): mo nges shing rta lnga brgya'ang rgyan gyis brgyan/bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to//rgyan gyis brgyan nas/me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs/bdug pa dang /spos dang /
518a5('bum): me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag thogs/gser dang /dngul gyi me tog dag thogs/rin po che sna tshogs
518a6('bum): rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang thogs te/bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /shing rta gcig
518a7('bum): tu zhugs te/bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis/yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang /shar phyogs ga la ba de
518b1('bum): logs su dong ste mthar gyis skyong ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyud ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba/blta
518b2('bum): na sdug pa las byas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ro ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba/rta babs bdun yod pa/'obs rim bdun dang /to la'i phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/chur
518b3('bum): dpag tshad bcu gnyis/zheng du dngagu tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/'byor cing rgyas pa/bde ba lo legs pa/mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/grong bar dang /srang mnyam zhing mtshungs
518b4('bum): pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang /bar bar dag tu zam pa btags po legs par byas pa mthong ngo //de'i dbus kyi gzhi mdon/
518b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas/'khor brgya phrag du ma dang /stong phrag du ma dong /'bum phrag du mas/yongs su
518b6('bum): bobaskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/chos 'chad pa mthong ste/mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang /bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig
518b7('bum): tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no//de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems
519a1('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gis mi cha'o snyam nas/de nas shing rta de las byabasdu pa dang /tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang /bu mo lnga brgya
519a2('bum): de dag dang mnyam du shing rta de las babs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su
519a3('bum): bskor cing mdun du bdar te/bkod pa tshad med pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo //de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
519a4('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing /mu tig gi dra bas
519a5('bum): g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do//bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas
519a6('bum): pa bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te/'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed de//khang bu brtsegs
519a7('bum): pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas/de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai rlur+ya
519b1('bum): bzhu pas bris pa bcug ste/khang bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon//
519b2('bum): gyi bu mo la sogs te/bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu brtsigs pa de bkod pa tshang med pas brgyan pa mthong /lho stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/lha'i dbang po brgya byin
519b3('bum): yang lha'i me tog man+ta ra ba dang /lha'i tsen+dan gyi phye ma dang /lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang /lha'i dngul sil ma ngag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la 'thor/mngon par 'thor/mngon
519b4('bum): par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo //lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so//mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di
519b5('bum): skad ces smras so//lha'i dbang po khyod lha stong phrag du ma drag dang /rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog man+dA ra dang /tsin+dan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing /mngon
519b6('bum): par 'thor/mngon par rab tu 'thor/lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir rdung /de skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub sems
519b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang yongs
520a1('bum): su 'dren pa yin te/'dri la bslabs pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
520a2('bum): thams cad dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin na/khyod mi shes sam/de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag/
520a3('bum): tu ngus/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang /yongs su
520a4('bum): 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/brgya byin gyis smras pa/de ni khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i nang na/gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya bzhu bas bris pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
520a5('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya rim bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste/kho bo cag gis khyod la bstan par dka'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
520a6('bum): tungu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs nas/de dag gis me tog dang /me tog phreng gi chun po dang /gos rin po che dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /
520a7('bum): me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gser dang /dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis/
520b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir/shes shes kyis bzhag go//
520b2('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /rgyal mtshan
520b3('bum): dang /ba dan la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/chos
520b4('bum): la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /chos
520b5('bum): gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /gser dang /dngul gyi me tog gis gtor/mngon par gter/mngon por rab tu gtor
520b6('bum): to//de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na me tog gi khyang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to//gser dang dngul gyi me tog dag
520b7('bum): nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to//chos gos dang /gos rin po che de dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to//byang chub
521a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
521a2('bum): 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul cha
521a3('bum): zhing 'di ltar mthu che/'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang /rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/bla na med pa yang dag par
521a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu ma la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/byang chub sems dpa'
521a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas/de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba
521a6('bum): 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
521a7('bum): na'ang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/bdag cag byang chub sems
521b1('bum): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur cig/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags/
521b2('bum): bkur sti byed po 'di bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du
521b3('bum): bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang /
521b4('bum): ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du/bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so//de nas
521b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/byang chub
521b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur stir byas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
521b7('bum): zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/byang chub sems
522a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na
522a2('bum): sgra thos pa/rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas/shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su
522a3('bum): mchis nas 'di snyam du bsams te/bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam ste/des
522a4('bum): bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nus/sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi/gzhan du na
522a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba
522a6('bum): sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa dang /de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/de 'di skad gsung ngo //rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag
522a7('bum): tshing lnga brgyar song dang /grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong
522b1('bum): bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de dag las bdag gis 'di thos nas/ji ltar btams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs
522b2('bum): te mchis pa dang /rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa dper na/dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs
522b3('bum): pa bzhin te/bdag dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so//de nyan pa ni ting nge
522b4('bum): 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to//bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/rigs
522b5('bum): kyi bu legs so legs so//khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
522b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byas so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas/mi snang bar gyur to//bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs
522b7('bum): nas 'di snyam du bsams te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo//de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams
523a1('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni ston gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/dge ba'i rna ba bskrun pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
523a2('bum): phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pad+mo
523a3('bum): bdag la ston par 'gyur snyam nas/rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag zhu na ci nas
523a4('bum): bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang /bzhud pa 'tshal zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang //
523a5('bum): bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste/bdun cu rtsa mun pa'o///de skad
523a6('bum): ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bla
523a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs po de dag ni/gang nas kyang ma byon/gang du'ang ma bzhud de/de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so//de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
523b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/yang dag
523b2('bum): pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba med de/stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs
523b3('bum): kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/
523b4('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
523b5('bum): rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba med de/nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu tshes de dag las de bzhin
523b6('bum): gshegs pa gud na med de/rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/
523b7('bum): rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/'di lta ste/med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o//rigs
524a1('bum): kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na/mi nyi mas gdungs pas/sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas/der chu btung ngo zhes de
524a2('bum): dang der rgyug na/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/chu de gang nas 'ongs/gang du song /chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am
524a3('bum): byung phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song /rtag tu ngus smras pa/rigs kyi bu smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na/'ong ba 'am 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/rigs kyi bu mi nyi mas gdungs shing /
524a4('bum): byibyas pa'i rang bzhin can/shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis smig rgyu mthong nas/chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes skyed kyi/de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so//
524a5('bum): chos 'phags kyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/sgrar mngon par zhen par
524a6('bum): byed pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am bzhud par rtog go/gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byin pa 'am bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin
524a7('bum): can/shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/dper na mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no//da ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi
524b1('bum): srur me lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o//rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba med de/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa 'am
524b2('bum): bzhud pa med do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/rta'i tshogs sam/shing rta'i tshogs sam/dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am
524b3('bum): 'gro ba med do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du/de bzhin
524b4('bum): gshegs pa gcig gam/gnyis sam/gsum ma me/bzhi 'am/lnga 'am/bcu 'am/nyi shu 'am/sum cu'am/bzhi bcu'amo/lnga bcu 'am/de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba
524b5('bum): las sad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/gang du bzhud/rtag tu
524b6('bum): dus smras pa/rigs kyi bu rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mi gda'o//rmi lam ni brdzun te yang dag pa ma lags pa'o//chos 'phags kyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin
524b7('bum): te/chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so//rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag
525a1('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni/ming mtshan gyi sku dang /gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin
525a2('bum): gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par rtog go/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba 'gro ba
525a3('bum): drug por dong ba 'dong ba/'drong bar 'gyur ba'o//de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o//de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las
525a4('bum): rgyang ring du gyur pa'o//yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la/de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
525a5('bum): bstan pa shes pa de dag ni chos gang la'ang 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba 'am/skye ba 'am/'gag par mi rtog go/gang dag chos gang la'ang 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba 'am/skye ba 'am//
525a6('bum): 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so//gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs
525a7('bum): pa la byon pa 'am bzhud par mi rtog go/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar
525b1('bum): gyur pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin
525b2('bum): gnas so//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni/shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /phyogs mtshoms
525b3('bum): dang /steng dang /'og dang /phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/de dag
525b4('bum): kyang rgyu med par byung ba ma yin gyi/rgyu dang /rkyen dang /gzhi la rag las pa yin te/brten nas byung ngo //rin po che de dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang mi
525b5('bum): 'pho mod kyi/rkyen de dag yod na rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do//rkyen de dag med na rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de
525b6('bum): dag gi sku mngon par grub pa'ang gang nas kyang ma byon/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang ma bzhud do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa'ang ma yin te/
525b7('bum): sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas/rgyu dang rkyen lo rag las pa sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no//de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na sku mngon
526a1('bum): par 'grub par 'gyur te/rkyen dag med na sku mngon par 'grub pa'ang mi snang ngo //rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/pI wang gri sgra byung ba'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs
526a2('bum): 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro/gang du'ang mi 'pho ste/brten nas 'byung ba/rgyu la rag las/rkyen la rag las pa'o//'di lta ste/pi wang gi khog pa la brten/dgas pa la brten//
526a3('bum): rgyud la brten/shing bu la brten/rgyud rten la brten/mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas/pi wang de las sgra 'byung ste/sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung /pags
526a4('bum): pa las ma byung /rgyud las ma byung /shing bu las ma byung /rgyud rten lngas ma byung /mI de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung med kyi/de dag thams cad 'dus pa las
526a5('bum): kyang sgrar grag la/sgra de 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las
526a6('bum): pa/rkyen la rag lus pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/rgyu gcig gis ma yin/rkyen gcig gis ma yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi
526a7('bum): rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no//rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te/de ni gang nas kyang ma byon te/rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang
526b1('bum): du'ang mi bzhud de/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang /bzhud pa de ltar blta'o//rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du
526b2('bum): chud par gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa
526b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang /bzhud
526b4('bum): pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/saM g.yo ba chen po byung ste/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/g.yos rab tu
526b5('bum): g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tA 'gul te/bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkogs shing spu bkong bar gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong
526b6('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/rtswa dang /shing gel pa dang /nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga
526b7('bum): la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to//dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing /me tog gi char dag kyang bab bo//lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang
527a1('bum): rdul po chen po blan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu l+yA'i tsan+dan gyi bye ma dang /lha'i me tog gis 'thar/mngon par 'thor/mngon
527a2('bum): par rab tu 'thor zhing /tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi zla khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang /don dam pa lngas byung ba'i gtam/'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/
527a3('bum): gung 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa zlos so zhes 'dzer to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/byang chub
527a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu sdu g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen gang la grang/chos 'phags kyis
527a5('bum): smras pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byin mi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/kho bos bstan pas/srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
527a6('bum): thib par gyur pa dang /srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad nus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos
527a7('bum): rnams la ches kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dga' ba dang /rangs
527b1('bum): pargya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang /bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas sems can 'di
527b2('bum): snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis/zla
527b3('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tshom mi bya'o//bdag ni the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//
527b4('bum): snyam pa dang /de dga' ba dang rangs pa de dang ldan pas ta la bdun du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ta la bdun tsam nu 'dug ste/bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems
527b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam sems so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon
527b6('bum): par 'phags pa mthong nas/de'i sems sems kyis shes nas/de la lha'i me tog man+da rab dag byin te/'di skad du rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
527b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig/'di ni ngas khyod yongs su bzung ba yin te/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas
528a1('bum): te/rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag
528a2('bum): ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems
528a3('bum): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor nas/bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags la mngon
528a4('bum): par bkab ste/tshig 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang /zham ring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo//des bdag gi lus
528a5('bum): phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang /'khor lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub
528a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu bdag cog kyang khyed la lus 'bul gyis/bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtse ba 'dis chos de dag
528a7('bum): thob par gyur cig khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyi/de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o//de nas byang chub
528b1('bum): sems dpa' rtag tu ngus/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo dag khyed kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na/kho bo la lhag pa'i
528b2('bum): bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang bu mo khyed kho bos blang ngo //bu mo de dag gis smras pa/khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun paro 'jug go/khyod la lhag
528b3('bum): pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyad de dag rgyun
528b4('bum): thams cad kyis brgyan te/shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas/thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di
528b5('bum): dag dang /shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod lo 'bul lo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/rigs
528b6('bum): kyi bu legs so legs so//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis/bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o//yongs su gtong bri'i sems de
528b7('bum): lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod po byas nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
529a1('bum): phyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub
529a2('bum): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
529a3('bum): thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang /shing rta lnga brgya
529a4('bum): po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/blangs nas/rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la byin no//de nas byang
529a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang /nyi ma nub par gyur nas/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
529a6('bum): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/'dug pa'am/nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gis mo cha la/'di ni ma legs kyis
529a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang /'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas
529b1('bum): par bya'o snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing /byang chub sems dpa'i/
529b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
529b3('bum): chen po rtag tu ngu'ang /lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung /gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung /rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung /ro la brkam pa ma skyes te/gzhan du ni byang
529b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur/bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs
529b5('bum): kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/bdag gigris phyogs 'di tshig chag btab kyis legs par byugs la/me tog sna tshogs gtor te/sa phyogs
529b6('bum): gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byug par
529b7('bum): bya'o snyam mo//tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing /spyod lam gnyis kyis dus
530a1('bum): 'da' bar byed de/bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra zos te/byang chub
530a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin las ldang ste/langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'jug ste/chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes grag
530a3('bum): nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i sgra de thos pa dang /dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes te/tshong dpon gyi bu
530a4('bum): mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang /sa phyogs de phyugs nas/chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so//de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de/
530a5('bum): stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nus/chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
530a6('bum): po rtag tu ngu/sa phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/bdud sdig can gyis/chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
530a7('bum): rtag tu ngu chu ma rnyed nos yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa bo nub par 'gyur ba dang /mchod pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i
530b1('bum): phyir/chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/kun tu chu btsal nu chu ma rnyed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi lus phug nas khrag
530b2('bum): gogis sa phyogs 'di chag chags gdab bo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa phyogs 'di ni rdul tshwa ste/rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
530b3('bum): 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/bdag gi lus gdon mi zo bar 'jig pa 'di ci zhig bya/bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba lo zhig pa ni bla'i nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir
530b4('bum): 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
530b5('bum): dus/mtshon rnon po blangs te bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas/rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btob bo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
530b6('bum): rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang /mtshon rnon po blangs te/rang rang gi lus phug nas/rang rang gi khrag
530b7('bum): gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i glags rnyed par mi 'gyur bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
531a1('bum): chen po rtag tu ngu dang /bu mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
531a2('bum): chen po rtag tu ngu 'di/'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang /'di ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang /'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang /lus dang /srog dang /longs spyod rnams
531a3('bum): la mi lta ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
531a4('bum): sangs rgyas nas/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med po las sems can thor bar bya'o snyam du/lhag pa'i bsdam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtsha rau to snyam du sems so//de nas
531a5('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi tshur byin gyis brlabs te/lha'i tsan+dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/sa phyogs de kho
531a6('bum): ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris khyab bo//de nas lho'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lo 'di skad ces smos so//
531a7('bum): rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo//khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang /chos yongs su tshol ba bla na med do//rigs kyi bu sngon gyi
531b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang /brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang /chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus//
531b2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis byang chub
531b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni bting /sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni byas/chag chag ni btab na/bdag gi me tog gang dag gis sa phyogaso 'dir
531b4('bum): gtor bar bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad po la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so//
531b5('bum): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba 'di dag long la/khyod
531b6('bum): kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la'ang gtor cig ces//
531b7('bum): des de lo lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba khal stong byin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/me tog de dag blangs te/me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs
532a1('bum): der me tog bkram pa byas so//me tog kha cig gis ni//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to//de nas byang chub sems
532a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang /ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas/stan bting ba la 'dug ste/
532a3('bum): 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus//
532a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu/'di lta ste dper na/bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid
532a5('bum): la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni 'di lta ste/chos thams
532a6('bum): cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po mnyam pa nyid do//chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do//chos thams cad
532a7('bum): g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do//chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems
532b1('bum): med pa nyid do//chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do//chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
532b2('bum): ro gcig pa nyid do//chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do//chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
532b3('bum): skye ba med pa nyid do//chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do//nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol
532b4('bum): tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do//rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do//ri rab sna tshogs nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs nyid
532b5('bum): do//nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do//gzugs mu med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do//
532b6('bum): de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do//sa'i khams mu med
532b7('bum): pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do//chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams mu med po nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu
533a1('bum): med pa nyid do//nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do//rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/shes
533a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do//chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do//chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas//
533a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do//chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam
533a4('bum): pa nyid do//chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do//chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha
533a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/de ltar 'dug bzhin du/de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam
533a6('bum): pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to//chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos
533a7('bum): thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad ro gcig po zhes bya ba'i ting nge
533b1('bum): 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad 'gug pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
533b2('bum): 'dzin dang /nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ri rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' rtog
533b3('bum): pa med pa nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzugs mya med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ngo //tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes
533b4('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dong /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha'i
533b5('bum): /khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad ma 'dris pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi rang
533b6('bum): bzhin dmigs su med po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya
533b7('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/de la sogs
534a1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste bdun
534a2('bum): cu rtsa bzhi pa'o///rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgro 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thug tu/shar phyogs dang /
534a3('bum): lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /phyogs mtshams dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs dang /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
534a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/tshul
534a5('bum): 'di lta bu nyid dang /ming 'di nyid dang /yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo //'di lta ste dper na/da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
534a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/tshul 'di nyid dang /
534a7('bum): ming 'di nyid dang /yi ge 'di nyid kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no//de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang
534b1('bum): ldan par gyur te/gar skyes pa thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang grang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum
534b2('bum): du 'gyur pa de dang de dag tu skye ste/tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur to//des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs/ngal ba phun sum tshogs/
534b3('bum): pa ni bsgrubs so//rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
534b4('bum): bsgrubs pa yin par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis/shes
534b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag
534b6('bum): par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung zhig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/gzhon dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/
534b7('bum): kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis/mnyan par bya/gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/klag par bya/
535a1('bum): kun chub par bya/gdon par bya/lung nod par bya/bstan par bya/kha ton du bya/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la
535a2('bum): yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
535a3('bum): dan dang /khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang /mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bya/zla mar bya/ri mor byA/mchod par bya/brjed par bya/gsol bar bya ste/kun dag
535a4('bum): bo 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom
535a5('bum): ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so//bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so//de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
535a6('bum): bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la/kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang /ngag gi
535a7('bum): las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang /yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas so//kun dga' bo de lta bas na da ltar ngo bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i
535b1('bum): sgyu 'di la/khyud kyis pangs pa dang /drad pa dang /gus par byas pa de bzhin du/nga 'das nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang byas shog/kun dad/
535b2('bum): bi tsi nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nu par mi 'gyur zhing /ci nas khyod skyes bu rna mar myi 'gyur bar khyod la ldan gnyis len gsum du yongs su gtod de//
535b3('bum): rjes su yongs su gtud do//kun dga' ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa dri srid du/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o//
535b4('bum): dge' ba srid du bzhin gshig sa mchis ston par rig par bya//nangad/'a shes kyi la tu phyin pa 'drinyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /chang bdu/stsog
535b5('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang /rab tu 'don pa dang /lung nod pa dang /snun pa dang /kha t+ton byed pa dang /yi ger 'dro ba dang /me tig dang /bdug pa dang /gros dang /me tog zing dadu
535b6('bum): blo dang/phyi modang /gas dang //gdugs dang /mtshan dang /dun dag dang / smrig tu ma me'i byeng ba dang /mchod pa rnam pa mang pa drug gis bkur stir byed/zlum
535b7('bum): rimar byed//mchad par byed/da par byeng /gsol bar byed pa'i sems can dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang /dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi bral ba dang/
536a1('bum): dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma thal bar rig par bya'o//kun dga' bo/sems can de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par
536a2('bum): bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub snrums dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /
536a3('bum): dong ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /lha dang myi dang /l+h+wam yin dang /dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
536a4('bum): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa ste/yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/bdun cu rtsa lta ba'i/
536a5('bum): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /suM ran+d+ra ba de dang /zhu chen gyi mots+tsha ba ban+de yi shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing gus te gtan lo phab rnaM/zhus dag
